chunks.original_text: 太乙火府秘法 起雷击庙符 望巽方虚书，用天目，或剑诀，见金光灿然，吸金光书符，口念： 唵。 四明破骸，天猷灭类，神刀一下，万鬼自溃。 急急如律令。 万鬼自溃。 急急如律令。 右符伐神治瘟，无施不可。 玉帝青圭符 又名碎珠符，又名收木客山魑符，又名收祟符。 变火炁布中文 咒曰 玉清敕召，中雷部某帅，巳风伯威灵，子速至左右，午同斩邪精。 煞吾奉大赤天帝令。 又捉勘咒 赤帝斩令，玉清注籍。 玉文当日某帅，辰火急统令。 奉上帝命，卯诛摄邪精。 子丹炁烧空，午斩灭鬼形。 丑电光照彻，命奏天庭。 当日某帅，巳照敕扫除。 辰急急如大赤天帝君律令敕。 右符青纸朱书，黄封皮。 符前事意，后书火急照令速行，内书当日某帅行。 此符牧山魈木客，岩庙狂祟。 尾具法位姓名，告行诛伐，并牒社中焚。 今用只粘编前一道。 或社中焚一道，或灶中焚。 不可轻用。 用时一样二道，坛中遣发一道，一道付请符人。 如前焚。 平常黄纸朱书，急则青纸朱书，至急红纸朱书。 起雷伐恶符 大事用之入二将。 焚淫祠符 天冥地冥，火急神明。 闻吾令者，火急速焚。 有犯令者，敬灭将灵。 火急施行，速速行疾。 右用雷局布炁入符 退土符 熏服皆可。 书符先掐卯文，当心凝神定，志存土神闻符，各归方位，或起去。 勑咒 太上尊命，收捉飞流之煞，东南二千石土神，西北三千土炁，中央星飞毒土公土母，一切年灾月厄日煞时炁，各安方位，患身康泰。 急急如上帝律令。 右符内书神煞速。 起安用雷令急速字盖。 用桃板一尺二寸，书符在上，或挂竹上，或打入所犯方向地上，深三寸至六寸。 五雷开天禹步制雷神咒 又名太乙火府召咒 九炁青灵，威镇诸星。 乾坤之内，奎朗大明。 俱通达迩，焕赫流金。 婆离流演，风雷鼓停。 掷火威猛，辟荡炎云。 斗魁玄备，雷电交横。 三炁雷君，飞火炎铃。 散云掷雨，救死复生。 古婆电母，和羲阳青。 威灵火府，荫覆清宁。 横身万亿，吞日食星。 室离九满，魒鲁乾停。 雷公闪电，霹雳金晶，七炁雷神。 金精提幽，威光威摄。 集骑尘收，八宏雷火。 飞煞玄周，飒风掷火。 三界周流，庚辛有将。 斩域无休，五炁水精。 从帝龙轩，兰黎那由。 鼓领三官，飞光普应。 提武罗先，仙服帝赐。 挂体冲天，多延还颜。 辉朗九天，二仪会合。 飞火炎延，化身万亿。 咸受帝言，冲天雷电。 帝成单晟，忠义拱宸。 蒙罗平亿，姚天马苌。 阳焰云雨，敷演木郎。 日初天傅，传奴扶王。 八天猛将，吾召汝名。 上帝有勑，赐汝威灵。 有功之日，同登玉清。 吾不负汝，立誓分明。 汝若负道，魂死不生。 殃及九祖，师堕幽冥。 常行正直，日月同明。 身为列仙，辅佐雷霆。 急急如玉皇上帝元降律令敕。 剑尖符 祈告治病四角四行，就本命星书事意，依法作用。 坤刘乾陈 巽伏魔艮披云 剑尖符背式 信字一号至八号，周而复始。 如要见斗，改火急轰雷摄，作轰雷现斗摄。 随事改用。 四角用统天印印之。
chunks.translated_text:
**Secret Methods of the Taiyi Fire Mansion**

**Thunder-Summoning Talisman for Striking Temples**
Face the *xun* (southeast) direction and visualize emptiness. Using the "Heavenly Eye" or "Sword Mudra," perceive a radiant golden light. Inhale the golden light and inscribe the talisman, reciting:
*"Om.*
*Four Lights shatter the corpse,*
*Heavenly Might exterminates the kind.*
*With one stroke of the divine blade,*
*Ten thousand ghosts scatter of themselves.*
*Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the statutes!"*
*"Ten thousand ghosts scatter of themselves.*
*Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the statutes!"*

This talisman subdues spirits and cures pestilence—there is no affliction it cannot address.

---

**Jade Emperor’s Azure Jade Talisman**
Also called the *Shattering Pearl Talisman*, the *Mountain Goblin-Subduing Talisman*, or the *Malevolent Spirit-Seizing Talisman*.

**Method for Transforming Fire Qi and Inscribing the Talisman**
Recite the incantation:
*"By the Jade Clarity’s decree, I summon Marshal So-and-So of the Central Thunder Division.*
*At *si* (6th Earthly Branch), the Wind Earl’s mighty spirit; at *zi* (1st Earthly Branch), hasten to my side.*
*At *wu* (7th Earthly Branch), together we slay the demonic essence.*
*I execute the Great Crimson Heavenly Emperor’s command."*

**Incantation for Capture and Interrogation**
*"By the Crimson Emperor’s execution decree, the Jade Clarity records your name.*
*Marshal So-and-So, on this day, under the *chen* (5th Earthly Branch) fire’s urgent command,*
*I carry out the Supreme Emperor’s mandate: at *mao* (4th Earthly Branch), I seize and slay the demonic essence.*
*At *zi* (1st Earthly Branch), cinnabar qi burns the sky; at *wu* (7th Earthly Branch), I annihilate the ghostly form.*
*At *chou* (2nd Earthly Branch), lightning illuminates all; the mandate is presented to the Celestial Court.*
*Marshal So-and-So, on this day, at *si* (6th Earthly Branch), swiftly execute the decree to sweep away all.*
*Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the Great Crimson Heavenly Emperor’s statutes!"*

Inscribe this talisman in cinnabar on blue paper, sealed with a yellow cover. Before the talisman, state the matter’s intent; afterward, write *"Fire-urgent decree—execute swiftly!"* Within, inscribe *"Marshal So-and-So, act on this day."*

This talisman subdues mountain goblins, wood spirits, and frenzied malevolent forces in cliffside temples. Conclude with the practitioner’s rank and name, declaring the execution of the punitive decree. Burn one copy in the local earth shrine or hearth. Only one talisman is attached here for compilation.

Alternatively, burn one in the earth shrine or another in the hearth. Do not use lightly. When employed, prepare two identical talismans: dispatch one from the altar, and give the other to the petitioner for burning as above.

For ordinary use, inscribe in cinnabar on yellow paper. In urgent cases, use blue paper; in most urgent cases, red paper.

---

**Thunder-Summoning Talisman for Subduing Evil**
For major matters, invoke the Two Generals. Burn to eradicate licentious shrines.

**Talisman for Burning Wayward Temples**
*"Heaven is dark, Earth is dark—fire-urgent, divine spirits!*
*Hear my command and burn swiftly!*
*Those who defy it shall be annihilated, their divine power extinguished.*
*Execute with fire-urgent haste, swiftly, swiftly, act with speed!"*

Use the Thunder Bureau’s method to infuse qi into the talisman.

---

**Earth-Retreating Talisman**
May be burned or fumigated. Before inscribing, press the *mao* (4th Earthly Branch) mudra, concentrate the spirit at the heart, and visualize the earth deities hearing the talisman’s command, each returning to their proper position or departing.

**Decree Incantation**
*"By the Supreme Venerable’s august command, I capture and seize the flying, flowing *sha* (killing qi).*
*Earth deities of the southeast, two thousand in number; earth qi of the northwest, three thousand in strength.*
*Central Star’s flying poison, Earth Lord and Earth Mother—all yearly disasters, monthly calamities, daily *sha*, and hourly qi—*
*return each to your proper position, and the afflicted body shall be peaceful and healthy.*
*Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the Supreme Emperor’s statutes!"*

Within the talisman, inscribe *"Spirits and *sha*, act swiftly."* Conclude with the *"Urgent Thunder Decree"* seal.

Use a peachwood board, one foot two inches long, inscribe the talisman upon it, then either hang it on bamboo or drive it into the ground of the afflicted direction, three to six inches deep.

---

**Five-Thunder Opening Heaven Yu Step for Controlling Thunder Spirits Incantation**
Also called the *Taiyi Fire Mansion Summoning Incantation*:
*"Nine qi of Azure Numinosity, mightily ruling all stars.*
*Within Heaven and Earth, the brilliance of *Kui* and *Lang* shines.*
*All is permeated and illuminated, resplendent as molten gold.*
*Flowing *po* and *li*, wind and thunder cease their drumming.*
*Cast forth fiery might, dispelling the blazing clouds.*
*The Dipper’s *Kui* is fully prepared; thunder and lightning intertwine.*
*Three Qi Thunder Lords, flying fire and flaming bells.*
*Scatter clouds and cast rain, revive the dead and restore life.*
*Ancient *Po* Lightning Mother, harmonizing with *Xi*’s yang and *Qing*.*
*The Fire Mansion’s numinous might shelters and covers pure tranquility.*
*Ten thousand billion forms, devouring sun and moon, consuming stars.*
*Ninefold *shi* and *li*, *piao* and *lu*, *qian* and *ting*.*
*Thunder Lords and flashing lightning, thunderclaps and golden essence—Seven Qi Thunder Spirits.*
*Golden essence uplifts the hidden; might and light subdue.*
*Assemble the cavalry, gather the dust; Eight Vast Thunder Fires.*
*Flying *sha* encircles the dark; whirlwinds hurl fire.*
*Roaming the Three Realms, *geng* and *xin* have their generals.*
*Unceasingly slaying domains; Five Qi Water Essence.*
*From the Emperor’s Dragon Chariot, *Lan Li Na You*.*
*Drumming the Three Officials’ commands, flying light universally responds.*
*Uplift *Wu Luo Xian*, clad in the Emperor’s bestowed immortal garb.*
*Ascend the body to the heavens, prolonging youth and restoring countenance.*
*Radiant brilliance fills the Nine Heavens; the Two Modes unite.*
*Flying fire blazes and spreads, transforming into ten thousand billion bodies.*
*All receive the Emperor’s words; surging thunder and lightning ascend the heavens.*
*The Emperor accomplishes *Dan Cheng*; loyalty and righteousness support the Celestial Throne.*
*Boundless *Meng Luo*; *Yao Tian Ma Chang*.*
*Yang flames, clouds, and rain; unfolding the tale of *Mu Lang*.*
*At sunrise, *Tian Fu* transmits the servant to assist the king.*
*Eight Heavenly Fierce Generals, I summon you by name.*
*The Supreme Emperor has decreed, bestowing upon you numinous might.*
*On the day of merit, ascend together to Jade Clarity.*
*I shall not fail you; the oath is clear.*
*If you betray the Dao, your soul shall die and never revive.*
*Calamity shall extend to nine generations; the master shall fall into dark nether realms.*
*Ever act with uprightness; sun and moon shall shine together.*
*Become ranked immortals, assisting the thunder’s might.*
*Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the Jade Emperor’s primordial statutes!"*

---

**Sword-Tip Talisman**
For prayers and healing, inscribe four lines of four characters each, detailing the matter’s intent according to the petitioner’s life star, then apply as prescribed.

**Qian (☰) Liu, Kun (☷) Chen,**
**Xun (☴) Subdues Demons, Gen (☶) Disperses Clouds.**

**Reverse Side of the Sword-Tip Talisman**
Inscribe the character *"xin"* (信) from numbers one to eight, cycling repeatedly. To manifest the Dipper, replace *"Fire-urgent Thunder Seizure"* with *"Thunder Roars, Dipper Appears, Seize!"* Adapt according to the matter at hand.

Seal the four corners with the *"Uniting Heaven Seal."*

**#6 Huang the True Man of Cloud Manor (Yunzhuang):**
According to *Records of the Dharma’s Origins*, Huang the True Man, styled Yixuan, was a native of Nanpu in Fujian. He studied the Dao under Yang Gengchang, mastering all his secrets. **Wind-Fire Swift Transmission Spell**
The talisman-officer bears the memorial; at the hour of *chen*, it reaches the Emperor’s gate.
The *zi*-stem *gang* wind, fierce officers—if the *si*-hour violates the imperial decree,
the *si*-hour shall enforce the law. *Swiftly, swiftly, as the law commands!*

The *Trust Talisman* is one *cun* and two *fen* in width, four *cun* in length, with the *Four Masters’ Heart Seals* at its four corners.
Inscribed upon the talisman: *"The talisman summons the Direct Talisman Officer Xie You, Thunder God Ji Maoqing. Urgently bear the household missive to present before the ancestral master of the Thunder Bureau. No delay permitted. Await the master’s decree and return to the altar with the response. Act with utmost haste!"*
Within the talisman, add to the household missive: *"Swiftly transmit the household missive!"*; for healing: *"Expel evil and cure illness!"*; for rain-petitioning: *"The Three Heavens’ wind and fire blaze—let the decree descend, and ghosts and spirits perish! Summon the Five Thunder Gods to swiftly thunder and bring rain!"*; for star-adoration: *"Swiftly thunder and manifest the Dipper!"* Adjust according to the matter at hand. Use the five-character seal, □ to seal the seam of the urn.

Upon completion, draw the *qi* of the *Golden Light of the Heavenly Gate* and inscribe it. At the hour of *wu*, add the *Uniting Talisman*.

---

**Great Talisman for Memorial Dispatch**
**Spell for Summoning Spirits**
*Yin yin*, all are mine;
□□ *che che*, so it is.
Is this my will? *Sing ye, flourish the essence, yin!*
□ *zha*, I summon—
*Guardian of the Cavern-Heaven of Zhenling!*
The ten thousand images, the forest of spirits,
all shake the Dharma drum.
*Guardian of the Soul, King Lord*,
eighty-four thousand in number—
the host of body spirits,
attend me at my right!
Today, I stabilize my spirit and fix my will,
calling forth the true officials of the five body parts,
the officers and soldiers of the myriad thunders.
With me, let your spirits fly
to the distant celestial palace,
to present the matters at hand before the Emperor’s throne.
Let all I do and all I decree
be as I wish.
*Swiftly, swiftly, as the law commands!*

chunks.original_text: 太乙火府主将丘元帅，副帅王元帅，掌令陈大神，青雷李大神，馘伐孔大神，火雷崔大神，水雷周大神，飞天纪大神，黑雷刘大神，主律林大神，驱雷白大神，直符谢使者，五雷诸部兵马。 本法将入於此前去会合城隍督勒当境土地词家司命六神等，照依备去事理。 请各遵太上元降符命，为见患某人，上消天灾，下禳地祸，或本人宿今冤咒，先亡谴诃，一切愆尤，恭准原赦，即请就统本部雷兵，千乘万骑，严整器械，肃尔威仪，遍搜淫祠妖寨巢穴。 但是为祸者，不问内外亲疏，封勑神祇，逐一擒捉。 如有不伏收捕，仰大展雷威，剪除剿灭，施行立取，退病还魂，安可为效。 如或星辰逆度，特与解禳。 施行是夜，仍请屏斥邪氛，导迎景贶。 俾风雨肃静，四炁朗清，大开云翳，现出斗星，通诚达恳，上告斗真。 病身平复，门户清宁，当职所祈所祷，如意感通。 庶使真风流演，道法兴行，大赐昭报，火急奉行。 谨编。

chunks.original_text: 太岁　年　月　日　时编。 具位　臣姓　某承　诰奉行。 祖师中天枢相伏魔真君许在天。 编内符 又雷编符 勑编咒 天雷水师，地雷火师，三界圣司，闻令俯临，霹雳妖怪，功满德周，上升天庭。 急急如玉清律令勑。 又勑咒 当日某帅卯直符谢某。 辰遵照帝命，巳火急通灵。 午颢风猛吏，子不得阻停。 午如有违命，丑合奏帝庭。 急急如律令。 七编三檄 入将 雷霆内炼玉音秘文 唵灵吽。 子唵神真咤。 丑俱咤罗。 寅历风神那。 卯啹咡那咤。 辰嘘□啰。 巳敕雷光吽吽。 午阴星咤□那。 未唵雷咤咤。 申帝敕咤□。 酉风雷雨雹。 戌唵霹雳咤。 亥雷威才震便惊人。 辰唵吟轰勋滑辣救敬敕。 金光速现，雷门娑诃。 一炁灵章符 大祈祷用之，其应如响，入前三天檄。 取金光炁布笔念前雷霆玉音秘文书之 雾猷收，皈会昌。 总万炁，入元宫。 摄敕。 火府太乙，名曰回风。 摄邪皈正，契合崆峒。 斡旋万化，洞化九宫。 普天应命，道日兴隆。 急急如三清上帝口敕。 三清诀，取天门炁入。 此符乃太乙之身形，万炁之根源。 学者佩之，可以斡旋元枢，摄邪皈正，返本还源，指挥万神，随机赴感。 行持不辍，九天降灵，回车毕道，飞空为太乙。 上品禁戒，非登真奉信对圣设盟，不可轻泄。 上干玄律，宜谨珍藏。 凡书火府中符，皆用闭炁书。 如治大祟，加三字： 。 仍书雷令速行，风火雷令。 雷火救令，火急雷令。 赤天皇有令。 雷师祖令，云雾雷令。 □漱虚。 □□□。 □灵暗。 后用火府大赤天帝敕盖。 三天檄中，灵宝、神宝二檄式并同。 天宝檄只换符及秘字车字一边者。 若用三天檄，须奏大赤天帝，或神霄，或申太乙主法祝元君，方可行。 自神宝起，次灵宝，次天宝，三次。 行重大则用。 不可轻用矣。

chunks.original_text: 家书式。 具位嗣教第几代孙某，稽首顿首百拜，上申祖师中天枢相伏魔许真君师前。 祖师清隐先生披云杨真人师前。 某不避斧诛，僭陈丹悃。 谨据乡贯某人入意丐为救治事。 某领词虔恪，除已给符行移外，未敢擅便，特具家书上呈。 恭望师慈，俯垂省览。 乞为誊奏上玄，请降敕旨，颁下三界真司，掌隶灾祥去处，及岳府城隍曹治，赦宥抱患某，夙生今世故误罪尤，咸祈冰释。 仍冀差降太乙火府十二员大天将，会合某靖帅将，合部官君，应时下赴词家，监同司命土地正神，挨究某患因，收摄行祸邪鬼，押赴雷狱，阴行拷问，勒收病炁，追还生魂，按律断遣施行。 或有伏连，亦与开化，务令和释。 收摄伏连之炁，发赴生方。 专为抱患某，上消天灾，下禳地祸，弭散瘟疫，迎集祯祥。 仍丐流布正炁，灌注身田，即俾某六脉调和，百关通畅，服药有效，见患痊安，寿命增延，永膺吉庆。 如蒙俞允，实拜生成。 干冒师严，某下情无任战栗，祈恩伺命之至。 谨状。 太岁年月日具位嗣教第几代孙某上申。 角封面式 家　书　百　拜　上　申 具位嗣教第几代孙某谨封 祖师伏魔枢相许真君师前 角封背式 太岁　年　月　日家书於某处拜上 家书关 太乙火府分司。 本司今发家书一封，谨上诣 祖师中天枢相伏魔许真君门下，请 进须至关发者。 右关 直符谢某，雷神纪某，只今赍捧家书，上 诣师庭，分明请进，云程有限，立伺感通。 故关。 太岁　年　月　日　时关。 具位　姓某押。 上家书秘旨

**Personal Petition in Epistolary Form**

Your disciple, [Surname] [Given Name], humbly styled *Successor of the Teachings, [X]th-Generation Descendant*, prostrates with a hundred bows to reverently address:

**Ancestral Master, Heavenly Pivot, Demon-Quelling Perfected Lord Xu**,
**Master of the Central Axis of Heaven**;
**Ancestral Master, Pure Recluse, Cloud-Splitting Yang the Perfected**,

before whose presence this unworthy one dares not shrink from the axe of presumption, yet ventures to lay bare the sincerity of his cinnabar heart.

With due reverence, I submit this petition on behalf of [Name of Supplicant] of [Native Place], who humbly beseeches healing and deliverance. Having already issued talismans and dispatched missives in accordance with the rites, I dare not act further without authorization and thus present this personal petition for Your Eminence’s gracious perusal.

I most earnestly implore Your Merciful Wisdom to deign to memorialize the Supreme Mystery, beseeching the issuance of a sacred edict to be proclaimed throughout the Three Realms’ true bureaus—those governing the dispensation of calamity and fortune, as well as the courts of the Sacred Peaks, City Gods, and Earthly Magistracies—granting amnesty to [Name of Afflicted], whose transgressions, whether from past lives or present errors, may now be wholly dissolved like melting ice.

Furthermore, I humbly pray for the dispatch of the **Twelve Great Heavenly Generals of the Supreme Unity Fire Palace**, to convene with the [Name of Supplicant]’s **Pacifying Marshal’s Host**, the assembled **Officials and Lords**, and descend without delay to the petitioner’s household. There, in concert with the **Director of Destinies** and the **Local Earth Gods**, they shall investigate the cause of the affliction, apprehend the malevolent spirits perpetrating harm, and escort them to the **Thunder Prisons** for interrogation in the unseen realm. They shall compel the extraction of the **disease-qi**, recover and restore the **living hun-soul**, and execute judgment in accordance with the statutes.

Should any lingering or connected spirits be found, they too shall be enlightened and released, ensuring complete harmony and liberation. The **qi** of all subdued and connected spirits shall be dispatched to the **Realm of Generation**.

This petition is dedicated to [Name of Afflicted], that:
- **Heavenly disasters** be averted above,
- **Earthly misfortunes** be dispelled below,
- **Pestilence** be quelled and dispersed,
- **Auspicious omens** be summoned and gathered.

Moreover, I beseech the diffusion of **orthodox qi** to irrigate the **fields of the body**, that [Name of Afflicted]’s:
- **Six pulses** be harmonized,
- **Hundred passages** flow unimpeded,
- **Medicines** take effect,
- **Afflictions** be cured and peace restored,
- **Lifespan** be extended,
- **Fortune** be perpetually secured.

Should this plea be granted, I shall owe my very existence to Your Grace. Daring to trespass upon Your august authority, I remain, with trembling reverence, awaiting Your merciful command.

Respectfully submitted.

**In the [X]th year of the Great Era, [Month], [Day]**
*Your disciple, [Surname] [Given Name], Successor of the Teachings, [X]th-Generation Descendant*

chunks.original_text: 三净如常，师闭目，存神，两手剑诀叉腰，仰面变神，为元命真人。 咒曰： 北帝钦轮，速变吾身。 击卓三下宝香一炷，十方肃清。 法鼓三通，万神咸集。 太乙火府，雷霆都司。 焚香关召某靖当番直日，受事功曹。 闻今关召，疾速赴坛。 疾。 杳杳冥冥，天地同生。 散而成炁，聚而成形。 闻呼即至，闻召即临。 以今资此信香，关召直符谢佑、白伸、纪茂卿，立赴坛前，有事指挥。 疾。 如意祭遣拜发家书。 祖师披云拜家书召遣奥妙 师左手辰文，抚心，右手戌文，掩肾。 左仰右覆。 闭目，微开，吸取巽官火炁，咽下丹田。 存运水火交接心肾，至尾间夹脊，二炁交合於绛官，心存火光迸出，谢大将在目前。 即念咒曰： 唵。
chunks.translated_text:
**Ritual of the Threefold Purity**

As customary, the Master closes his eyes, collects his spirit, and assumes the *sword mudra* with both hands at his waist. Lifting his gaze, he transforms his spirit, becoming the **Perfected One of Original Destiny**.

The incantation is spoken:
*"By the Wheel of the Northern Emperor, swiftly transform this body."*

Three strikes upon the table, a single stick of precious incense offered—
the Ten Directions grow solemn and clear.
Three rolls of the ritual drum—
the myriad spirits assemble in full.

**Fire Palace of the Supreme Unity, Thunder Bureau of the Capital.**
Burning incense, the summons is issued to the appointed *jing*-shrine on duty this day, and to the **Merit-Recording Attendant**.
*"Hear now this summons—hasten to the altar without delay!"*

Swiftly!
*"Vast and obscure, dark and profound,
Heaven and Earth share the same origin.
Scattered, they form qi;
gathered, they take shape.
At the call, instantly arrive;
at the summons, instantly appear."*

By this offering of true incense, the summons is issued to **Direct Talisman-Officer Xie You, Bai Shen, and Ji Maoqing**—
*"Present yourselves before the altar at once to receive orders!"*

Swiftly!
The *ruyi* ritual is performed, the petition dispatched.

**The Ancestral Master parts the clouds to receive the petition, summoning forth its profound mysteries.**

The Master’s left hand forms the *chen* trigram, resting upon his heart;
his right hand forms the *xu* trigram, covering his kidneys.
Left raised, right lowered.
Eyes closed, then slightly opened—
he draws in the **fire-qi of the Xun Palace**, swallowing it into his cinnabar field.
He visualizes the **Water and Fire uniting**, heart and kidneys joined,
ascending from the *weilu* to the spine, the **two qi merging in the Crimson Palace**.
His heart holds the blazing fire, and before him appears **Marshal Xie**.

Then he recites the incantation:
*"Oṃ."*

chunks.original_text: 上奏三天，下摄岳渎。 总领雷兵，祈雨则云掌持符箓。 驾雨驱风，覃恩赐福。 嗣教虔恭，愿降云鹤。 祛摄则云袂摄冰卒，飞雷掣电。 驾雨追风，不正邪鬼，并照律行。 总接下文所启所愿，咸赐如言。 又咒 天丁丁，地灵灵，阴阳交合，雷部现形。 疾疾。 想自己青红白炁，聚於心官，舌拄上腭，炁出眼前火光，师已降坛，部领官将在左右。 法师设拜上茶，三进酒，默奏事意，呈家书，跪祝。 如遣将扬声咒曰： 吾奉天命，掌握符印。 佐佑雷霆，典行号令。 疾如风火法布，速若风雷。 吾令使汝，不得稍违。 坛有公文，谨当宣示。 宣关引 向来关文，已具敷宣。 请遵火令，疾速奉行。 雷部猛将，直日神兵，法水一噀，速达天廷。 吾佩大法，不得稽停。 急急如雷火律令。 雷局又念：天雷隐隐，地雷轰轰。 日月罗列，照我分明。 受命天将，不得留停。
chunks.translated_text:
To the Three Heavens above, we memorialize;
to the Five Peaks and Four Waterways below, we command.
You marshal the thunder hosts,
pray for rain and the clouds obey your talismans.
You chariot the rains and drive the winds,
bestowing profound grace and conferring blessings.
In reverent succession of the Teaching,
we pray you descend upon cloud-cranes.
To expel and seize: your sleeves summon the ice soldiers,
flying thunder wields lightning.
You chariot the rains and pursue the winds,
all deviant and perverse ghosts are illuminated and bound by the law.
All petitions and vows set forth below,
may each be granted as spoken.

Further incantation:
Heavenly *ding-ding*, earthly *ling-ling*,
yin and yang conjoin, the Thunder Department manifests form.
Swiftly, swiftly!
Visualize the azure, vermilion, and white *qi* gathering in the palace of the heart,
the tongue pressing the upper palate, *qi* issuing before the eyes as flames of fire—
the Master has descended to the altar,
with the Department’s officials and generals arrayed to left and right.
The Dharma Master offers obeisance, presents tea,
advances the wine thrice, and silently memorializes the matter at hand.
The family letter is presented; kneeling, one intones the prayer.

When dispatching the generals, proclaim the incantation aloud:
“I, by Heaven’s mandate, hold the talismans and seals.
I assist and uphold the thunder’s might, presiding over commands and decrees.
Swift as wind and fire, the Dharma spreads;
rapid as wind and thunder, my orders fly.
I command you—dare not disobey in the slightest.
The altar bears official documents; heed and proclaim them.”

Proclamation of the Summons:
“The documents of summons just now presented
have been fully declared.
Follow the Fire Decree—swiftly obey!
Fierce generals of the Thunder Department,
spirits of the day’s direct charge,
with a single spray of Dharma-water,
hasten to the Celestial Court.
I bear the Great Dharma—delay not!
Swiftly, swiftly, as the thunder-fire’s law commands!”

The Thunder Bureau further intones:
Heavenly thunder rumbles low,
earthly thunder roars aloud.
Sun and moon arrayed in ranks,
illumine me with clarity.
Heaven-appointed generals,
dare not tarry or delay!

chunks.original_text: 阴云黑黑，瑞炁森森。 电光烁烁，日月闭停。 星官收位，万象黑沉。 急急如雷霆帝君律令敕。 右符用新瓦朱书，五色纸，同雷编，斗下烧，密念前咒。 大住雨符 告斗雨下，亦用此符，黄纸朱书。 止雨开云符 敕前二符咒 当日某帅，火轮崔元帅，扫开云雾，午阳炁冲天。 未阴炁收住，巳坎官伏藏，子离宫光注。 午急急如大赤天帝火令敕。 午敕午敕午敕午敕午。 当日某帅，三天谢大将，辰照遵帝命，巳火急开通。 午罡风猛吏，子不得阻停。 如违符命，中令奏天庭。 急急如大赤天帝律令敕。 中敕中敕中敕中敕中。 火车止雨符 五火祈晴符 火电火，坤宫起。 午未出三火天火，乾宫起。 亥出一火地火，巽宫起。 午出二火三昧真火。 寅至巳午出四 右符四角火字，书了剔诀，涂添崔元师，用朱德茂、刘汉祥，去加炓字入符。 敕咒 日出卯宫，午火光炎炎。 午当日元帅，辰暂驻雨轮。 巳敢有不从，奉救玉文。 中急急如都天午大赤天帝令敕。 午出 克时住雨咒 九天雷吏，散云开雾。 卯雨输速住，巳恭遵帝位。 中北方威神，坎符吏通天。 急急如大赤天帝敕。 午午午 天雷火君，午地雷火君。 子当日某帅，辰开云卷雾。 开雾卷水，速速收尽，五方浮云。 水师火君，火师火君，卷雾速速。 急急如都天大赤天帝令敕。 午午午出 右前符红纸朱书，三道迭作一道，用前祈雨符在上，吹散阴云，差将书事意在内，用灭雨符盖，编首牒前瓦上，并可如意焚遣。 起风灭雨符 开四明符

auspicious qi stands dense.
Lightning flashes bright,
sun and moon shut still.

Swiftly, swiftly, by the Thunder Sovereign’s statutes and decree!

sweeps aside clouds and mist—
the noon yang qi surges to heaven.

the *si* Kan Palace concealed,
the *zi* Li Palace’s light poured forth.
Swiftly, swiftly, by the Great Vermilion Heavenly Emperor’s Fire Mandate!

Noon! Empower, noon! Empower, noon! Empower, noon! Empower, noon!

On this day, Marshal So-and-So,
General Xie of the Three Heavens,
the *chen* luminance obeys the Emperor’s command,
the *si* fire swiftly opens the way.

the *zi* may not obstruct or delay.
Should any defy this talismanic command,
report at once to the Celestial Court.
Swiftly, swiftly, by the Great Vermilion Heavenly Emperor’s statutes and decree!

Center! Empower, center! Empower, center! Empower, center! Empower, center!

**Fire Chariot Rain-Stopping Talisman**
**Five-Fire Prayer-for-Clear-Sky Talisman**

chunks.original_text: 嗡咤姚公战，速入泥丸。 吾奉玉帝劲摄。 唵。 吽咤腾穹隆，速入泥丸。 吾奉玉帝勑摄。 祈雨符 又 咒曰 上帝敕命，考召雷神。 角亢使者，霹雳凌空。 风伯使者，翼翰摧凶。 驱龙摄电，蒋毕运风。 吾符告下，有雨急通。 急急奉 雷霆都司律令敕。 午敕午敕午敕午。 右符卯文，东炁，雷局打下此符。 专兴云掣电用砖书，龙井水中。 行持内用 凡内炼，须要时时勤行为上。 弟子念师，师不离弟子。 我身动则有神，倏在目前。 凝神定息，念大威德咒。 见吾身中皆是雷火，丹天世界一窍中元神如已状，口念唵吽霹雳震动八门咒。 见婴兄冲至心官斗府，火光豁开，即是火界，仿髴面前。 见师随我元神至顶，见大赤天帝，心拜跪奏，乞差李祝元君及别将，皆可得旨。 则回神，念吽腾咒，仍复元室为元神。 念九炁咒一遍，呼吸炁迸，自天目出，并呵心炁。 再念唵吽吽兜术咒，不计遍数。 想念诸将皆在目前罗列，再念九炁咒一遍。 祝事毕，念小金光咒。 仍收归元室为元神，再念大威德咒助之。 召诸将秘咒 至秘不可轻易。 唵吽吽兜术梵应雷轰摄。 总敕符咒 祈晴祈雨治祟皆用，此乃太乙秘讳，不可轻泄慢易。 务猷收，皈会昌。 总万炁，入元宫。 摄。 上书催行下咒 唵啒□呵唵咈耶。 准祖师大教敕。 出神咒 唫唫皆是我，□□□□也。 是吾如意耶，唱耶昌精耶。 唫发咤奉，请镇灵洞天。 万象森罗，齐摇法鼓。 卫魂王主，八万四千身神等众，侍吾左右。 吾今识神定志，呼召身中五体真官，诸雷吏兵。 与吾飞神，遥往天阙。 奏陈事目，即达帝御。 令我所作所指。 一如所愿。

The talisman is inscribed in *mao*-script, with eastern *qi*, and struck within the Thunder Formation. For specialized use in summoning clouds and seizing lightning, write it on brick with water from a dragon well. In practice, internal refinement requires diligent and constant effort. The disciple invokes the master, and the master never leaves the disciple. When my body moves, the spirits are present—suddenly, they appear before me. Collect the spirit, settle the breath, and recite the **Great Majestic Virtue Incantation**. Visualize my body filled with thunder and fire, the Cinnabar Heaven’s realm within a single aperture—my primordial spirit in its true form. Recite the *Om Hūm* **Eight Gates Thunder-Shaking Incantation**. See the Infant Brother ascend to the Heart Palace and Dipper Mansion, where the firelight bursts open—this is the Fire Realm, vivid as if before your eyes. See the master follow my primordial spirit to the crown, where the Great Vermilion Heavenly Emperor appears. Kneel in reverence, make your petition, and request the dispatch of Li the Invocator and other generals—all may receive the imperial decree. Then return the spirit, recite the *Hūm* **Soaring Incantation**, and restore the primordial chamber to the primordial spirit. Recite the **Nine Qi Incantation** once, exhaling *qi* forcefully from the Celestial Eye while expelling heart-*qi* with a sigh. Then recite the *Om Hūm Hūm* **Dōu-Shù Incantation** without counting the repetitions. Envision the generals arrayed before you, then recite the **Nine Qi Incantation** once more. When the ritual matter is complete, recite the **Minor Golden Light Incantation**. Restore the spirit to the primordial chamber as the primordial spirit, then recite the **Great Majestic Virtue Incantation** to reinforce it.

Utmost secrecy—do not reveal lightly.
*Om Hūm Hūm Dōu-Shù Fàn Yìng Léi Hōng Shè.*

Gather the myriad *qi*, enter the Primordial Palace.

By the great teachings of the ancestral masters, I decree.

**Incantation for Exiting the Spirit**
*Jīn jīn, all are myself,*
*□□□□ indeed.*
Is this my will? Sing, *Yē Chāng Jīng Yē.*
*Jīn fā zhā fèng,* I invoke and entreat,
to guard the numinous grotto-heaven.
The ten thousand images, the forest of phenomena,

be as I wish.

chunks.original_text: 急急唵吽霹雳震动八门顺律希敕。 台光上出泥丸，爽灵速奔地户，幽精为吾传送，吾奉混元玉敕。 凡用事，须在寅时上四刻，入室，用眼观心，呵出秽炁三口，然后鼻引元始青炁入口，舌拄上腭，搅华池神水，用青炁下入丹田。 后想入两肾中间一点之内。 遂暝目，想左目为日，右目为月，阴阳二炁相交姤，下入丹田青炁之中，寂然无为，任其炁自然上升於心，后归于肾。 少顷二炁相会於黄庭，结成一团金光，如火炼金丹丸相似。 身非我有，但有五炁从五脏出，拥此一团金光，自夹脊而上至泥丸。 忽见金光裂开，有一真人，如我本相，合我为一。 少顷方想真人泥丸上出一炁，化分三清八境诸天上帝，及本法中将吏。 方随意祝白某事。 毕，寂然无为，只见一团金光，遂吸入黄庭之内。 玄妙秘之。 法海遗珠卷之五竟

**Urgent Incantation**
*Ōm Hūm! The thunderclap shakes and stirs the Eight Gates to harmonize with the celestial rhythm—Hī! By decree.*

The radiance of the platform ascends from the *Niwan*; the luminous spirit swiftly rushes to the *Dihu*. The hidden essence acts as my courier—I uphold the Jade Decree of the Primal Chaos.

For all ritual matters, one must begin at the fourth quarter of the *yin* hour. Enter the chamber, gaze inward with the eyes, and exhale three breaths of impure *qi*. Then, draw in the primordial azure *qi* of the Origin through the nose, press the tongue to the upper palate, and stir the divine water of the *Huachi*. Guide the azure *qi* downward into the *Dantian*.

Next, visualize entering the single point between the two kidneys. Close the eyes and imagine the left eye as the sun, the right as the moon. The *yin* and *yang* *qi* unite and descend into the azure *qi* of the *Dantian*. Abide in stillness, allowing the *qi* to rise naturally to the heart, then return to the kidneys.

After a moment, the two *qi* converge in the *Huangting*, coalescing into a golden orb of light, akin to a fire-forged cinnabar elixir. The body is no longer one’s own—only the five *qi* emerge from the five viscera, encircling this golden orb of light. It ascends along the spine to the *Niwan*. Suddenly, the golden light parts, revealing a true person, identical to one’s original form, merging into oneness with the self.

After a moment, visualize the true person emitting a *qi* from the *Niwan*, which divides into the Three Clarities, the Eight Realms, the myriad celestial emperors, and the marshals and clerics of this method. Then, make your petition as desired.

When finished, abide in stillness once more, beholding only the golden orb of light. Draw it back into the *Huangting*. Profound and wondrous—guard this secret.

*Dharma Ocean’s Lost Pearls, Scroll Five—End.*

These three *qi* are the ancestors of the ten thousand *qi* and the origin of the myriad spirits. Employ them to open the eight windows and activate the nine orifices. **Iron**　**Loss**　**Swift**　**Pure**　**Sweep**　**Jade Emperor’s Decree**
Inscribe this text and there is no need for talismans or subsequent summons; use the summons and there is no need for the decree.

**Decree Summons Talisman**
For all talisman-inscribing, first recite the incantation:
*"Heaven clarifies, earth purifies, the Three Lights shine as one.
Cinnabar heavens radiate, the Five Talismans unite in numinosity.
The Primordial Beginning issues its command, summoning [the spirits] to descend before the imperial court.
Swiftly, swiftly, by the order of the Jade Emperor’s decree!"*

*"Within the Mysterious Chamber, on the Central Mound, virtue shines forth—by law and command!"*

After the incantation, visualize the two Great Primordial Masters, Luo Hui and Jing Yao, bearing banners and staffs, clad in vermilion robes with voluminous sleeves, riding purple clouds to the altar. Inhale *qi* once, exhale onto the paper and brush, then inscribe the talisman.

**Primordial Beginning’s Single *Qi***
*"Celestial Origin blends with the Undifferentiated—
The Five Viscera and Five Palaces, the dual *qi* intertwine.
The myriad forms circulate—
Transforming shapes, Heaven’s Domain encompasses all.
The net of Heaven and Earth weeps ghosts and mourns spirits,
Seizing and binding drought-demons, shattering temples, dispelling misfortune.
Swiftly, swiftly, by the law and command of the Divine Empyrean Sovereign!"*

Direct a single *qi* into the talisman, inscribing the eight talismans of the four deities: Cui Ziwen, Shi Guizhang, Jade Clarity’s Jade Maiden Xuan Feiying, and the Celestial Lad Luo Qingyang.

Recite the incantation again:
*"By the Emperor’s decree, the host of spirits is summoned.
Crushing mountains, toppling peaks, thunderclaps strike with terror.
Dragon-spirits swiftly assemble, hurling fire and ringing bells.
The fourfold command converges—who dares not attend?
Defy the talisman, resist the decree, and face celestial punishment.
All follows the law and command of the Jade Clarity True King!"*

**Dusk’s Array of Constellations Talisman**
*"In the Great Beginning’s chaos, the Supreme Ultimate’s obscurity,
The Primordial Simplicity established, the Two Modes encircled.
Forms unite, Three and Five interweave, Four and Seven traverse—
The luminous Three-Five Generals,
Before the peaks, twelve phrases—
Dark spirits arrive at thunder’s roar.
Each phrase is intoned once, each stroke is traced once.
The Lord of All Heaven’s Thunder, the Thunder that Shakes the Wind,
Azure Thunder’s red *qi* stirs, pressing the Nine Palaces.
Crimson Thunder’s white *qi* ascends, roaming the Mysterious Vault.
Yellow Thunder’s green *qi* thunders across the empty sky.
Black Thunder’s yellow *qi* fills the Supreme Ultimate’s origin.
White Thunder’s black *qi* descends, roaming the Dark Feng.
The Fire of Heaven’s Thunder blazes, the crimson wind—
What spirit does not submit? What ghost does not obey?
The Black Calendar of the Northern Numinosity, the Nine Uglies’ Purple Lads,
Wind Earls and Rain Masters drive thunder, drinking rainbows.
The moment this divine talisman arrives, myriad ghosts vanish without trace.
Swiftly, swiftly, by the Jade Emperor’s decree!"*

**Supreme Clarity’s Mysterious Vault, Heaven-Supporting, Mist-Embracing Great General**
*"Wei Xiongfei, now drive the thunder swiftly forth!"*

**Supreme Clarity’s Mysterious Vault, Lightning-Bearing, Thunder-Soaring [General]**
*"Zhang Hongke, now drive the thunder swiftly forth!"*

Visualize the two generals in golden armor, green-faced:
Wei, one hand forming the Dipper seal, the other wielding a sword;
Zhang, one hand supporting a mountain, the other holding a sword,
with lightning flashing forth from beneath the mountain.

**Decree Incantation**
*"The Dao Lord transforms and operates, the Xiang River’s stars align."*

chunks.original_text: 君毋东覆，都师应灵。 众星摧伏，九胜台光。 河都洛瑞，九空变迁。 虎鞭威摄，福德总权。 从事催度，太始命传。 都雷奉敕，受命先天。 急急如道祖元阳至尊律令。 师曰：此十二位，乃雷霆六合内座总星灵官仙吏，天罡炁冲，随月将对取，应干符皆用此炁加之。 三皇九星真檄符 凡建坛三日无，应当用此符。 作用存肾 水上升 书符咒 九炁丹元之炁，助吾之目。 五方五老正炁，助吾之腹。 风云雨电，为吾驱逐。 元皇真炁，周流天地之轴。 风车雷车火车，驱起潜龙隐蜃，社令之属。 上升风输，中发水轮，下发火轮，焰焰烈风，摧山倒木，雷火前奔，后驾地轴。 敢有违慢，摄赴天狱。 急急如都天大圣律令敕。 两手雷局，运风雷火车，自两耳而出o 遣檄咒 威令发天庭，付与威令兵。 都天欻火将，蛮雷奉命行。 敢有不顺者，酆都灭汝形。 元皇有此令，闻令急须听。 三界鬼神祇，咸皆禀吾令。 不得违时刻，吾在坛前，立待报应。 疾。 两手雷局，自腰勒至两耳，喝遣，立有报应。 口授玄妙，作用五方之炁。 念咒： 唵摄馘那，五方五雷。 唵。 风火叉罗，鸠罗闪鸠。 陀昊猛黄，荆钊振宗。 火急变神，风雨大作。 甘。 右雷局，存神入符，风雷火车黑云自耳出。 流金火铃符 此符实雷中之玄机，受持者每日念集灵召雷洞章，专领三十六部神霄火吏，保举成功，修炼升仙，殄灭妖氛。 朱书，吞服，三界雷神稽首。 乃天真之魂，上圣之威。 书符，取东南巽炁入符。 诵洞章咒十四遍，取东南炁入，加金光咒灵书。 勤而行之，雷神自然通灵，升仙之道乃得矣。 回鸾真符 墨书，破水穴，加后咒。 咒曰 六丙之精，六庚之精，太乙所治，主兴黑云。 风伯前导，雨师后巡，天帝有令，使召汝形。 不得违令，如上逆清。 急急如律令。

"Let the Lord not turn eastward in vain; the Capital Master responds to the numinous.
All stars submit and yield; the Nine Victories Terrace shines.
The Yellow River’s Capital and Luo’s auspices transform through the Nine Caverns.
The tiger’s whip commands awe; fortune and virtue hold total authority.
Proceed with urgency to deliver the decree; the Great Beginning’s mandate is transmitted.
The Capital Thunder obeys the edict, receiving its charge from Prior Heaven.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Dao’s Ancestor, the Primordial Yang’s Most Honored Law commands!"

The Master says: "These twelve positions are the Thunder’s Six Directions’ Seat, the Assembly of Star Numinous Officials and Immortals, the Celestial Stem qi surging forth. Align them with the monthly generals and corresponding stems; all talismans employ this qi to empower them."

**Three Sovereigns’ Nine Stars True Summons Talisman**
For all altar constructions of three days or fewer, this talisman must be used.
*In application, visualize the kidneys’ water ascending.*
Write the talisman and recite the incantation:
*"The Nine Qi’s Cinnabar Prime qi assists my eyes.
The Five Directions’ Five Elders’ true qi assists my abdomen.
Wind, clouds, rain, and lightning drive and expel for me.
The Primordial August’s true qi circulates through the axis of Heaven and Earth.
Wind chariots, thunder chariots, fire chariots—
rouse the hidden dragons and concealed serpents, the earth spirits’ kindred.
Above, ascend the wind hub; at center, activate the water wheel;
below, ignite the fire wheel—
flames and raging winds topple mountains and uproot trees.
Thunder and fire charge ahead; the earth’s axis follows behind.
Dare any defy or delay? They shall be seized and sent to Heaven’s prison.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Capital Heaven’s Great Sage’s Law commands!"*

Form the Thunder Mudra with both hands, conjure the wind-thunder-fire chariots, and send them forth from both ears.

**Summons Dispatch Incantation**
*"Might issues from the Heavenly Court; I entrust it to the mighty command troops.
The Capital Heaven’s Swift-Fire General and the Barbarian Thunder obey the mandate.
Dare any disobey? Fengdu shall annihilate your form.
The Primordial August issues this decree—
hear the command and swiftly obey!
All gods and spirits of the Three Realms
shall universally heed my order.
Do not transgress the appointed hour.
I stand before the altar, awaiting immediate response.
Hasten!"*

Form the Thunder Mudra with both hands, draw from the waist to both ears, and shout the dispatch—response shall be instantaneous.

**Oral Transmission of the Mysterious Wondrous: Employing the Five Directions’ Qi**
Recite the incantation:
*"Om! Seize and sever! The Five Directions’ Five Thunders!
Om! Wind-Fire Chaluo, Jiuluo Shanjou!
Tuohao Meng Huang, Jing Zhao Zhen Zong!
Transform swiftly into spirits; let wind and rain rage!
Gan!"*

For the right Thunder Mudra, visualize the spirit entering the talisman as wind-thunder-fire chariots and black clouds emerge from the ears.

**Flowing Gold Fire Bell Talisman**
This talisman embodies the profound mechanism within thunder. Those who receive and uphold it shall daily recite the *Gathering Spirits and Summoning Thunder Grotto Chapter*, commanding the thirty-six divisions of Divine Empyrean fire officials to ensure success, ascension to immortality, and the eradication of demonic miasmas.
Write in cinnabar and ingest; the thunder gods of the Three Realms shall bow in reverence.
It is the soul of Heaven’s Perfected, the might of the Supreme Sages.
Write the talisman, drawing the southeast Xun qi into it.
Recite the *Grotto Chapter* incantation fourteen times, drawing in the southeast qi, and augment it with the Golden Light Incantation’s numinous script.
Practice diligently, and the thunder gods shall naturally commune with the spirit—thus shall the Dao of immortal ascension be attained.

**Returning Phoenix True Talisman**
Write in ink, break the water cavity, and add the following incantation:
*"The essence of the Six Bing, the essence of the Six Geng,
governed by the Great Monad, commands the rising of black clouds.
The Wind Earl leads; the Rain Master patrols behind.
The Heavenly Emperor decrees—
I summon your form!
Do not disobey the command, lest you rebel against the pure.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Law commands!"*

Swift fire, by law’s command, overturns the vault of heaven,

Red roosters, purple geese fly without end,

By decree of the Purple Void’s Primordial Lady, descend and seize.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Fire Bell Marshal’s law commands!

Upon completing the right talisman, recite *Oṃ Hūṃ Hūṃ*, the *Incantation of the Prostrating Deities*, the *Fire Bell Incantation*, and command it. Add the character *she* (攝) within. For head and eye pain, draw the brush outward from *Xun*. If the ailment lies in the lower body, direct the brush downward. For boils and toxins, apply directly to the afflicted area. Recite:

**The Most High Slays the Crimson Toxin and Seizes It**
Nine times.
**True Form Talisman of Tianpeng**
The *Northern Qi Slaying Script* enters the talisman; it may be fumigated, ingested, or applied as an amulet.
*Oṃ Śa □□ Kha Hūṃ.*
Seven times.
□□ *Pi Xing Oṃ Cha □ Hūṃ Tu Svāhā.*
Seven times. Spread the *Northern Qi* to form the talisman.

For the talisman placed beneath a ghost, add the two characters *Tianpeng* and apply the *Ghost-Searing Incantation*. When used to create a *Fire Prison*, it is also effective to recite the *Tianpeng Augmented Phrase Incantation* and command it with the *Ghost-Searing Incantation*.

**Tianpeng Augmented Phrase Incantation**
Tianpeng, Tianpeng,
Nine Primal Slaying Lads.
Heaven’s Barrier, Earth’s Axis,
held within my palm.
Five Ding Commanders,
Lofty Blade, Northern Elder.
Seven Governors, Eight Spirits,
the Most High subdues the fierce.
Long-skulled, giant-beast,
hand grasping the Emperor’s Bell.
White Owl, Three Spirits,
sternly driving Kui Dragons.
Mighty Sword Spirit-King,
slaying the wayward, erasing traces.
Purple *qi* ascends the heavens,
crimson clouds surge forth.
Devouring demons, consuming ghosts,
body bared to drink the wind.
Azure tongue, green teeth,
Four-Eyed Old Man.
Heavenly Ding Warriors,
might from the south repelling the fierce.
Heavenly Couriers, Armored Soldiers,
might from the north bearing the wind.
Divine Officials, Jade Maidens,
Iron-Footed Spirit-King.
Deaf and Mute Generals,
running hounds, flying hawks.
Three hundred thousand troops,
guarding my ninefold layers.
Expelling corpses a thousand *li*,
dispelling all misfortune.
Should any petty ghost
dare approach to witness this,
the Heaven-Splitting Great Axe
shall sever the five forms of ghosts.
Flame Emperor’s scorching blood,
Northern Dipper burns the bones.
Four Brightnesses shatter the remains,
Heavenly Strategy annihilates the kind.
With one stroke of the divine blade,
ten thousand ghosts scatter.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the *Marshal of Tianpeng, Commander of the Primal Qi* commands!

**Yellow Spirit Yue Zhang Great Black Slaying Talisman**
Open the Gate of Heaven, close the Door of Earth, leave the Gate of Man;
seal the ghost’s path, pierce the ghost’s heart, rupture the ghost’s belly.
One turn: Six Spirits conceal.
Two turns: Four Slayings vanish.
Three turns: *Kui Gang* stirs.
Four turns: Thunderfire erupts.
Five turns: Thunderclap shakes.
Six turns: Mountain ghosts perish.
Seven turns: Capture, decapitate, sever feet.
Seventy-five kinds of heaven-defying, earth-rebelling,
all calamitous demons, plaguing disasters,
sickly ghosts, Three Realms’ malevolent toxins,
life-severing ghosts—consign them all beneath *Kui Gang*.
Let there be no movement, no action.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the statutes command!

*Oṃ Red Emperor, Wheel of Seizing, Svāhā.*
*Oṃ Va □ Ra. □ Svāhā.*
*Oṃ Va Ma Ra □ Ra Svāhā.*
Each seven times.

**Northern Dipper Seven Stars, Great Deities of the Central Heaven**
Ascending to the Golden Palace, descending to cover Kunlun.
Regulating the cosmic order, governing the *qi* of Heaven and Earth.
Great *Kui*: *Tan Lang*, *Ju Men*, *Lu Cun*,
*Wen Qu*, *Lian Zhen*, *Wu Qu*, *Po Jun*.
Exalted Jade Emperor, Purple Tenuity Sovereign Lord,
encompassing the great celestial realm, entering the finest dust—
what disaster cannot be extinguished? What blessing cannot be attained?
Primal Sovereign’s true *qi* comes to merge with my body.
Where *Tian Gang* points, day and night it revolves.
Common folk, petty men,
those who cultivate the Dao and seek the numinous,
wishing to behold the honored form,
shall forever preserve long life.
Three Terraces’ *Xu Jing*, Six Purities’ *Qu Sheng*—
they give me life, nourish me, protect my body.
(Seven times.)

chunks.original_text: 天火地火雷火摄 再面巽方，念咒曰： 都天大雷公，亥霹雳震虚空。 子刀兵三十万，丑炎赫紫洞中。 寅若有不伏者，卯严令辄不容。 辰摄赴魁罡下，巳永为清静风。 午文剔出，却入。 燮。 谨请欻火律令大神邓伯温。 次念律令大神，风火之尊。 双膊巨翅，飞游乾坤。 斩妖吞孽，缚鬼收魂。 致雨倏忽，作晴顷分。 撒风掷火，作水团云。 持上帝敕，主火雷君。 霹雳一发，万鬼灭踪。 雷公电母，黑暗惊奔。 随咒所降，速离巽宫。 急急如都天大雷火律令。 存大神来，剔欻火觜，打入符。 用二　斗罩，想斗光罩符，后加雷令於上。 护奏需服镇贴，皆可。 雷霆霹雳银牙猛吏判官辛天君大法 召咒 雷霆猛吏，号曰汉臣。 眼光耀目，锋齿如银。 驱雷掣电，走火行云。 飞行金阙，威震万灵。 闻召即至，速出巽门。 急急如玉清真王律令。 又咒 轰轰震雷，四山崩摧。 青华上相，职掌神雷。 铁笔神书，火焰相随。 号赫逆险，紏察凶魁。 掌领甘泽，敕判天雷。 赤髭朱发，翠服烟帏。 目闪电光，牙利铁锥。 迅速察遍，世界周围。 玉帝敕命，辅佐行持。 吾令召汝，不得稽迟。 谨请雷霆猛吏辛汉臣，速降坛中。 急急如律令敕。 翼宿之精，六庚之灵。 作为黑炁，随风所生。 雷帅往来，知汝姓名。 如我所愿，出於太清。 急急如北帝灵君敕。 梵音咒 唵。 吽喗哩疾疾，哩吽喗速至。 唵吽吽俱嚧敕。 唵。 □哒嘙咛哩喗咤咭哩。 辛汉臣速降。 唵。 吽吽啼勑。 吽吽啼勑摄□嚧勑。 速现真形。 疾速吽咤喗哩呢□啰哩吽敕。 咤哩嚤呢娑诃。 存至

Heavenly Fire, Earthly Fire, Thunder Fire—seize and bind!

Turn to the *Xun* direction and intone the incantation:

Great Thunder of All Heaven,
*Hai*’s thunderclap shakes the void.
*Zi*’s blades number three hundred thousand,
*Chou*’s flames blaze crimson through the cavernous depths.
*Yin*—should any resist,
*Mao*—stern commands brook no defiance.
*Chen*—seize and deliver them beneath the *Kui Gang*,
*Si*—to be forever the winds of purity.
*Wu*—the civil writ issues forth, then withdraws.
*Xie*.

Reverently invoke the Swift Fire Decree’s great spirit, Deng Bowen.

Next, summon the Decree’s great spirit, sovereign of wind and fire.
With mighty wings spanning both arms, he soars through Heaven and Earth.
He slays demons, devours calamities, binds ghosts, and captures souls.
Rain arrives in an instant; skies clear in a moment.
He scatters wind, hurls fire, conjures water, and gathers clouds.
Holding the Supreme Emperor’s decree, he governs the Fire and Thunder Lords.
One thunderclap—ten thousand ghosts vanish without trace.
Thunder Lords and Lightning Mothers flee in terror through the dark.
As the incantation descends, swiftly depart from the *Xun* Palace.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Great Heavenly Thunder and Fire Decree commands!

Visualize the great spirit’s arrival, his swift-fire beak striking the talisman.
Use two *dou* to cover it; envision the *dou*’s light enveloping the talisman, then place the Thunder Decree above.
For memorials and petitions, wear the talisman as protection or affix it as a seal—all are permissible.

**Great Law of the Thunderclap, Lightning, Silver-Fanged Mighty Officers, Judges, and Xin the Heavenly Lord**

**Summoning Incantation**
Mighty officers of thunder,
known as Han’s Ministers.
Eyes blazing with radiance, fangs sharp as silver.
They drive thunder, wield lightning, race fire, and ride clouds.
Soaring through the Golden Gates, their might shakes the ten thousand spirits.
At the call, they arrive instantly—swiftly emerge from the *Xun* Gate!
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Jade Pure True King’s Decree commands!

**Another Incantation**
Rumbling thunder shakes the earth—four mountains crumble!
Green Florescence’s High Minister, overseer of divine thunder.
With iron brush and spirit-script, flames follow in their wake.
Their fame resounds through perilous realms; they expose and punish the wicked.
They govern sweet rains and decree the judgment of Heaven’s thunder.
Red beards, crimson hair, emerald robes draped in misty veils.
Eyes flash like lightning; teeth sharp as iron awls.
Swiftly they survey all, circling the world entire.
By the Jade Emperor’s decree, they assist in the work at hand.
I command your presence—delay not!
Reverently invoke the Thunderclap’s mighty officer, Xin Hanchen, to swiftly descend upon the altar.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Decree commands!

**Spirit of the *Yi* Constellation, numen of the Six *Geng* Stems—**
manifest as black *qi*, born wherever the wind blows.
Thunder marshals come and go, knowing your name.
As I will, emerge from the Great Clarity!
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Northern Emperor’s Numinous Lord decrees!

**Sanskrit Incantation**
*Om. Hūṃ hūṃ li cici, li hūṃ hūṃ siddham āgaccha. Om hūṃ hūṃ ku lu ccha. Om. □ da po niṃ li hūṃ ca ki li. Xin Hanchen, swiftly descend! Om. Hūṃ hūṃ ti ccha. Hūṃ hūṃ ti ccha—seize and bind! □ lu ccha. Swiftly manifest your true form! Swiftly, swiftly—hūṃ ca hūṃ li ni □ ra li hūṃ ccha! Ca li ma ni svāhā.*

Visualize his arrival.

chunks.original_text: 辛天君符 混天帝出万劫保生 驱雷掣电出岳摧倾 星斗昏暗 万邪又咒　震天地移山岳发五雷斩　灭形曰　鬼神五雷使者听察大神巡游天下擒捉为祸鬼神缚送北酆急急如律令 　阳斗子午 　阴斗寅午 从丑起每句一掐巡十二宫至子剔午上　　出念网咒 银牙耀目，照败天魔。 三界下道，辄敢上过。 上张铁网，下布金罗。 妖龙急缚，邪鬼须科。 若违上令，负石填河。 押送北酆，永劫沉痾。 急急如律令。 次念前梵音咒，涂网。 又念心咒： 赤天龙洞，巍峨铁城。 奔腾猛吏，真讳灵。 遍体流火，叱咤雷霆。 荡霾扫翳，致雨兴云。 诛邪伐恶，毋辄容情。 左华右极，主录天刑。 神霄有令，准令先行。 掣电灵姬，当赴巽门。 先施电耀，后掣雷轰。 普天降丑，无有逃形。 急急如雷祖上帝律令勑。 真咒 唵。

chunks.original_text: 吽吽俱卢勑。 嘲哒吽吽咭哩婆咛哩咭哩吽咤嚩啰。 速降临敕摄。 右符迭篆秘五雷猛史姓某某事意，奉上帝敕，急急奉行。 念真王口敕。 誓章 雷霆猛吏神，威震九天庭。 出入三界内，忠勤佐帝君。 拥身千万丈，号为雷部尊。 统领诸雷部，风伯雨师神。 霹雳电光母，大力夜叉群。 汝若受持者，吾当速现形。 遣吾上天界，朝奏谒帝君，遣吾入地府，直至阴府中。 遣吾入水府，直至扶桑宫。 遣吾捉妖精，摧碎诸鬼营。 若违天律者，九祖受毒刑。 吾若负汝者，天上日月昏。 地下泉源竭，草木俱不生。 永为幽冥鬼，不能朝上清。 壬癸吾降日，受持当精勤。 净荼枣汤献，桃木香上焚。 吾在左右现，安心不得惊。 共汝发弘愿，立誓救众生。 吾奉玉皇上帝敕。 十字咒 唵。 吙哩吽咤婆诃敕。 再念玉清真王上帝敕。 双雷局，遣去。 再念： 吾奉帝敕，当灭鬼神。 天地昏暗，日月昏沉。 邪精鬼贼，无路逃奔。 火急绝灭，信受奉行。 急急如律令。 合神 先存巽户雷城，火云火光万丈。 兆目虚书帝勑二字，飞入雷城中。 辛君见二字，驾火云万丈，云雷电雹部领，雷公电母，风伯雨师，五方蛮雷使者，雷兵万众，乘火云火光风云电雹，自雷城中出降目前。 次存胆官青炁，化生辛君在内，自泥九官出，与外合而为一，中炁罩定，兆任祝事意，分付如何报应。 次存入符，如合神，仍吸肝炁，自泥九入胆官，当时作用，念伏雷炁咒七遍。 咒曰 吾受五雷妙法，电母威声，纳则保身养命，出则缚鬼吞精。 辟除身中万毒，百姓同得活形。 吾今驱使五雷之将，六甲六丁，斩断百鬼，吸出千精，真炁万道，灌我胃华，太上律令，猛吏银牙，急急如律令。 咒毕，存天君乘火光万丈入胆官。 次存青炁入胆中，电光雷声俱入胆中。 次存东方青炁九道入肝，南方红炁三道入心，西方白炁七道入肺，北方黑炁五道入肾，中央黄炁一道入脾中。 念前都天大雷公咒，顶礼而止。 遣符咒 神雷威猛，震动乾坤。 三元七政，九幽八灵。 狼牙猛吏，流金火铃。 玉晨上仙，六通灵君。 啖雷飞黑，翻海收云。 发罡起斗，伐恶斩精。 五雷铁面，破阵将军。 黑面狼牙，火山火盆。 流金万里，霹雳高奔。 玉枢勑令，大洞将军。 撼山集云，破魔伏神。 上帝敕下，火急奉行。 急急如雷祖上帝律令敕。 变用秘咒 唵。 啼咤□□勑煞摄。 玉帝赐辛君号符 □□□□□□□。 唵哒哪□吽咭哩摄。
chunks.translated_text:
**Hūm Hūm Kūlú Decree.**
*Chāodā hōng hūm jīlī pónínglī jīlī hōng zhà póló.*
Swiftly descend and seize by decree.

The right talisman, inscribed in overlapping seal script, is the secret of the Five Thunder Fierce Scribes—bearing the surnames of such-and-such, for such-and-such purpose. By the Emperor’s decree, hasten to act without delay.

Recite the True King’s Oral Decree:

**Oath-Chapter**
Spirits of fierce thunder, might shaking the Nine Celestial Courts,
Moving within the Three Realms, loyal and diligent aides to the Imperial Lord.
Encased in a body of ten thousand fathoms, known as the honored ones of the Thunder Division.
Commanding all thunder spirits, Wind Earls, Rain Masters,
Mothers of lightning and thunder, and the mighty Yakṣa hosts.
If you who receive and uphold this,
I shall swiftly manifest my form.
I dispatch you to the celestial realms to present tribute and audience before the Imperial Lord;
I dispatch you to the earthly prisons to reach the depths of the Nether Courts;
I dispatch you to the watery palaces to arrive at the Fusang Palace.
I dispatch you to seize demonic essences and shatter the encampments of ghosts.
Should any violate the celestial laws, nine generations shall suffer poisonous punishments.
If I betray you, may the sun and moon in the heavens darken,
May the springs beneath the earth dry up, may grasses and trees cease to grow.
Forever bound as a ghost of the dark netherworld, unable to ascend to the Supreme Clarity.
On the days of *rén* and *guǐ*, I descend—those who uphold this must be diligent.
Offer pure tea and jujube broth, burn peachwood incense.
I shall manifest at your left and right—calm your heart, do not fear.
Together, let us vow to save all beings.
I act by the decree of the Jade Emperor.

**Ten-Character Incantation**
*Oṃ. Huōlī hōng zhà póhē chì.*

Recite again the decree of the True King of Jade Clarity.
Double Thunder Formation, dispatch them forth.

Recite again:
By the Emperor’s decree, I shall annihilate demonic spirits.
Heaven and earth darken, sun and moon dim.
Evil essences and ghostly thieves—nowhere to flee.
Swiftly eradicate them; receive and act accordingly.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Thunder Ancestor, the Emperor’s Decree commands!

**Uniting with the Spirit**
First, visualize the Thunder Citadel at the *Xun* Gate, wreathed in flames and fire-light for ten thousand fathoms.
The practitioner’s eyes should mentally inscribe the two characters "Imperial Decree," which fly into the Thunder Citadel.
Lord Xin, upon seeing these characters, mounts a fire-cloud ten thousand fathoms high, leading the hosts of thunder, lightning, hail, Thunder Lords, Lightning Mothers, Wind Earls, Rain Masters, the Five Directions’ Barbarian Thunder Envoys, and ten thousand thunder soldiers. They ride the fire-clouds, fire-light, winds, and hail, emerging from the Thunder Citadel to descend before the practitioner.

Next, visualize the *qi* of the gallbladder palace turning azure, giving birth to Lord Xin within. He emerges from the Mud Pill Palace, uniting with the external form as one. The central *qi* envelops and stabilizes, allowing the practitioner to entrust their intent and await the response.

Next, visualize the talisman’s entry. As with uniting the spirit, inhale the liver *qi*, drawing it from the Mud Pill into the gallbladder palace. Act immediately, reciting the **Subduing Thunder Qi Incantation** seven times:

**Incantation**
I receive the wondrous Five Thunder Dharma; the Lightning Mother’s mighty voice.
When drawn in, it preserves the body and nurtures life; when released, it binds ghosts and devours essences.
Expelling the myriad poisons from within the body, all beings regain their living forms.
I now command the generals of the Five Thunders, the Six *Jiǎ* and Six *Dīng*,
To sever the hundred ghosts and draw out the thousand essences.
True *qi* in ten thousand streams pours into my stomach’s blossom.
By the Supreme Decree, fierce scribes with silver fangs—
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Thunder Ancestor, the Emperor’s Decree commands!

Upon completing the incantation, visualize the Heavenly Lord riding fire-light ten thousand fathoms high entering the gallbladder palace.
Next, visualize azure *qi* entering the gallbladder, with lightning flashes and thunderous roars all converging within.
Then, visualize nine streams of eastern azure *qi* entering the liver,
Three streams of southern red *qi* entering the heart,
Seven streams of western white *qi* entering the lungs,
Five streams of northern black *qi* entering the kidneys,
And one stream of central yellow *qi* entering the spleen.
Recite the **Great Heavenly Thunder Lord Incantation** from before, prostrate in reverence, and conclude.

**Dispatching Talisman Incantation**
Mighty spirit-thunder, shaking heaven and earth.
Three Origins, Seven Governors, Nine Netherworlds, Eight Spirits.
Fierce scribes with wolf’s fangs, flowing gold and fire bells.
Jade Dawn Transcendents, Sixfold Penetrating Spirit Lords.
Thunder-devouring, darkness-flying, sea-overturning, cloud-gathering.
Releasing the *gang* and raising the Dipper, punishing evil and slaying essences.
Five Thunder Iron-Faced Generals, breaking formations.
Black-faced, wolf-fanged, fire-mountain, fire-basin.
Flowing gold for ten thousand miles, thunderbolts soaring high.
Jade Pivot Decree, Great Cavern Generals.
Shaking mountains, assembling clouds, subduing demons and spirits.
By the Emperor’s decree, act with haste.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Thunder Ancestor, the Emperor’s Decree commands!

**Secret Incantation for Transformation and Use**
*Oṃ. Tízhà [ ] [ ] chì shā shè.*
The Jade Emperor bestows upon Lord Xin the talismanic name: [ ] [ ] [ ] [ ] [ ] [ ] [ ].
*Oṃ dā nǎ [ ] hōng jīlī shè.*

chunks.original_text: 迭书唵。 吽咤哔哩。 书时以活雷局，还至于坎。 又加□□□□□□□。 又诵誓章涂。 再加横天霸。 炼神 双手雷局按肾，存金光生肾中，祖炁运上双眼，中出金光，射开巽户，见青炁，青炁中有紫炁交腾。 念召咒： 唵。 吽吽咭哩唻也娑诃。 一炁七遍。 鼻吸青炁入胆宫，与祖炁混合，在中丹田。 次以左眼光书一霐字，右眼光书一字，舌书一字，存三字青红白三色，在虚空中。 用鼻引口吸，咽下处所，五行相生了再相克，克至中央，呵出霐三字，冲上天门。 天门裂开，想见玉帝祈祷。 就此默奏，念三字三遍。 毕，见一真人手执金牌，上有号头三字。 吸出号头，吹入符中。 念秘咒七遍： 唵。 嘲□哒哪吽吽咭哩摄。

chunks.original_text: 嘻出青炁，在香炉上，化为元帅，合而为一。 念辖咒：唵。 电雷霹雳吸入胆住，再运心中五炁，上尾闾穴七节，雷局打五下，觉雷声震动，耳出作雷声，眼中电光，鼻出黑云，口中出雨，肘后黑风。 存风云雷雨电交作，烧符一道，即辛君符。 念翼宿之精，六庚之灵。 同前又念七字咒：唵。 火哩吽咤婆诃。 雷局打入巽方。 大凡祈祷，用心助主将，极应也。 再剔斗。 唵。 卯□辰喽中上咭中中哩兑娑子诃。 结局，掩耳，打出去。 五行相生相克咒 召雷助威发遣。 东方青雷，运合丙丁。 取肝青合心赤南方赤雷，运合中央。 取心赤合脾黄中央黄雷，运合西方。 取脾黄合肺白西方白雷，运合北方。 取肺白合肾黑北方黑雷，煞减南方。 存肾水上克心火南方赤雷，煞灭西方。 存心火克肺金西方白雷，煞伐东方。 肺金克肝木东方青雷，煞伐中央。 肝木克脾土中央黄雷，煞灭凶殃。 脾土克肾水五雷元帅，飞火流光。 奔震雷电，运转魁罡。 翻天覆地，震动雷风。 魁星一发，交斗辉光。 阴阳通合，霹雳声刚。 听吾号令，邪鬼灭亡。 敢有拒逆，摄赴魁罡。 巽门裂破，紫府炎光。 天神地祇，雷部兵随，阴阳交泰。 疾速奉行上帝有敕，听吾指挥。 急急如雷祖大帝律令。 辛天君信符 三清上帝敕 　玉皇上帝敕 　上元天官斩神中元地官斩精 下元水官斩鬼 　神霄律令 　疾速奉行 　欻火元帅 轰震霹雳　 山摧木折　 天地黑虚 都天雷公助霹雳 　九毒雷神助霹雳 　北方黑帝助霹 雳邪精荡灭除踪迹 敕符咒

Exhale azure *qi*, which hovers above the incense burner and transforms into a marshal, merging into one.

Recite the binding incantation:
*Oṃ. [ ] diàn léi pīlì [ ] [ ] [ ] [ ] xī rù dǎn zhù.*

Then circulate the Five *qi* within the heart, ascending through the seven joints of the *wěilǘ* cavity to the crown. Strike the thunder formation five times—perceive the thunder’s roar, ears resounding with its clamor, eyes flashing with lightning, nose exhaling black clouds, mouth issuing rain, and black winds rising behind the elbows. Envision wind, clouds, thunder, rain, and lightning intermingling. Burn one talisman—this is the Talisman of Marshal Xīn.

Invoke the essence of the Wing Mansion and the numen of the Six *gēng* Days.

Recite the seven-character incantation as before:
*Oṃ. huǒ lī hōng zhà póhē.*

Strike the thunder formation toward the *xùn* direction.

In all prayers, concentrate the mind to assist the marshal—response will be swift. Then perform the Dipper Rite:
*Oṃ. mǎo [ ] chén lóu zhōng shàng jī zhōng zhōng lī duì suō zǐ hē.*

Conclude by covering the ears and striking outward.

**Incantation of the Five Phases Engendering and Overcoming One Another**
For summoning thunder and dispatching its might:

Eastern Azure Thunder, aligned with *bǐng-dīng*—
Draw liver’s azure to merge with heart’s crimson.
Southern Crimson Thunder, aligned with the center—
Draw heart’s crimson to merge with spleen’s yellow.
Central Yellow Thunder, aligned with the west—
Draw spleen’s yellow to merge with lung’s white.
Western White Thunder, aligned with the north—
Draw lung’s white to merge with kidney’s black.
Northern Black Thunder subdues the south—
Envision kidney’s water overcoming heart’s fire.
Southern Crimson Thunder subdues the west—
Envision heart’s fire overcoming lung’s metal.
Western White Thunder subdues the east—
Lung’s metal overcomes liver’s wood.
Eastern Azure Thunder subdues the center—
Liver’s wood overcomes spleen’s earth.
Spleen’s earth overcomes kidney’s water—
The Five Thunder Marshals, flying fire and streaming light,
Rush forth in thunder and lightning, revolving the *kuí-gāng*.
Heaven overturns, earth upends, thunder and wind shake.
The *kuí*-star erupts, intersecting the Dipper’s radiance.
Yin and Yang unite, the thunderclap resounds with might.
Hear my command—perish, all malevolent spirits!
Should any dare resist, seize them to the *kuí-gāng*.
The *xùn* gate shatters, purple courts blaze with flame.
Heavenly gods and earthly deities, the Thunder Department’s troops follow—
Yin and Yang harmonize in great peace.
Swiftly obey the Celestial Edict, heed my command!

*Hasten! As the Thunder Ancestor, Great Emperor’s law decrees!*

**Talisman of Marshal Xīn, the Heavenly Lord**
*By decree of the Three Clarities’ Supreme Lord*
*By decree of the Jade Emperor*
*By decree of the Upper Prime Heavenly Official to slay spirits*
*By decree of the Middle Prime Earthly Official to slay essences*
*By decree of the Lower Prime Watery Official to slay demons*
*By the divine statutes of the Divine Empyrean—swiftly obey!*

**Marshal of Sudden Fire**
*Thunderous roar, crashing lightning—*
*Mountains crumble, trees snap—*
*Heaven and earth darken in void.*
*All-Heaven Thunder Duke aids the thunderclap,*
*The Nine Poison Thunder Gods aid the thunderclap,*
*The Northern Black Emperor aids the thunderclap—*
*Banish and eradicate all traces of malevolent essences!*

**Incantation of the Talismanic Decree**

**In the profound obscurity of the Great Unity, execute the decree as commanded.**
The fierce officials of thunder and lightning shall show no mercy.
Should any defy this august command, they shall incur the celestial punishment.

Should any dare to test this power, wind and fire shall not cease.

Recite the *Breaking Earth, Summoning Thunder Yu-Step Incantation*, one phrase per step, each step envisioning wind, clouds, thunder, rain, and lightning.

The Divine Elder receives the mandate,
The Jade Emperor summons the thunder hosts.
Yin thunder spreads across heaven and earth,
Sweet rains arise from the fertile springs.
Wind and thunder follow their release,
Clouds traverse the seas and mountains.
Wielding the halberd to veil the bright sun,
Spreading qi to shelter all living beings.
Sever the qi of demons and fiends,
The thunder hosts hasten forth in clamor.
My ruling star arrives at this place—
Issue the command, and they must obey at once!

*Swiftly, swiftly, as the statutes decree!*

**Further Incantation**
Wind stirs at the Xun gate,
Within the lungs, without the nose responds.
From the lungs, white qi emerges as mountains,
Thunder resides to the left and right—Zi script, Xun qi.

*Thunder shakes the nine heavens.*

Clouds drift through the azure vault,
Without the eyes, within the liver responds.
From the liver, green qi emerges as wind,
Thunder resides to the left and right—Zi script, Kan qi.

*Rain descends, clouds part.*

Without the mouth, within the kidneys respond,
From the kidneys, black qi emerges as water,
Thunder resides behind—Zi script, northwest qi.

*Lightning blazes fiercely, aiding my transcendence.*

*Swiftly, swiftly, as the Thunder Bureau’s statutes decree!*

Envision the fierce officials in the Crimson Palace,
From the spleen, yellow qi emerges from the crown,
Transforming into earth thunder before me.
Next, at the Gate of Heaven, golden light soars,
Yin and yang clash to open the earth’s gate.
Rotate both eyes to the right, circulate the ruling star, and recite the incantation:

**Great Emperor of Azure Radiance, Judge of the Celestial Court.**
Your majestic light descends, shaking heaven and earth.
None may defy this command—
Those who resist shall face the thunder’s writ.
Thunder Bureau’s chief officials,
Hasten forth from the Xun city!

*Swiftly, swiftly, as the thunder statutes decree!*

Recite this incantation once, then close the qi.
Rub the kidney hall with both hands, rotate the earth’s axis, and silently recite:
*"Om om, han han, bu lin bu lin, chi lin chi lin."*
*Swiftly, swiftly, swiftly!*

Envision the thunder gods emerging from the Xun palace,
Crossing the Qian palace to descend upon the altar.
Make offerings and proceed as desired.

**Five-Thunder Talisman for Curing Myriad Diseases’ Qi**
*By decree of the Supreme One*
Fierce officials with silver fangs,
Guard the true qi, purge the demonic and perverse.
Open the Gate of Heaven, close the Gate of Earth,
Seal the human door, block the demon’s path,
Pierce the demon’s heart, rupture the demon’s belly.
Metal, wood, water, fire, earth—
The qi of the baleful officials and soldiers slays and severs demonic thieves.
Transform and alter □□□□□□, Xun qi hastens the cycle of life,
Each descends with life qi—
Greed arrives, breaking yang in sequence;
Kui arrives, reversing yin in opposition.
Five-Thunder messengers, arise swiftly and apply the talisman!

**Incantation:**
I receive the true qi of the Five Thunders, the majestic light of thunder and lightning.
Entering, it protects the body and preserves life;
Exiting, it cures illness and expels evil.
Divine light in ten thousand rays bathes my stomach’s splendor.
Guard the true qi, purge the demonic and perverse.

*By decree of the Supreme One, fierce officials with silver fangs!*

If treating nausea and malaise, add a horizontal stroke within the talisman.
**Incantation:**
The Six Dings halt evil, all maladies retreat.

If treating diarrhea, add the character "mountain" (山) within the talisman.
**Incantation:**
The Six Jias and Six Dings drive the mountain swiftly downward.
*Mountain character hand seal.*

If treating loss of appetite, add the *Golden Light of Merit* beneath the two strokes.
**Incantation:**
Golden light of merit,
Gently dispels the dark and hidden.
The Flowery Pond flows with true fragrance,
Lotus canopies drift upon the clouds.
A thousand spirits, layered in primordial harmony,
Ever dwell within the twelve towers.
Hasten to proclaim the Lingbao decree,
Roam freely among mortals.

For upper diaphragm disorders, direct the brush upward.

**Five-Thunder Iron Brush Talisman**

chunks.original_text: 师曰：定中之定，可以讲东井。 静中之静，可以论黄河。 今夫人之一身，自泥九之下，十二经脉之会，即十二河源。 脐下三寸，即下丹田。 其神上升泥丸，而下润者，即是黄河之水，会于东井之胆官，至於心肝脾肺肾，嘘呵呬吹呼为五行，相生真炁。 心中运真火，肾中运真水，俱不出吾身内造化。 灵台虚廓，涵容天地，所致俨然在前，俱吾心之变化也。 大心火下降，肾水上升，自然其液流通，满口甘津香美，所谓甘露也，黄华也，上池水也，即华池流真　香造化也。 翻四溟 四溟符随其本法。
chunks.translated_text:
The Master said: In the steadfastness of steadfastness, one may discourse on the Eastern Well. In the stillness of stillness, one may expound upon the Yellow River.

Now, within the human body, from below the mud-pill palace, at the convergence of the twelve meridians—this is the source of the twelve rivers. Three inches below the navel lies the lower cinnabar field. The spirit ascends to the mud-pill, while that which descends to moisten is none other than the waters of the Yellow River, meeting at the gallbladder palace of the Eastern Well. Extending to the heart, liver, spleen, lungs, and kidneys, the exhalations *xu*, *he*, *xi*, *chui*, and *hu* constitute the five phases, engendering true qi.

Within the heart, the true fire circulates; within the kidneys, the true water circulates—both arise from the inner transformations of this body. The numinous terrace, vast and empty, embraces heaven and earth, such that all before one is but the transformation of this heart.

When the great yang heart-fire descends and the kidney-water ascends, the fluids naturally flow and circulate, filling the mouth with sweet, fragrant nectar—this is the so-called sweet dew, the yellow blossom, the upper pool’s water, the flowing true fragrance of the flower pool’s transformations.

Turn the Four Seas—let the Four Seas talismans follow their proper methods.

chunks.original_text: 九天勑命，严驾张鳞。 六龙九丑，雷令无亲。 歃血代盟，誓盟献神。 馘毒伐庙，显道明真。 持戈执戟，截水断鲸。 轻时轻似空中尘，重时重似千斤铁，白时白如天上雪，红时红似猩猩血。 雷大，雷二，雷三，雷四，雷五。 一如玉清真王律令。 啒□速降电光摄。 一拍一遍 右符念一遍，书一字。 成符，勑令雷霆咒书念五遍，出笔，极力向上。 用五雷诀，亥至巳剔，艮巽炁入。 师曰：雷霆欻火主之故，用欻火役雷五神助力，又使者督之，大抵三帅一也。 机法论 凡祈祷香於坛之五方，火猛则发怒召役雷神使者。 或怒炁，或笑声，或烹炼。 至於沃东井，翻四溟，击鼓召雷，走马起龙，爆竹发符，翻香破令，立坛近水，借炁团云，煮海牒龙，骈风驭雨者，皆使神随於机转也。 师曰：夫击鼓召雷，爆竹发符之类者，皆鼓其勇也。 立坛近水，借炁团云之类，皆假其势也。 相有说 使者不可无太乙，太乙不可无使者。 彼为使者，子即太乙。 彼为余所使，余为彼主者，是余与使者不可相无也。 余之左为雷，右为霆，开为召，闭为收，使者未尝相离也。 由其不可相离，故相有焉。 摄风云雷雨诀 以目光虚书字於左手心，两手合摩极令热，想一团金光在兆手心，削於面前，去虚书空中。 想号金色在光中，双手八卦，归子文作局，仍作怒，念八字：落现耶利咤波吽速。 两手相摩不住局，摄五事至坛，念十六字摩之。 起风诀 存巽上黑云中有鬼，面青巾绿袍，大将一员，执虎皮风袋，跨苍龙。 次想祖炁入肝中三匝，化为□□二字，金色。 嘘呬出於巽户，与大将合青红二炁。 存号中以双目注定，念唵叱咤啼当最摄。 不住。 口念嘘呬二炁合，存红青晨二号，想兆双袖为风袋，以袖招摇而引不绝。 亦念十六字咒，并喝云：霞牙商冯夷速兴。 咒毕，仍云：风雷大将速降。 团云掩日 师曰：外事俱了，用舌拄上腭，先书炓字，吞下心宫，存心斗踢翻肾水。 次用心火书日号在华池，仍书月号，如日光明。 存肾水如潮涌，水满华池，浸了日号，以赤龙搅水盈溢，浸了月号。 吸前作用水盂中水，收口中之作用，噀之立昏。 此造化口口相授，不形纸笔。 恐久失讹，今序於此。
chunks.translated_text:
Nine Heavens’ Edict Command,
sternly harness the scaled steeds.
Six Dragons and Nine Shameful Ones—
the thunder’s decree admits no kinship.
Blood-sworn pacts replace oaths,
vows offered to the spirits.
Sever venom, topple shrines,
reveal the Dao and illumine the True.
Grasp the halberd, wield the halberd,
cleave the waters and sever the whale.
At times light as dust in the void,
at times heavy as a thousand *jin* of iron;
when white, white as snow in the heavens,
when red, red as the blood of the gibbon.

Great Thunder, Second Thunder, Third Thunder,
Fourth Thunder, Fifth Thunder.
All as decreed by the Jade Purity True King’s statutes.
*Ku* □ swiftly descend with lightning’s grasp.

With each clap, recite once.
For the right talisman, recite once per character written.
Once the talisman is complete, recite the *Edict Command Thunder Incantation* five times, then lift the brush with all force upward.
Employ the Five Thunders Mudra: from *Hai* to *Si*, infuse *qi* from *Gen* and *Xun*.

The master says: The Thunder-Sudden Fire Lord governs this method. Sudden Fire commands the Five Thunder Spirits to assist, while the messenger oversees them—essentially, the Three Marshals are one.

**On the Mechanism of the Method**
For all prayers, offer incense at the altar’s five directions. Fierce fire stirs wrath to summon and dispatch the Thunder Spirit Messengers.
Whether through wrathful *qi*, laughter, or alchemical refinement—
whether dousing the Eastern Well, churning the Four Seas,
beating drums to call thunder, galloping steeds to rouse dragons,
igniting firecrackers to activate talismans, flipping incense to break commands,
erecting altars near water, borrowing *qi* to gather clouds,
petitioning dragons by boiling the sea, or harnessing wind to drive rain—
all cause spirits to follow the turning of the mechanism.

The master says: Beating drums to call thunder or igniting firecrackers to activate talismans—these stir courage.
Erecting altars near water or borrowing *qi* to gather clouds—these leverage circumstance.

**On Mutual Dependence**
The messenger cannot lack the Supreme Unity; the Supreme Unity cannot lack the messenger.
If they are the messenger, you are the Supreme Unity.
If they are dispatched by me, I am their master—thus, the messenger and I cannot be without each other.
To my left is Thunder, to my right is Lightning; opening summons, closing gathers. The messenger never departs from me.
Because they cannot be separated, mutual dependence exists.

**Method for Summoning Wind, Clouds, Thunder, and Rain**
With the gaze, inscribe the *Xu* character in the left palm. Rub both hands together until scorching hot, visualize a sphere of golden light in the palms, then sweep it before the face and inscribe the character in the void.
Imagine the golden radiance within the light. Form the Eight Trigrams with both hands, return to the *Zi* script’s configuration, assume a wrathful stance, and recite the eight characters: *Luo xian ye li zha bo hong su*.
Continuously rub the hands without pause, drawing the Five Affairs to the altar, and recite the sixteen-character incantation while rubbing.

**Method for Raising Wind**
Visualize in the *Xun* direction’s black clouds a ghost with a green face, turban, and robe, a great general holding a tiger-skin wind bag, riding a blue-green dragon.
Next, visualize the ancestral *qi* entering the liver in three coils, transforming into the □□ characters in golden hue.
Exhale the *Xu* and *Xi* breaths through the *Xun* gate, merging with the general’s cyan and red *qi*.
Focus the gaze and recite: *Om chi zha ti dang zui she*.
Without ceasing, chant the *Xu* and *Xi* breaths in unison, visualize the red and cyan morning’s two signs, imagine the sleeves as wind bags, and wave them to draw forth an unbroken stream.
Also recite the sixteen-character incantation and command: *Xia ya shang Feng Yi, swiftly arise!*
After the incantation, declare: *Great Thunder Wind General, swiftly descend!*

**Gathering Clouds to Obscure the Sun**
The master says: Once external matters are complete, press the tongue to the upper palate, first inscribe the *Liao* character, and swallow it into the heart’s palace. Visualize the heart’s Dipper kicking to churn the kidney’s water.
Next, use the heart’s fire to inscribe the sun’s sign in the Flower Pool, then the moon’s sign, as luminous as the sun.
Visualize the kidney’s water surging like a tide, filling the Flower Pool to submerge the sun’s sign. With the Red Dragon, stir the water to overflow, submerging the moon’s sign.
Inhale the water from the previously used vessel, gather the working in the mouth, and spray it to instantly darken the sky.
This is the workings of creation, transmitted orally, never committed to paper or brush. Fearing its loss over time, it is recorded here.

chunks.original_text: 水鑀水 先将水盂於火上烘极热，用黑笔书一日君号，念 唵。 嚩□啰喗拏利娑诃。 郁贞离 咒毕，取日光炁在内，存日朗。 次书月君讳於日号上。 念： 唵。 嚩□啰□啰娑婆萨诃。 结亨坎 咒毕，取月光炁入化为月。 次加前二号，谓之甲乙号，盖之。 又加大团云符於上，念团云咒涂之。 然后摩掌。 摩掌诀 师用剑诀，以右手书毕字在左手心，运肾水炁吹之。 次以左手书角字於右手心，取心火炁呵之。 却用双手相摩。 如火之热，削入水盂中，吸水噀日，叱咤行事。 如未报应，再用握风雷咒。 摩掌咒 聻聻吽吽，黑暗大神。 天旋地转，日月失昏。 罗喉土宿，煞炁飞腾。 天地昏暗，东西不分。 三界混沌，霭炁立升。 霹雳震地，风火疾行。 唵。 呜轮咤乌突咤黑暗咤。 漫天黑暗咤，急急如律令。 握风雷咒 风伯来，雨师来，急急如火令摄。 一炁七遍 雷罡 右歪自艮步起，震巽巳午申酉戌亥住，自乾过巽，存目射电光，口吐黑云，叱喝风雷。 大团云符 寅申巳亥金井万丈 奉勑开天奉令破地统领雷兵风雷立至疾 水火交并急急如上帝。 上帝勑运金光祖炁人 东方雷神速起南方雷神 速起西方雷神速起北方雷神速起中央雷神速起 念后咒涂 勑咒

**Water Refinement with Water**
First, heat the water vessel over fire until scorching hot. Using a black brush, inscribe the sign of the Sun Lord, then recite:
*Oṃ. Va[kṣa]ra yungna ri svāhā.*
*Yuzhen Li.*
Upon completing the incantation, draw in the *qi* of sunlight and visualize the sun’s radiance.

Next, inscribe the Moon Lord’s name over the Sun Lord’s sign. Recite:
*Oṃ. Va[kṣa]ra ra svāha saha.*
*Jieheng Kan.*
Upon completing the incantation, draw in the *qi* of moonlight and transform it into the moon.

Then, combine the two preceding signs, calling this the "Jia-Yi Sign," and cover it. Next, apply the *Great Gathering Clouds* talisman atop it, reciting the *Gathering Clouds* incantation while anointing it. Finally, perform the *Rubbing Palms* method.

**Rubbing Palms Formula**
The master forms the *Sword Mudra*, inscribing the character *bi* (毕) on the left palm with the right hand, then circulates kidney-water *qi* and blows upon it. Next, inscribe the character *jiao* (角) on the right palm with the left hand, drawing heart-fire *qi* and exhaling upon it. Then, rub both palms together until they grow as hot as fire, thrust them into the water vessel, inhale the water, and spray it toward the sun while shouting commands to proceed. If no response occurs, employ the *Grasping Wind and Thunder* incantation.

**Rubbing Palms Incantation**
*Ni ni hūm hūm, Black-Dark Great Spirit.*
*Heaven spins, earth turns, sun and moon lose their light.*

*Heaven and earth darken, east and west indistinguishable.*
*The Three Realms merge into chaos, misty *qi* instantly rises.*
*Thunder cracks the earth, wind and fire rush forth.*
*Oṃ. Urut cha u tut cha, Black-Dark cha.*
*Cha of boundless black-darkness, swiftly as the law commands!*

**Grasping Wind and Thunder Incantation**
*Wind Earl, come! Rain Master, come! Swiftly as fire’s command seizes!*
*One breath, seven repetitions.*

**Thunder Stem**
Starting from the *Gen* position, step rightward through *Zhen*, *Xun*, *Si*, *Wu*, *Shen*, *You*, *Xu*, and *Hai*, then cross from *Qian* to *Xun*. Visualize the eyes emitting lightning and the mouth spouting black clouds, shouting to summon wind and thunder.

**Great Gathering Clouds Talisman**
*Yin-Shen-Si-Hai, Golden Well ten thousand fathoms deep.*
*By imperial decree, open the heavens; by command, split the earth. Lead the thunder soldiers—wind and thunder arrive swiftly!*
*Water and fire merge—swiftly as the Supreme Emperor commands!*
*By the Emperor’s decree, circulate the ancestral *qi* of Golden Light!*

**Eastern Thunder Spirit, hasten!**
**Southern Thunder Spirit, hasten!**
**Western Thunder Spirit, hasten!**
**Northern Thunder Spirit, hasten!**
**Central Thunder Spirit, hasten!**

chunks.original_text: 上帝赐法勑，命我役雷电。 笔开云炁生，笔合云炁合。 五岳撼动，翻倒四凕。 龙升沧海，万里阴云。 云不得散，风不得停。 云满八极，四天浓云。 郁结浓雨，化作甘霖。 急急捷捷摄。 散云诀 以目光射元官，仿髴红金光中有□字，如大橘大。 微挺脊梁。 用□提起，自夹脊运上顶门，於天目金光化出，冲开黑云。 斩虹诀 左手玉诀，右手剑诀，运造化，结□字，自夹脊而至天目，出冲虹上。 默念： 天吽真神，希真塞英。 利聂末烈，户怒咏音。 奏争炎啖，障猛飞伦。 神威震伐，敕斩妖蜕。 神威三界，火急奉行。 急急如律令。 咒毕，取罡炁吹剑诀上，於未上剔，喝天将斩断妖虹，以先天无合罡炁吹之。 又法 凡螮蝀隔雨，法师备五色线，长一尺五寸，左雷局，步杀伐罡，想虹蜕吸於五色线上，用童子牵线，师召将，步雷火罡，仗剑挥断。 如不应，可用草一根，两手捉定两头，以口咬断，应之无差。 四凕黑水符 日月星光雷居电堂 真王有勑诛锄汝殃 天帝号令立召行藏呼云吐雾雷雨四阡 飞沙走石鼓舞雷霆 蒸雨流通四海四溟 四瞑承命浩荡无边急急如律令 右用鸡子清，磨墨书，沈水墨中，先遣吹，以波斯伽磨墨，诵雷经八十一遍，浓洗墨水八池咒曰： 天黑地黑黄河黑，亥子丑万里山川黑墨黑。 寅卯辰风云雷雨电疾滋，巳午未乌龙皂缁墨黑漆。 申酉云雷风雨遍长空，大黑天神急急。 戌申 咒毕，想肾黑，金炁吹出，频用立应。 遏南风掩日星太乙黑符 太乙连环书符咒 连环主学道，兼备阿叉行五雷。 速猛叱尼律益随，六丁六甲速降临。 吾奉昊天玉皇上帝敕令。 敕召雷部神刘圣光，掩日兴云，疾疾。 右用新砖一片切，莫令人见，埋於坤上，即日无光，遏住南风。 遏南风咒 魁令列岳，风息艮角。 敢有不伏，当遣天豁。 谨召刘字，为吾掩日光，遏南风，疾速兴云。 疾。 右用剑诀，焚合炁符於水盂中，望太阳噀水，一咒一噀，七遍噀之。 五雷合炁符 五雷雷公，四圣风伯，三光星斗，二龙动格。 一真元皇，刘圣光刘孛。 急急速速速至。 阳晶阴灵，六甲六丁。 水火二炁，连结胎形。 阳晶火光，真炁速灵。 入吾掌握，不得稽停。 急急如律令。 掩日光咒 锁天门，闭地户，留人门，塞鬼路。 日无光，月自黑，雷电至，布风伯，鬼神愁，形自灭。 崆峒令，六丁摄。 召丁至，急急急。 雷晶符 符毕，展目光，蹙局入符，急书真王讳。 桓字入符腹盖，吹祖炁入，与神合，存符即使者，方於足下雷字中迭书九字：雰零。 默念九天号，九运，坎上出笔，咽下津。 再於雷字上书 ，入朒字，运心火下降，肾水上升，想海中黑炁包红炁，结为朒字，黑云拥起，吹出与号合。 自兹云气郁蒸，雨势满天地。 仍念九号，九运，坎上出笔，念波咤咒，如法遣。 或未报应，召运书符，入将入号，一依前法。 毕於符前手书 卦，入胸号。 又於符足雷字中书 卦，入烜号，就於符下运笔，拖至手上，极力一扫火一路，笔顺下如风之疾，踢开一雨路，就提祖炁吹於内。 此乃颠倒妙用。 如前咒遣，如起雷书符，咬牙闭炁，默念：唵啮□□□。 不计遍数。 炼神 每夜端坐，平息，凝神，叩齿，闭目，使神光自内注神台，二炁自然交姤，有□字於中，金色，觉心腹如火，金光罩定，如丹。
