Draw qi from Heaven’s Gate and blow it onto the patient’s clothing. Have a family member stand in the southeast and call the patient’s childhood name three times, then apply the qi directly to their flesh. Administer the Hun-Pacifying Talisman thereafter.

**FOUR UPRIGHT HUN-PACIFYING TALISMAN**
Celestial Lord Tianyi,
by decree pacifies the hun.
Year’s Upright, Month’s Upright,
Day’s Upright, Hour’s Upright—
pacify the seven po and guard the three hun.

This talisman is inscribed in cinnabar on yellow paper. When the patient appears sorrowful and disconsolate, as if having lost something, this indicates a lost hun. If they have dreamed of wandering but cannot recall the way back, first summon the hun with the Northern Thearch’s Hun-Attracting Incense, then administer the Hun-Pacifying Talisman.

**NORTHERN THEARCH’S HUN-ATTRACTING INCENSE INCANTATION**
Clear and pure,
the hun returns to the body.
Thunder comes, lightning enters—
*Swiftly, swiftly, as in law and command.*

For this method, use one piece of incense: boil half in water for the patient to ingest with the talisman, and burn the other half before their bed.

**Second: Symptoms of the Bewildered Hun**
This condition arises when the mind fixates on an object or when the patient is startled by livestock or another person, leading to illness. Treat by burning the Three Realms’ Hun-Attracting Talismans.

**UPPER REALM TALISMAN**
*Incense-Burning Incantation:*
Heavenly Lord Tianyou,
by law and command summon the hun.
Four Upright, execute swiftly—
*Instantly seize and retrieve.*

**MIDDLE REALM TALISMAN**
*Incense-Burning Incantation:*
The Eight Slayers descend,
the Four Upright ascend.
Thunder Duke pursues the hun—
*Swiftly, swiftly, act now.*

**LOWER REALM TALISMAN**
*Incense-Burning Incantation:*
Through dark passes and shadowy paths,
pierce the earth to guide the hun.
The talisman arrives—execute—
*Swiftly, swiftly, as in law and command.*

All three talismans are inscribed in cinnabar on yellow paper and stamped with the Seal of the Great Master of the Capital of Heaven. Recite the incense-burning incantation three times while burning and administering them.

**TALISMAN TO OPEN HEAVEN’S GATE AND SEAL EARTH’S DOOR**
After administering the previous three talismans, administer this one.
*Flying Celestial Swift Hun-Pursuit Messengers open Heaven’s Gate—*
*Lightning-swift, thunder-roaring, Fire Chariot Messengers seal Earth’s Door.*
Four Upright Merit Officers,
Celestial Stem Generals—
pursue the hun to reattach it to the body.
*Swiftly!*
Inscribe in cinnabar on paper and have the patient swallow it.

**Third: Symptoms of the Seized Hun**
When a person is cursed and their hun is seized by spirits, causing sudden death—manifesting as dreams of underworld officials coming to claim them, unconsciousness, and unawareness—this is termed "sudden death illness." Treat by burning the Supreme Lord’s Hun-Seizing Talisman.

**SUPREME LORD’S HUN-SEIZING TALISMAN**
Supreme Clarity Thearch, Jade Thearch, Radiant Thearch,
Supreme Lord decrees: bring peace and life to living beings.
Celestial Stem Venerable Star, Great General, Thunderclap Spirit Messenger—
*Instantly restore the hun.*

**SUPREME CLARITY HUN-SEIZING TALISMAN**
Supreme Lord, Supreme Unity, Pure Mystery Numinous Lord,
Cloud-Central Commander-in-Chief,
Two Clouds Flying Cavalry,
Cloud-Central Ghost-Seizing,
Orthodox Unity Thunder Officer,
Hun-Seizing Thunder Lord—
*Instantly seize.*

Both talismans are inscribed in cinnabar on yellow paper and burned at the site of the lightning strike. Administer with Three Lights Talisman Water.

**Fourth: Symptoms of the Hun Taken by Ghosts**
Women often experience strange dreams of intercourse with ghosts, leading to spiritual confusion, dreams of ghosts consuming or wandering, and consequent hun disorder. If left untreated, death occurs within three days. Treat with the Supreme Unity Hun-Attracting Banner.

**METHOD FOR CRAFTING THE SUPREME UNITY HUN-ATTRACTING BANNER**
Use yellow silk or yellow paper, sized according to the patient’s height. Inscribe the Northern Dipper at the top, the patient’s birth name and zodiac sign on the hands, their residence on the feet, and the Supreme Unity Hun-Attracting Talisman on the body. Have the patient lie down for one hour, then burn the banner at the head of their bed.

**SUPREME UNITY HUN-ATTRACTING TALISMAN**
When inscribing this talisman, grasp the Zi trigram with the left hand, draw qi from Heaven’s Gate three times, and blow onto the brush before writing.

*Talisman-Inscribing Incantation:*
Eastern Flower, Western Numinous,
Southern Culmen, Northern True.
Heaven’s Gate, Earth’s Door,
Human Gate, Ghost Road.
Above Heaven, below Earth,
Supreme Unity Primordial Lady.
Flying Talisman Messengers—
*Instantly descend with the living hun.*
Let none scatter or stray,
Jade Ritual pacifies the people—
*Swiftly, swiftly, as in law and command.*

**HUN-PURSUIT HUN-AWAKENING DISHEVELED-HEAD TALISMAN**
*[Illegible characters omitted]*
Awaken the hun, awaken the hun—
body faces Jade Capital.
Yin and yang align by decree,
the six spirits are at peace.
Evil qi departs, true qi remains—
*Swiftly, by Purple Tenuity Great Thearch’s law and command, execute and seize.*
Ascend to Yangyao.
*Decree and incantation.*

Wandering souls of wrongful death, you shall not recklessly alarm.
At earth altars and malevolent shrines, where curses, grudges, and hatreds fester—
all spirits and hundredfold specters, I extinguish your forms.
Swiftly release the soul’s fate, deliver it to the Dragon Lord.
The Most High decrees: you may not linger.
Hasten! As the Most High’s statutes and commands ordain.

**Further Incantation**
Mighty spirit-official generals, swiftly descend with auspicious signs.
With me, drive out the calamity ghosts—
you may not hide or lurk in concealment.
Respectfully invoke Li Cunzheng, the True General of Primordial Yang Jiazi under the Dipper,
Vice-General Chen Danian,
Ghost-Seizing Great General Ma □,
Zhao Qizhi, the Flying-Step Heavenly Stem Great General of the Golden Watchtower’s Registers,
Flying Talisman Spirit-General Cao Danxia,
Jin Zijue, the Nine Heavens’ Stalwart Star Pursuing-Soul Spirit-General,
Yellow Dragon Snatching-Life—
in accordance with the talismanic command of the Supreme Clarity’s Primordial Descent, swiftly manifest your true forms.
By the Qian-trigram’s slaying method, hasten! Hasten! Let retribution be clear.

I act by the Purple Tenuity Great Emperor’s statutes and commands.

**Dispatching Incantation**
Great Emperor of the Northern Ultimate, pursue the soul to rejoin the body.
The three *hun* hasten to arrive, the seven *po* swiftly draw near,
following the *qi* to enter the body.
Hasten! As the Master of the Celestial Stem’s statutes and commands ordain.

The Emperor’s direct talisman descends with true numen,
the Nine Heavens pursue and seize, slaying demonic essences.
Standing at the Stem, hanging from the Dipper to guard the human form,
pursue and seize the three *hun*—they may not tarry.
Deliver them to the afflicted, safeguarding the body’s lightness.
The three *hun* swiftly return to the ailing frame,
the seven *po* swiftly return to the person’s chamber.
Hasten! As the Dipper’s life-generating *qi* statutes and commands ordain.

When a person dies, the Heavenly Stem immediately reverts to form.
When a person lives, the Heavenly Stem is at peace.
Above, do not defy Heaven; below, slay ghosts and spirits.
When true *qi* arrives, the heart swiftly revives.
Hasten! As the Highest Emperor’s statutes and commands ordain.

**Method**
Beginning at *yin* (3–5 a.m.), array the Twelve Officers in seven circuits.
With two fingers, press the horizontal crease of the thumb,
then with the thumb, press the horizontal crease of the little finger,
visualizing heaven and earth in darkness.
Envision the Yellow Dragon Spirit-General escorting the three *hun* into the body.
Press the *mao* crease, draw eastern *qi* to breathe upon the afflicted’s body.
Then, in sequence, dispatch the talismans of General Song,
using gold coins and paper horses burned before the bed.

Next, recite the **Great Awesome Virtue Incantation**:
Oṃ hūṃ hūṃ.
Three *dāna*, Han Nanyan Qianyi decrees.
Nine Heavens’ All-Fire Department, Boundless Great Awesome Virtue Divine King,
command the Nine Heavens’ great thunderfire,
flying fire, rushing fire, molten-metal-hurling fire,
Seven Stars’ thunderbolt fire, blazing thunderfire.
Nine Heavens’ Fire King, sternly driving kui-dragons,
riding flying tigers, lions and white elephants,
xiezhi and qilin, fire-charging elephants,
fire eagles and fire hawks, ten thousand fire beasts,
copper-headed and iron-faced, a million spirit soldiers,
Five Emperors’ execution axes, Four Heavens’ patrols,
the Emperor’s bell resounding, demonic paths all alarmed.
Cave heavens and blessed lands, sacred peaks and waterways,
dark underworlds, city gods and earth-altar spirits,
wayward ghosts and gods—
when mountains collapse and trees topple, when the hundred grains seethe,
what ghost dares resist? Those who do not submit shall be compelled.
Gaping-mouthed Wind King, Fire Lads and Fire Maidens,
fire dragons and fire horses, descending from Heaven.
Bing-Ding Generals, surging from the Earth.
Fire clouds spread *qi*, eight dragons gallop.
The Five Generals of the Celestial Stem devour thunder and roar.
Flying sand and rolling stones, uprooting trees and displacing roots.
The wind-wheel turns left, the fire-chariot spins right.
Illuminating the Three Realms, transforming into a crimson city.
Beneath the Eight Trigrams and Dipper, the Thunder Department encircles.
Issuing commands, wielding Heaven’s might to kill and subdue.
Blazing winds, thunderous crashes—
ghostly essences that witness this plunge ten thousand fathoms into the earth,
reduced to flying ash.
Ancient trees and malevolent shrines, eternally consigned to dust.
Hasten! As the Nine Heavens’ All-Fire Department’s Boundless Great Awesome Virtue Divine King’s fire, thunder, wind, and cloud statutes and commands ordain.

**Pursuing-Soul Talisman**
□□□□□□□□□□□□□
Pursue the soul, pursue the soul—body faces Jade Capital.
Yin and yang align by decree, the Six Spirits are at peace.
Evil *qi* departs, true *qi* abides.
Hasten! By the Purple Tenuity Great Emperor’s slaying and seizing decree.

This Department, having received the petition, now grants the request for salvation and healing. As this Department’s duty is precisely to deliver and succor, we dare not refuse. The talisman must be issued.

**Void Talisman**
The right talisman respectfully invokes:
The Nine Heavens’ Stalwart Dipper Swift-Yellow Dragon Life-Seizing Soul-Pursuing Messenger, Metal General,
together with this Institute’s dispatched officers and functionaries,
to assemble at once with the City God, Earth Altar Deities, and the supervising Household Land Deities and Life Mandate Six Spirits,
and proceed directly to the dwelling of the malevolent ghosts.

Seal mountains, shatter caves, burn halls, demolish shrines—
all curses from kin, all sources of misfortune,
every trace of wickedness in spirit altars and earth-shrines,
all earth, wood, and stone spirits—
sweep away their nests.

Pursue and retrieve the true soul and correct spirit of [Name], born in the year, month, day, and hour of [Date],
and restore them to the person’s body,
so that spirit and essence return,
illness and suffering vanish,
and evil demons are annihilated.

We, by the statutes and commands of the Supreme Emperor, decree: upon receipt of this talisman, act with utmost urgency.

Issued in the year of [Year], month of [Month], day of [Day], hour of [Hour].
[Rank] [Name] affixes seal.

**Petition to the Perfected King of Divine Empyrean and the South Pole Longevity Great Emperor**
**Jade Chapter of the Primordial Vastness of All Spirits**
For petitions to the Northern Dipper, alter the text to read: Northern Dipper Nine Emperor Lords.

When burning the talisman, silently recite the incantation:
Six Jia, Six Ding, Six Qi Primal Lords,
Great Radiance of the Supreme Womb, spiritually attuned to all gods.
Today’s petition ascends, stepping swiftly through the Nine Spirits.
All as decreed by the Primordial Yang Master.

**Envelope Format**
For petitions to the Northern Dipper, alter the text to read: Presented before the Northern Dipper Nine Emperor Lords.
[Name], your subject, respectfully seals.

**Instructions for Writing the Jade Chapter**
Use one sheet of yellow paper, nine inches high and twelve inches wide, fumigated with incense, and inscribed in cinnabar.
First, knock the teeth nine times.
Then, use five sheets of temple paper money, rolled together.
Place a fragrant altar in the courtyard of the petitioner’s home, and pray according to the heart’s desire, without need for elaborate words.
Burn five parts of gold paper money, or use thick incense in the censer to ignite a fierce flame and consume the talisman.
Afterward, in a quiet room, visualize the divine officers. That very night, a response will be received.
This method may be used even when resources for a grand offering are lacking.
It is suitable for soul retrieval, exorcism, all unclear matters, and severe calamities.

This chapter reaches directly before the Jade Purity. Each chapter may address only one matter, and no more than one chapter may be submitted in a day.
The censer must show flames; act with urgency, and do not delay. No one else may witness this.
During ritual offerings, the chapter may be submitted, but no fellow practitioners may observe.

**Six Heavens’ Flying Ash As-You-Will Spirit-Exiting Secret Memorial Method**
For writing the Crimson Spirit Heart Chapter, use yellow silk, five inches high and twelve inches long, folded into twelve sections like a sutra board, with one character per line in each of the three columns per section.
After writing, burn it together with the Marshal’s Credential Chapter, the Spirit-Rushing Golden Palace Talisman, and the Celestial-Connecting Talisman on the censer before the grotto altar. Then, the ritual master prostrates and presents the chapter according to proper form.

**Incantation for the Talisman-Writing Brush**
Piercing the heavens, flying talismans wield power—
swift as fire, urgent as wind.
Hasten! As statutes and commands ordain.

**Method**
Press the *chen* trigram, draw the Dipper’s *qi*, and blow onto the brush.
Next, draw the Golden Light *qi* of the Heavenly Gate and blow onto the chapter.
Visualize the Marshal standing before you, the room filled with golden light, then proceed while silently reciting the *Purifying Heaven and Earth Incantation*.

**Chapter Format**
[Rank] [Name], your subject, with reverence and awe, prostrates and knocks the head a hundred times, respectfully states:

chunks.original_text: 次步至康贞，念咒曰： 雷公禹步，交接我身。 明神同出，一如帝君。 烈焰飞火，统摄鬼门。 精魂来往，无使遗奔。 雷公使者。 霹雳将军。 持输吐火，一如律令。 次步至文曲，念咒曰： 人神人神，五藏之精。 心胆血属，一炁清真。 流火炼质，三魂命门。 同登紫府，神出昏冥。 急急如律令。 其印诀向身弹出，即叩齿三通。 以双手握固，闭目，念咒曰： 气合神，神合气。 交受神，神受交。 玉泉液，舌搅华池三匝，咽液三口。 艮火爻。 离宫格，明受包。 急急如律令。 想肺中白炁如云，徒鼻而出，旋绕身外。 次想心炁下降，肾炁上腾，流入脾宫交媾，结成圣胎。 闭炁，徒十二楼而上泥九官，出神，金光罩定齿九通。 次念咒曰： 神辞绛宫，魂离玉府。 雷公捧符，布摄雷雨。 飞神一出，直接帝所。 急急如律令。 其神出，存升天衢而行，自有灵官元帅前引，五雷使者风伯雨师导从左右，如到金楼玉室七宝宫内，见金童玉女相从，引进真官通引至玉帝前，三拜。 次起焚心章，再伏地奏事。 想引进真官传旨，依准行事。 次起三拜致谢，再入天枢省院，就师前三礼，启事请兵见师指拨兵将同回。 即寻金桥，下玉室重楼而入通。 次念咒曰： 神归五体，百骸俱畅。 神人侍我，精魂还乡。 五体既备，万神齐唱。 道本和合，自然灵光。 飞光一吸。 存顶上金光炁三吸咽下禹步回罡。 急急如律令。 右罡步入破军，却回身入向斗口，再步五雷役使万灵罡。 右虚书雷字在地下，次两手雷局，从肾腧拂起，过耳门，默运三匝。 次念咒曰： 天雷隐隐，想顶上雷呜龙虎交横。 想肝肺二炁交集日月罗列，想左右日月光明转动照我身形。 承差将吏，火急奉行。 急急如律令。 右咒毕，噀水一口，想成云雾，下令一声，有如空谷雷响，天兵雷神直至地所捉祟，法师发罩行持。 毕，定坐片时，叩齿三通。 次念咒曰： 天昌地罡，与我相当。 神归本室，一如故乡。 各还玉阙，受道无方。 上帝有敕，守卫丹房。 急急如律令。 右令侍者煎枣汤，吞下灵字符，再叩齿三通，下坛，两手斗印垂腰，次念起斗咒曰： 天罡地纪，万神拱卫。 真炁归心，罡随步起。 急急如律令。 想斗光从头转归口吞下！ 乃默奏法也。 默告符 黄纸朱书。 敕咒 馘退阴魔，阳神上升。 魂追魄缚，洞达幽冥。 上天入地。 威真化神。 急急如律令。 灵宝章奏秘法 凡未拜章，七日之前，斋戒三日，入靖，不交人事。 每日作用心章符、太平符、伏章符，向旺方以净水吞之。 服时含符於口中，舌拄上腭，仰面看东方，以鼻引青炁在口，存青炁。 次仰看天上，以鼻引红炁入口。 次俯看地下，以鼻吸地中黄炁入口。 存三色炁混合，并在口中，团成一丸，灿烂光芒如日。 存符在光中，以水吞下，每日服符之。 次持念通章咒曰： 心中神，丹元君。 长三寸，广七分，着朱衣，系绛裙。 乘威德，显至灵。 通造化，达至真。 住心中，莫离身。 外有急事，疾来告人。 今有心章，伏请报应。 急急如律令。 心章符 此符乃章中之秘，以黄纸朱书方寸，烧了用井华水，依法修之，行持吞服，使得身心清净，速见上帝。 鬼神见之，即回避也。 开心太平符 伏章符

chunks.original_text: 天狱。 一如诰阁命施行。 空符 黄中策炁，馘灭邪踪。 罡风九丑，浩炁群凶。 开天符命，九天径冲。 傥遏章奏，束送罗酆。 流金火铃，照彻黄中。 龙虎骑吏，执奏云宫。 普天同庆，万劫无终。 一如告命，风火驿传。 太岁　年　月　日　时告下。 具　位　臣姓某承　诰奉行。 祖师三天扶教正一静应显佑真君。 法海遗珠卷之十九竟 法海遗珠卷之二十 召紫姑仙法 凡行持，先造小筲箕一只，以筋一枚，插於首，用净灰二升许，贮以净器。 立供牌一座，题曰蓬莱紫姑仙众。 扫靖室，置三物於其内，晨夕熏事，务在馘洁。 有祷则以灰铺案面，取箕临之，主召者行持焚符。 毕，令善淑者一人立宾次，主召者立主次，各虚手托箕，夹案而立。 令筋剌灰，仙至则箕动，或书至字，或书降字，或书所降仙名号，随心酌献，祷以事意。 或求解经籍奥义，或求文章，或问机密，或求尽格，或推命课，或合婚姻，或卜庐墓风水，皆能感通。 先代英贤，如香山谪仙东坡于湖之辈，间亦有降者，非言可禅，书满则录之。 仍旧扫平，接续书去。 若初请未至，切不可怨亵，但请之以屡，则精神感动，无不降矣。 若能积以岁月，自可以绳悬箕，不用手托，或去筯，用笔书之於纸，顾所事何如耳。 仙降宜速叩之，稍缓则去矣。 念勑水咒曰： 天一生水，地六成之。 一六既合，五行乃基。 吾令噀荡，秽逐尘飞。 急急如律令。 咒毕，噀水净室。 次灶香，东望叩齿，默祷曰：某稽首顿首再拜，上启九天玄女元君，以今遵奉真科，书篆灵符，召请蓬莱仙众，欲望遥降正真生炁，灌注某身心，及所用笔墨纸素之间。 令某书写符篆，速遂通灵。 某下情无任虔祷之至，馑言。 次默念勑纸咒曰： 楮玉之英，先天地生。 龙章凤篆，资之以陈。 符飞迅速，遍历壶天。 急急如律令。 次默念勑墨咒曰： 神墨灵灵，通幽达明。 松君效职，兰友凝馨。 仙真降格，速驾云軿。 急急如律令。 次默念勑笔咒曰： 神笔扬扬，万古传芳。 吾今书篆，飞召十方。 云舆驭，速降灵场。 急急如律令。 右各咒毕，法师凝神，存想，取炁吹笔，然后书符。 降仙符黄纸墨书 祝符咒 太乙灵阳，紫炁煌煌。 精严院宇，粉饰充堂。 紫姑紫姑，洞府真儒。 云鬓霞帔，冰肌玉肤。 知人吉凶，能赋诗书。 曹姑已出，紫姑登途。 愿排軿驭，暂降云衢。 急急如律令。

**Heavenly Prison.**
Let it be executed in accordance with the proclamation’s decree.
**Void Talisman:**
Within the Yellow Center, qi severs and extinguishes evil traces.
The Dipper’s winds and Nine Shamefuls—vast qi subdues the multitude of malevolence.
By command of the Opening Heaven Talisman, it pierces straight through the Nine Heavens.
Should any obstruct the memorial’s passage, bind and deliver them to Fengdu.
The Flowing Gold Fire Bell illuminates the Yellow Center through and through.
Dragon-Tiger mounted officers present the memorial in the Cloud Palace.
All under heaven rejoice as one; for ten thousand kalpas, it shall never end.
As the proclamation commands, it is transmitted by wind-and-fire courier.
In the year of *Tai Sui* [X], the [Y] month, [Z] day, and [W] hour, the decree is issued.
The humble official, Minister [Surname] [Given Name], respectfully receives the proclamation and carries it out.

**Perfected Lord of Orthodox Unity, the Tranquil Response and Manifest Protection, the Heaven-Supporting Three Heavens’ Teaching.**
*Dharma Ocean’s Lost Pearls, Scroll Nineteen* concludes.
*Dharma Ocean’s Lost Pearls, Scroll Twenty*

**Method for Summoning the Purple Maiden Immortal**
For all practices, first craft a small winnowing basket, inserting a single chopstick at its head. Use approximately two *sheng* of pure ash, stored in a clean vessel. Set up a spirit tablet, inscribing it: *Immortal Assembly of the Purple Maidens of Penglai*. Sweep and purify the chamber, placing the three items within. Perform morning and evening offerings with utmost purity.

When making a petition, spread the ash upon the table’s surface. Bring the basket near, and the officiant burns the talisman while reciting the invocation. Upon completion, have a virtuous and refined person stand as the guest, while the officiant stands as the host, each lightly supporting the basket with empty hands, flanking the table. The chopstick will prick the ash—when the immortal arrives, the basket stirs, or writes the character *zhi* (至, "arrival"), or *jiang* (降, "descent"), or the name and title of the descending immortal. Offer libations as the heart dictates, and present the petition’s intent. Whether seeking to resolve abstruse meanings in scriptures, compose literature, inquire into secrets, attain perfection, divine fate, arrange marriages, or assess the *fengshui* of dwellings or graves, all may be spiritually communicated. Illustrious worthies of former ages—such as the Banished Immortal of Fragrant Mountain or Dongpo of West Lake—have occasionally descended, their words beyond mere counsel. When the writing fills the space, transcribe it, then sweep the ash smooth to continue. If the initial invocation fails to summon, do not resent or profane it; persist in repeated entreaties, and the spirit will be moved to descend without fail. With years of practice, the basket may be suspended by a cord, unsupported by hands, or the chopstick replaced with a brush to write upon paper—all depends on the matter at hand.

When the immortal descends, hasten to bow; delay but slightly, and they depart.

Recite the **Water Spell for Purification**:
*"Heaven generates water with the One; Earth completes it with the Six.
One and Six unite, and the Five Phases are founded.
I now command the sprinkling to cleanse—filth flees like flying dust.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the statutes command!"*
Upon finishing, sprinkle the water to purify the chamber.

Next, light incense at the stove, face east, and knock the teeth together while silently praying:
*"I, [Name], bow my head and prostrate myself twice, reverently invoking the Primordial Lady of the Nine Heavens. Today, in accordance with the true precepts, I inscribe the numinous talisman to summon the Immortal Assembly of Penglai. May the true qi of the upright and authentic descend from afar to irrigate my body and heart, as well as the brush, ink, paper, and silk I employ. Let my writing of the talisman swiftly achieve spiritual communion. My humble devotion knows no limit in this earnest prayer. So be it."*

Next, silently recite the **Paper Spell**:
*"Essence of the paper mulberry, born before Heaven and Earth.
Dragon scripts and phoenix seals, drawn forth to manifest.
The talisman flies with swiftness, traversing the celestial realms.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the statutes command!"*

Next, silently recite the **Ink Spell**:
*"Divine ink, numinous and bright, bridging the hidden and the luminous.
The Pine Lord fulfills his duty; the Orchid Companion gathers fragrance.
Immortal perfected ones descend in haste, riding cloud chariots.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the statutes command!"*

Next, silently recite the **Brush Spell**:
*"The divine brush soars, its fame enduring through ten thousand ages.
Now I inscribe the talisman to summon the ten directions.
Cloud chariots swiftly descend to the numinous precinct.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the statutes command!"*

After each spell, the ritual master concentrates the spirit, visualizes, and draws qi to blow upon the brush before inscribing the talisman.

**Talisman for Descending Immortals** (inscribed in ink on yellow paper)

**Talisman Invocation:**
*"Supreme Unity’s numinous yang, radiant with purple qi.
The halls are adorned with solemnity, the chambers filled with refinement.
Purple Maiden, Purple Maiden—true scholar of the grotto-heavens.
Cloud tresses and rosy sashes, skin like ice and jade.
Knowing human fortune and misfortune, able to compose poetry and prose.
Once Lady Cao departs, the Purple Maiden sets forth.
May she swiftly arrange her chariot and briefly descend upon the cloud thoroughfare.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the statutes command!"*

By command of the Most High’s Opening Heaven Talisman:
Now, I respectfully call upon the talisman’s messengers—the Orthodox Unity Merit Officers, the Flowing Gold Fire Bell Generals—to bear and present this memorial. Hasten to deliver it to the imperial presence, passing through the realms of the Dipper’s winds without obstruction or interception. Should any disobey,

chunks.original_text: 右咒毕，置符箕上，焚香，叩齿，述意祝曰： 奉请三界仙府符吏，为某赍此九天玄女符命，径诣三岛十洲，洞天福地，诸仙宫府。 仰启紫姑元真玉肌素女，三江太湖，映雪玉真，玉轴道老，仙女云妹，仙女桂英，庆奴雪奴，首奴真卿，天上地下，水府阳间，古往今来，一切仙众。 以今召请，普望来临。 伏为某事祈求，伏愿驾鹤乘鸾，飞云走雾，暂离洞府，来降尘寰。 愿彰箕下之灵，式副由中之捆，某下情不胜祝望之至。 次将符命，就灯烛上焚之。 仍吹灰令飞，望束叩齿，吸炁一口，吹於箕上，托箕临案，若箕动则仙至矣。 未动且托住箕，再叩齿，念咒曰： 天上人间，云水迢迢，敢请仙童，队仗迎邀。 霓旌羽盖，俯降云霄。 毋令凝滞，心黯魂销。 急急如律令。 右咒毕，想仙降随意酌献。 次念秘咒曰： 云收雾卷，仙真倏到。 愿附神箕，推诚乐告。 急急如律令。 咒毕，随事请求，或写一去字，则是仙欲去矣。 宜旋下神箕，再焚香启谢云： 诸天诸地，洞府仙众，适来召屈仙真，已蒙赐降尘寰，扰扰难以久留，敬热宝香，攀送軿驭。 后有所祈，还当奉请。 事毕，再叩齿，念咒曰：

Once the above invocation is complete, place the talisman upon the planchette, burn incense, and strike the teeth together while reciting the following prayer of intent:

*"By command of the talisman-officers of the Three Realms’ immortal courts, I hereby dispatch this mandate of the Nine Heavens’ Mysterious Maiden, directing it straightaway to the Three Isles and Ten Continents, the grotto-heavens and blessed lands, and all the palaces and courts of the immortals. Humbly I invoke the Primordial True Jade-Skin Plain Maiden, the Three Rivers and Great Lake’s Snow-Reflecting Jade Perfected, the Jade-Axle Dao Elder, the Immortal Maidens Cloud Sister, Cassia Blossom, Celebration Slave, Snow Slave, Chief Slave True Minister—all the immortals of heaven above, earth below, the watery palaces, and the yang world, from ancient times to the present. By this summons, may all universally deign to descend. Prostrate, I beseech that for the sake of this petition, you mount crane and phoenix, ride cloud and mist, briefly depart your grotto-palaces, and descend to the dusty realm. May the numen beneath the planchette manifest, and the inward bond be duly fulfilled—my heartfelt devotion knows no limit in its yearning."*

Next, hold the talisman-mandate over the candle flame and burn it. Blow the ashes to scatter them, then gaze toward the east, strike the teeth together, draw in a mouthful of *qi*, and blow it upon the planchette. Lift the planchette and rest it upon the table; if it moves, the immortal has arrived. Should it remain still, continue holding the planchette, strike the teeth again, and recite the spell:

*"Between heaven and earth, clouds and waters stretch afar.
Dare I beseech the immortal youths to array their retinue and welcome?
With rainbow banners and feathered canopies, descend from the cloudy empyrean.
Let no delay linger, lest heart darken and soul dissolve.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the statutes command!"*

After the spell, envision the immortal’s descent and offer libations as you see fit. Then recite the secret incantation:

*"Clouds gather, mists disperse—
the perfected immortals arrive in an instant.
May they attach to the spirit-planchette,
and with joyful sincerity, reveal their will.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the statutes command!"*

Once the spell is complete, make your petition as the matter requires. If a "depart" character appears, the immortal wishes to leave. Lower the spirit-planchette at once, then burn incense and offer thanks, saying:

*"Immortals of all heavens and earth, grotto-palace hosts—
though just now summoned, you graciously descended to the dusty realm.
Yet the world’s bustle allows no long stay;
with fragrant incense, I reverently escort your chariot’s departure.
Should future prayers arise, I shall again humbly invoke your presence."*

When finished, strike the teeth once more and recite the spell:

chunks.original_text: 无路不通，去路难寻。 四海之内，谁同此音。 急急如律令。 玄天急奏灵文 凡行事，先解秽，变神，存四灵卫身。 次剔阴阳斗，左手煞文，右手剑诀，取金光炁，密念召将咒曰： 玄天之精，曰直威灵。 元帅有令，疾速降灵。 立降坛前，听令奉行。 急急如玄天上帝律令。 天地之灵，化汝之精。 乾元亨利，日月五星。 四直使者，疾速降临。 急至坛下，报应通灵。 急急如玄天上帝律令。 玄天有令，勑召陈安、刘吉、孙德、张丙四直使者，火急降灵。 急急如律令。 右咒三遍，毕，存四方青红白黑炁聚香上，如彩云一团，有金色光芒闪烁。 兆吸入肾官，历肝上心达肺，用吹呬嘘呵出香炉上，存金光迸开，见四直使者随各方服色，乘金光在坛前，再焚香，述意。 毕，兆捧章在手，密诵中篇一遍，运金光吹章上，存金光八角垂芒罩布。 又密念咒三遍，存诸司帅将拥护其章，仍就香上度过，兆再云： 开天门，舌拄上腭，掐亥文。 闭地户。 舌拄玉地，外掐巳文。 留人门，瞬双目，掐申文。 塞鬼路。 闭炁，丁立，寅文。 毕，再念咒曰： 玄天诰命，四直咸遵。 代天行化，普济群生。 人民疾苦，事有激情。 短章急奏，速达至真。 急急如律令。 咒毕，焚香请将吏。 次读关文，然后化财。 仍以章文用符包之，投在炉中焚化。 次念遣章咒曰： 五色之烟，冲章上天。 五色之炁，冲章达帝。 下宫故炁，不得妄干。 急急如律令。 右咒毕，师存五色之云涌起，兆平坐，存心中红光一团，左手剔□□□□□□斗一座，即存红光上出，随诀弹直接天门，万里极远。 存四将居前捧章，兆神部领众将，随红光而去。 良久，见一长桥，上有光芒烜赫。 良久，升上十二重楼，再历绛桥，而上直至中天玉阙，有紫云垂荫，将吏侍阙外。 兆与四直入阙内，望左边横转入佑圣府，门阙威严，万神环卫。 存四直使者付章奏与典奏真官，至殿下九拜，起居自左街登殿，於案前奏事，长跪，存真官呈章，玄帝允奏。 就拜自右街，降至殿下，九拜，谢恩出府门外，有四直前引，官将后随，出玉阙外，循故道而回，恍惚至坛前，收红光，入心，叩齿，咽津三过。 再祝云： 向来关召四直功曹，仰荷引进，今则朝谒已竟，伏请各还所治。 后有关召，一如故事 捷诀 澄心静念，存元神在绛官。 次召四直，自脑府降。 祝事毕，烧奏章，存四直捧章，前引元神，乘红光升至脑府殿上，金光中玄帝坐，侍卫森列。 兆跪进口奏事，因四直呈章，圣意允奏，拜谢回归绛官。 默念心咒曰： 唵。

No path remains unpassed, yet the path of departure is hard to find.
Within the four seas, who echoes this sound?
Swiftly, swiftly, as the statutes command.

**Urgent Memorial to the Mysterious Heaven’s Sacred Text**

For all ritual proceedings, first purify defilements, transform the spirit, and visualize the Four Numinous Beasts guarding the body. Then trace the Yin-Yang Dipper, form the *sha* mudra with the left hand and the sword mudra with the right, gather the golden-light *qi*, and secretly recite the Summoning Generals Spell:

*"Essence of Mysterious Heaven, called Direct and Mighty Spirit.
By the Marshal’s command, descend swiftly in power.
Stand before the altar, heed the orders and act."*
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Mysterious Heavenly Emperor’s statutes command.

*"Spirits of Heaven and Earth, transform into your essence.
Qian’s primal harmony, sun, moon, and five stars—
Four Direct Messengers, descend with haste.
Arrive swiftly beneath the altar, report and respond in numinous communion."*
Swiftly, swiftly, as Mysterious Heavenly Emperor’s statutes command.

Mysterious Heaven decrees: summon the Four Direct Messengers—Chen An, Liu Ji, Sun De, and Zhang Bing—descend in haste.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the statutes command.

Recite the above spell thrice. Then visualize *qi* of the four directions—azure, red, white, and black—converging above the incense like a mass of colored clouds, shimmering with golden radiance. The adept inhales this into the Kidney Palace, courses it through the Liver, up to the Heart, and into the Lungs, then exhales with the sounds *chui*, *xi*, *xu*, and *he* over the incense burner. Visualize golden light bursting forth, revealing the Four Direct Messengers in their directional robes, riding the golden light before the altar. Burn incense again and state your intent.

When finished, the adept holds the memorial in hand, silently recites the middle section once, and directs golden light to blow upon the document, imagining an eight-cornered golden radiance enveloping it. Then silently recite the spell thrice more, visualizing all marshals and generals escorting the memorial. Pass it through the incense smoke, and the adept declares:

*"Open the Gate of Heaven."*
Press the tongue to the upper palate and form the *hai* mudra.

*"Seal the Door of Earth."*
Press the tongue to the jade floor and form the *si* mudra externally.

*"Hold the Human Gate."*
Blink both eyes and form the *shen* mudra.

*"Block the Ghost Road."*
Hold the breath, stand in *ding* stance, and form the *yin* mudra.

When complete, recite the spell again:
*"By Mysterious Heaven’s edict, the Four Direct Messengers all obey.
Acting on Heaven’s behalf, they universally succor the multitudes.
For the people’s afflictions and matters of urgent passion,
this brief memorial is swiftly presented to reach the Perfected.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the statutes command."*

When the spell concludes, burn incense and invite the officers. Next, read the memorial document, then offer paper money. Wrap the memorial in a talisman and cast it into the brazier to burn.

Then recite the Dispatching Memorial Spell:
*"Smoke of five colors, surge upward to Heaven with the memorial.
Qi of five colors, ascend with the memorial to the Emperor.
Old qi of the lower palaces must not recklessly interfere.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the statutes command."*

When the above spell concludes, the master visualizes clouds of five colors surging forth. The adept sits upright, imagining a mass of red light within the Heart. With the left hand, trace the Dipper, then visualize the red light rising from it. Following the mudra, flick it directly toward the Gate of Heaven, spanning ten thousand miles in an instant. Visualize the Four Generals at the front, bearing the memorial, while the adept’s spirit hosts lead the assembled generals, ascending with the red light.

After a long while, a long bridge appears, radiant with dazzling light. After another long while, ascend the Twelve-Storied Tower, then cross the Crimson Bridge to reach the Jade Palace of the Central Heaven. Purple clouds drape overhead, and the officers and generals wait outside the palace gates. The adept and the Four Direct Messengers enter the palace, turn left into the Hall of Blessing and Sagacity. The gates are majestic, surrounded by myriad spirits.

Visualize the Four Direct Messengers presenting the memorial to the Memorial-Receiving Perfected Officer. Prostrate nine times before the throne, then rise and ascend the left steps to the hall. Kneel before the desk to present the matter. Visualize the Perfected Officer receiving the memorial, and the Mysterious Emperor granting the petition. Bow again, descend the right steps, and prostrate nine times before the throne to give thanks. Exit the palace gates, where the Four Direct Messengers lead the way, followed by the officers and generals. Depart the Jade Palace, retrace the path, and suddenly return before the altar. Gather the red light into the Heart, strike the teeth, and swallow saliva thrice.

Then pray:
*"The Four Direct Messengers and Merit Officers, who have just now guided this audience—now that the court visit is complete, I humbly request that each return to your respective domains. Should future summons arise, proceed as before."*

**Swift Mudra**
Calm the mind and silently visualize the original spirit in the Crimson Palace. Then summon the Four Direct Messengers to descend from the Brain Palace. When the ritual is complete, burn the memorial. Visualize the Four Direct Messengers bearing the memorial, leading the original spirit as they ascend in red light to the Brain Palace’s hall. Within the golden light, the Mysterious Emperor sits, surrounded by a forest of attendants. The adept kneels to present the matter orally, while the Four Direct Messengers submit the memorial. The Sage’s will grants the petition. Bow in thanks and return to the Crimson Palace.

Silently recite the Heart Spell:
*"Om."*

Upon completing the right-hand spell, settle into stillness and await the response. Observe whatever vision appears, and interpret it according to the circumstance. This method must not be employed for trivial matters.

**Daily Audience Rite**
Each day at dawn or in the quiet of night, sit upright, knock the teeth twenty-four times, swallow saliva twenty-four times, and recite the Mysterious Emperor’s full title thrice. Visualize a point of radiance between the kidneys, rising through the spine to the back of the brain, reaching the Mud Pill Palace. See golden light shimmering, and silently intone *"Golden Portal Transformation-Body Heavenly Worthy"* twenty-one times. Soon the light scatters, suffusing the ten directions, revealing the Mysterious Emperor enthroned upon the Jade Mountain’s capital—this is the Mud Pill Palace—while your own form stands as a mountain before him, distinct and clear.

Next, visualize the Four Direct Messengers emerging: from the heart through the left eye, from the liver through the right eye, and from the lungs and kidneys through the two ear roots. They stand in the clouds, bowing in attendance. Your own body assumes the aspect of a perfected being, emerging from the Yellow Court with a jade tablet to present your petition, kneeling in reverence. When the audience concludes, visualize the golden light reconverging as before. You return to the Crimson Palace, gazing down at the radiance between the kidneys until profound stillness is achieved—this marks the ritual’s completion.

When subduing malevolent spirits, visualize the Mysterious Emperor with unbound hair and bare feet, his holy countenance wrathful, divine soldiers arrayed in formation, his presence awe-inspiring. For ordinary invocations, envision his holy countenance joyful. When seeking deliverance from misfortune, visualize his holy countenance compassionate.

**Summoning the Four Direct Messengers Spell**
The numinous void’s five *qi*, one *qi* divides into forms.
From the Great Beginning’s primordial chaos, extending to the darkest depths,
Encompassing the six directions, universally planting the divine spirits.
A thousand transformations, ten thousand changes—one *qi* divides all.
All spirits assemble, commanding officers and soldiers.
Seize rebellious ghosts, capture and bind demonic entities.
Four Direct Messengers, true forms of water and fire,
Hear my summons and swiftly descend.
With fetters and cudgels, with capture and restraint,
I stand before the altar, awaiting your response.
*Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by law and command!*

chunks.original_text: 天地合德日月合明 玄天上帝 敕召万神 年直大将月直大将日直大将 时直大将天关大将地轴大将 六甲大将奔云急至 六丁大将火急前来 天煞地煞年煞月煞日煞时煞三元煞鬼大将 蓬头大将急捉鬼黄头大将急缚鬼牢头大将急斩鬼 勑咒 玄天上帝，壬癸灵神。 化身金阙，统领神兵。 威容赫奕，列宿分精。 轰雷掣电，馘斩妖精。 巨蛇威猛，神龟震惊。 六丁六甲，八煞将军。 四直使者，黑煞威灵。 摆撼天地，队仗纷纭。 闻召立降，震布威声。 九州社令，血食之神。 敢有拒逆，粉碎身形。 神符一下，十方肃清。 急急如律令。 右符黄纸黑书，掐煞文，取北炁入，掐真武印，存身为玄帝，叱四将自北方领兵驾黑云入符。 治祟则召将熏服，平常解厄，皆可行用。 四直信符 念玉皇光全号掐玉文取金光炁布入 勑召四直功曹陈安文子刘吉午文孙德卯文张丙酉文念 奉玉皇上帝勑 玄帝全号述意涂之玄天上帝令 右符存天门金光中，降金勑字入。 次存金色满目。 其符先黑书皇字，次下四直姓名，掐四诀，以玄帝号涂之。 次用朱书勑字，又书玄天令三字盖，用玉皇号涂其符，包章用之。 瓦符 右符黄纸朱书，以玉皇全号书敕字，再用玄帝全号书本身，下入号涂之。 自天门降秘字入符，从亥上出笔。 如焚符，则取患家屋栋上瓦一片洗净，於瓦上牯符。 阳日瓦仰，阴日瓦覆。 符上排钱马，钱马上安章，章上撒五色散花盖之。 烧时存烟化为五色云，缠绕章上，四直使者赍捧而升。 天文符章 某年某月某日某时，就某处遣发，为某事，谨取某月某日某时，如何报应，伏候师旨。 臣某告行 书符咒

**The Unity of Heaven and Earth’s Virtue, the Union of Sun and Moon’s Radiance**

The Dark Heaven Supreme Emperor commands the myriad spirits:
Year-Directing General, Month-Directing General, Day-Directing General,
Hour-Directing General, Heaven’s Barrier General, Earth’s Pivot General,
Six Jia Generals—hasten on rushing clouds,
Six Ding Generals—advance with fiery urgency,
Heaven-Slaughtering, Earth-Slaughtering, Year-Slaughtering, Month-Slaughtering,
Day-Slaughtering, Hour-Slaughtering, Three Origins Slaughtering Ghost Generals,
Disheveled-Head General—seize the ghosts swiftly,
Yellow-Head General—bind the ghosts swiftly,
Prison-Head General—behead the ghosts swiftly.

**Summoning Spell**
Dark Heaven Supreme Emperor, numinous spirit of *ren* and *gui*,
Transforming body in the Golden Palace, commanding the divine soldiers.
Majestic presence resplendent, stellar essences arrayed in brilliance.
Thunder roars and lightning flashes, beheading and slaying demonic entities.
The colossal serpent’s might, the divine tortoise’s awe.
Six Ding and Six Jia, Eight Slaughtering Generals,
Four Direct Messengers, Black Slaughtering Numinous Spirits.
Shaking heaven and earth, banners and ranks in tumultuous array.
At the summons, descend at once, spreading dread and might.
The deities of the Nine Provinces’ earth-altars, blood-offering spirits—
Should any dare resist, shatter their forms to dust.
With one descent of the divine talisman, the ten directions are purified.
*Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by law and command!*

The talisman is inscribed on yellow paper in black ink. Seal the Slaughtering Script, draw in northern *qi*, and press the True Martial Seal. Visualize oneself as the Dark Emperor, commanding the Four Generals to lead troops from the north, riding black clouds into the talisman. To dispel malevolent forces, summon the generals and fumigate or ingest the talisman. For routine exorcisms and disaster resolution, it may be employed as needed.

**Four Direct Messengers’ Credential Talisman**
Recite the full sacred title of the Jade Emperor, press the Jade Script, and draw in golden-light *qi* to infuse the talisman.
Summon the Four Direct Messengers, Attendant Officers: Chen An, Wen Zi, Liu Jiwu, Wen Sun De, Zhang Bingyou.
Recite: *By the Jade Emperor’s Supreme Decree, the Dark Emperor’s full sacred title is invoked to convey intent.*
Inscribe the talisman with the Dark Heaven Supreme Emperor’s command.

Visualize the talisman within the golden light of Heaven’s Gate, descending the golden decree characters into it. Then envision golden radiance filling the eyes. First inscribe the character *huang* (皇) in black, followed by the names of the Four Direct Messengers. Press the Four Seals and anoint with the Dark Emperor’s title. Next, write the character *chi* (勑) in cinnabar, then inscribe *Xuanti Ling* (玄天令) three times as a seal. Anoint the talisman with the Jade Emperor’s title, fold it into an envelope, and employ it.

**Tile Talisman**
Inscribe this talisman on yellow paper in cinnabar. Write the character *chi* (敕) with the Jade Emperor’s full title, then inscribe the talisman’s body with the Dark Emperor’s full title, anointing it with the title below. From Heaven’s Gate, let the secret characters descend into the talisman, beginning the stroke from the *hai* (亥) position.

When burning the talisman, take a tile from the ridge of the afflicted household’s roof, wash it clean, and affix the talisman to it. On yang days, place the tile face-up; on yin days, face-down. Arrange paper money and horses on the talisman, place the envelope on the money and horses, and scatter five-colored petals over it. As it burns, visualize the smoke transforming into five-colored clouds swirling around the envelope, with the Four Direct Messengers bearing it aloft as they ascend.

On such-and-such a year, month, day, and hour, dispatched from such-and-such a place for such-and-such a matter, respectfully await a response on such-and-such a month, day, and hour, as per the master’s decree.
Your servant [Name] respectfully submits.

Inscribe the talisman and incantation.

chunks.original_text: 神云焕层虚，梵罗屯碧霄。 元始九龙驾，皇人按青朝。 灵光集万真，珠景开阳寥。 出示灵宝篇，福德由是招。 洞玄隐高岩，玉音泛云璈。 无量匪得思，道海生波涛。 法义同涓流，滋植成嘉苗。 用以赈穷饥，教兴卫中朝。 帝尊寿亿年，太平灭兵刀。 稽首望玉宸，灵华散金毫。 急急如律令。 右符黄纸，方圆五寸，一半朱书符，一半墨书事意。 如书符章，先念金阙化身天尊，次存太上老君居兆项上，然后念咒书章符，存纸笔墨俱是金光梵炁。 如捉祟伐庙，黑纸墨书。 消灾治病，黄纸朱书。 祈晴，青纸朱书。 祈雨，红纸墨书。 祈雪，青纸粉书。 短章式 用黄纸，高五寸，阔七寸，纸书密写，上用小章印。 具位臣姓某，谨奏为某人某事。 谨具急奏，上告 北极玄天圣师真武真君圣前。 恭望 圣慈，允臣所奏，特赐如何施行。

Amidst layered voids, divine clouds resplendent shine,
In sapphire skies, the Brahma-net’s threads entwine.
The Primordial’s nine dragons draw the chariot bright,

A myriad perfected gather in the numinous glow,

Boundless, beyond thought’s grasp, the Dao’s sea surges wide,

Dharma’s meaning flows like rivulets pure,

To succor the destitute, the hungry relieve,

May the August Emperor’s years stretch a hundred million long,
With peace prevailing, blades of war forever gone.
Bowing in reverence toward the Jade Celestial Throne,

**For exorcising malevolent spirits or dismantling shrines:** Use black paper, ink inscription.
**For dispelling misfortune or curing illness:** Use yellow paper, vermilion inscription.
**For beseeching clear skies:** Use green paper, vermilion inscription.
**For beseeching rain:** Use red paper, ink inscription.
**For beseeching snow:** Use green paper, white powder inscription.

**Short Petition Format:**

*Your subordinate, [Name], respectfully memorializes on behalf of [Person] for [Matter].*
*With utmost urgency, this petition is humbly presented before the August Presence of the North Pole’s Mysterious Heavenly Sage Master, Perfected Warrior, True Martial Lord.*

chunks.original_text: 臣谨具短章，急奏以闻，谨奏。 太岁　年　月　日具位臣姓某急奏。 束腰式 臣急奏谨璈。 玄坛坐功 存自己混沌未分，一如鸡子状，须臾水升火降，交媾中官，如紫红金色弹丸。 次坠下丹田，自尾闾历夹脊，度重楼到泥九，如日出之色。 次流下中田，如日中之色。 次下丹田，如日落之色。 此乃三官升降也。 再升玄室，神光洞焕。 咒曰： 上元真一，守居泥丸。 中元司命，安坐绛宫。 下元桃康，主宫把籍。 无英公子，白元尊神。 太乙司命，桃康合延。 执符把箓，保命生根。 上游上清，出入华房，八冥之内，细微之中，下镇人身，泥丸绛宫，开通白脉，真炁流行，从有入无，大道自然。 自然之妙，玄之又玄。 急急如律令。

This is the ascent and descent of the Three Palaces.

The Perfected of the Upper Prime dwells in the Mud Pill.
The Controller of Destiny of the Middle Prime sits steadfast in the Crimson Palace.
The Peach Vitality of the Lower Prime holds the register in the Palace of Life.
The Venerable Lord of White Prime, the Noble Son Without Peer,

chunks.original_text: 右咒毕，自觉神思清明，存身中元帅出现，久则与本帅契合通灵，自然报应。 常日平旦坐炼作用之，尤为妙矣。 使者坐功 右法暝目，默运心肝脾肺肾五炁作一团，下降丹田，存丹田为玉炉，内肾为日月，两手雷局，运玉炉中日月二炁，自三关上顶门，化作金光炁二道，自两目出，冲开巽户，火光与金光相合作一团，师以剑诀虚书张元伯三字，存金光火光中见一使者，青鬼面黄，结巾红发，金甲红罩，袍绿仙带，赤脚，手把铁尺，吸归坛中听令。 北帝劈鬼胎鬼炁符法 师面北，存身为六甲，右手持钺斧，左手掐第三指第二节六丁诀，不得动，动则不灵。 次存地为酆都黑狱，以香烧左右，以净斧一柄放於面前令患人来前立，或坐，兆以右手於地书田字云。 开天门神君 闭地户神君 留人门神君 塞鬼路神君穿鬼心神君 　破鬼肚神君 敕曰 谨请黑露大神，六通斩鬼煞摄。 急急如律令。 右咒毕字成，便令患人咳嗽一声，取炁吹於田字中心，急以右手持斧，隋炁劈之，即鬼炁鬼胎鬼块自然消散。 法海遗珠卷之二十竟 法海遗珠卷之二十一

**The Messenger’s Seated Practice**

chunks.original_text: 混合五雷内修 都天雷公，呼云震风。 静坐，叩齿集神，闭目，咽津三口，舌拄上腭，息炁令三宫升降，毕。 闭口呼炁三口，嘘炁一口，内观田，再炼炁鼓津一口，吞下，坠下肾宫，闭目，作怒运肝胆炁，起风传令，默念《运雷护命经》一巷，或大金光咒，名曰炼雷。 青雷赤黑，动按九宫。 闭目，内观肝宫息炁，舌拄上腭，作怒嘘炁三口，不要闻声，亦不开口。 想火炁炎炎，至心腹闭息片时，仍前嘘炁呵炁各三口，复息再咽津，又呼炁三口，呵炁三口，则其炁自分布九宫，不叉妄想也。 赤雷白炁，上游太穹。 闭目，内观心宫，微微呵炁。 次想炁作怒，使胆炁流行，是风扇动火炁也。 吹呬炁三口，想心宫火炁蒸需肺下，得白炁上至顶门，复以鼻引吸顶门炁一口，吞下肾宫，以肚脐胀起，使炁归元三宫升降。 白雷黑黑，下游玄郑。 次作怒炁鼓津和液，送下肾宫，想白炁下降，接肾宫黑炁，从酆都关涌起，吹炁三口，不要耳闻。 黑雷黄黑，八极元冲。 次息炁作怒，将谷道缩起，小腹胁动七次，再存肾水黑炁，经历脾宫，过与脾宫黄炁炼合。 次呼炁五口，是火得土则生，想水得土则止，五炁得土炼成一块，其炁自周布八方，不必妄想。 黄雷紫黑，电遍虚空。 五炁得脾宫煅炼，初成黄炁，色如金橘。 次发肾宫臣火，膀胱民火，降心宫君火，是为三昧真火也，脾如鼎腹，下膀胱肾火烧之毁炼，如紫金色，其炁朝元，蓊郁如电，灿烂闪闪，上升也。 周天世界，炎炎赫风。 闭息良久，回视顶门，存想五炁朝　元，顶门谷神有紫炁赫赫之风，如神霄雷工所居之地，其炁闪烁照耀，诸孔窍尽皆光明。 何神不伏，何鬼不从。 法师煅炼至此，五炁朝元，三花聚顶，紫赫之炁，遍乎诸天诸地，晃耀闪烁，身左右上下，各有圆光，此即吾身自有风雷电云雨，变化莫测矣，又何鬼不伏也。 视吾者死，从吾者封。 北灵黑历，九丑紫童。 法师丹成炁足，紫赫之炁上朝，是炁足矣。 然后发运上顶门，以鼻引炁。 次呼分布左右，然后存想。 是以炁化凝结成形，以杳冥无形之真形，而驱役无形之鬼神，初非妄想也。 风伯雨师，驱雷领风。 一吹呼炁，化炼成雨师於前。 一吹呼炁。 化炼成风伯於后。 以吾身之真炁本然之真质，即雷公矣。 双目照耀，即电母矣。 所谓法行先天大道，将用自己元神是也。 法师行持如此，终始如一，真炁有余，可以坐呼立召，响应斯须，驱神役将，运雨致风，有如行持符水，治病驱邪，即以在我有余之炁，而补夫人不足之炁，又岂不能致效於目前哉。 雷公雷公，有大神通。 天符到处，霹雳虚空。 法师行持炼将出神已毕，自内而外矣。 即袖中出一符，或召雷兴电，驱雷致雨，或治祟除妖，随宜发用。 出声念上四句，存想如法，指挥执符前去，无所往而不可也。 坐功手点秘诀 绿水秋波亥湛湛清， 先步豁落斗，至天英星上，结跏趺坐，两手握固，掐亥文，以口吸肾宫炁，入心府交合，却漱华池水三十六次，存神水清湛。 千斤铁斧酉背头轻。 申 以二手按坐，存千筋万豚皆通，神水自从夹脊骨动辘轳，直上泥丸官。 傍河午柳树未风吹倒， 存天柱倒天河水，至十二重楼，入三关，柳星在天池，即额也。 抱得嫦娥也不惊。
chunks.translated_text:
Amalgamating the Five Thunders for Inner Cultivation
Invoke the All-Encompassing Thunder Duke, summoning the roar of storm winds.

Sit in stillness, knock the teeth to gather the spirits, close the eyes, swallow saliva three times, press the tongue to the upper palate, and regulate the qi to allow the Three Palaces to ascend and descend—thus complete.
Close the mouth and inhale qi three times, exhale qi once, inwardly observe the Cinnabar Field, then refine the qi to churn the saliva once more, swallow it, and guide it down to the Kidney Palace. Close the eyes, summon wrathful qi to mobilize the liver and gallbladder, stirring the wind to transmit the command. Silently recite the *Scripture of Commanding Thunder to Protect Life* once, or the *Great Golden Light Mantra*—this is called "Refining Thunder."
Green thunder, red and black, moves to press the Nine Palaces.

Close the eyes, inwardly observe the Liver Palace to regulate the qi, press the tongue to the upper palate, and exhale wrathful qi three times—without making a sound or opening the mouth.
Visualize the fiery qi blazing intensely, holding the breath for a moment at the heart and abdomen. Then exhale wrathful qi and *he*-qi three times each, rest again, swallow saliva, inhale qi three times, and exhale *he*-qi three times. Thus, the qi will naturally distribute itself across the Nine Palaces, without straying into idle thoughts.
Red thunder, white qi, ascends to roam the Great Vault.

Close the eyes, inwardly observe the Heart Palace, and gently exhale *he*-qi.
Next, visualize the qi in wrath, causing the gallbladder qi to circulate—this is the wind fanning the fire qi.
Exhale *chui* and *xi* qi three times each, imagining the fire qi of the Heart Palace steaming beneath the lungs, producing white qi that rises to the Crown Gate. Then, with the nose, draw in the qi from the Crown Gate once and swallow it down to the Kidney Palace. Expand the navel to return the qi to its origin, allowing the Three Palaces to ascend and descend.
White thunder, black and dark, descends to roam the Mysterious Gate.

Next, summon wrathful qi to churn the saliva and fluids, sending them down to the Kidney Palace. Visualize the white qi descending to meet the black qi of the Kidney Palace, surging up from the Fengdu Pass. Exhale qi three times—without letting the ears perceive the sound.
Black thunder, yellow and dark, surges through the Eight Extremes.

Next, regulate the qi with wrath, contract the perineum, and move the lower abdomen and flanks seven times. Then visualize the black qi of the Kidney Water passing through the Spleen Palace, merging and refining with the yellow qi of the Spleen Palace.
Next, inhale qi five times—fire is born when it meets earth, and water is stilled when it meets earth. The Five Qi, refined by earth, coalesce into one mass, naturally circulating throughout the eight directions without straying into idle thoughts.
Yellow thunder, purple and dark, lightning traverses the void.

The Five Qi, refined in the Spleen Palace, first form yellow qi, its color like a golden tangerine.
Next, emit the ministerial fire of the Kidney Palace and the civilian fire of the Bladder, descending the sovereign fire of the Heart Palace—this is the true Samādhi Fire. The Spleen is like the belly of a cauldron, with the Bladder and Kidney fires burning below to refine it, turning it a purple-gold hue. Its qi returns to the origin, lush and radiant like lightning, flashing brilliantly as it ascends.
The world of the Celestial Cycle, ablaze with scorching winds.

Hold the breath for a long while, then turn the gaze inward to the Crown Gate. Visualize the Five Qi returning to the origin, where the Valley Spirit of the Crown Gate emits a purple qi of blazing winds, like the abode of the Divine Radiance Thunder Duke. Its qi flickers and shines, illuminating all the orifices with light.
What spirit would not submit? What ghost would not obey?

When the master’s refinement reaches this stage, the Five Qi return to the origin, the Three Flowers gather at the crown, and the purple-blazing qi pervades all heavens and earths, gleaming and flashing. Around the body—left and right, above and below—radiant orbs of light appear. This is the wind, thunder, lightning, clouds, and rain inherent in one’s own body, transforming in unfathomable ways. What ghost would not submit?
Those who gaze upon me die; those who follow me are enfeoffed.
The Black Calendar of the Northern Numinous, the Nine Ugly Purple Lads.

When the master’s elixir is complete and the qi is abundant, the purple-blazing qi ascends to the crown—this is the fulfillment of qi.
Then, emit and guide it upward to the Crown Gate, drawing the qi in through the nose.
Next, exhale to distribute it left and right, then visualize.
Thus, the qi condenses and takes form, transforming the formless true essence to command and employ the formless ghosts and spirits—this is no idle fancy.
The Wind Earl and Rain Master, commanding thunder and leading the winds.

With one exhalation, refine and transform into the Rain Master before you.
With another exhalation, refine and transform into the Wind Earl behind you.
The true qi of one’s own body and its inherent true essence—this is the Thunder Duke.
The radiance of both eyes—this is the Lightning Mother.
This is what is meant by "practicing the precelestial Great Dao, employing one’s own original spirit."
If the master maintains this practice consistently from beginning to end, the true qi will be abundant. One may then sit and summon, stand and invoke, with responses as swift as a moment. Command spirits and employ generals, summon rain and stir winds—just as when using talismanic water to treat illness and expel evil. It is merely a matter of supplementing others’ insufficient qi with one’s own abundant qi. How could it fail to achieve immediate results?
Thunder Duke, Thunder Duke, possessed of great numinous power.
Where the celestial talisman arrives, thunderclaps resound in the empty sky.

When the master has completed the refinement and the spirit emerges from within outward, draw a talisman from the sleeve. Whether summoning thunder and lightning, commanding thunder and rain, or dispelling malevolence and eliminating demons, apply it as needed.
Recite the above four lines aloud, visualize as instructed, and point or wield the talisman to send it forth—there is nowhere it cannot go.

**Seated Practice with Hand Seals and Secret Techniques**
*"The autumn waves of green water in Hai, limpid and clear—*
First step through the Vast and Falling Dipper to the Star of Heavenly Glory, sit in full lotus, clench the fists, and seal the Hai trigram. Draw the qi of the Kidney Palace into the Heart Mansion to merge, then rinse the Flower Pool thirty-six times, visualizing the divine water as pure and limpid.
*A thousand-catty iron axe on You, light at the head—*
At *Shen*, press both hands into the seat, visualizing the thousand sinews and ten thousand veins all unobstructed. The divine water naturally turns the windlass along the spine, ascending directly to the Mud Pill Palace.
*By the river, the noon willow tree at Wei, blown down by the wind—*
Visualize the Heavenly Pillar collapsing the Milky Way, reaching the Twelve-Story Tower and entering the Three Passes. The Willow Star resides in the Heavenly Pond—this is the forehead.
*Even if I embraced Chang’e, I would not be startled."*

The master then swiftly seizes the axe and, following the qi, cleaves downward—whereupon the ghostly qi, ghostly fetus, and ghostly mass naturally dissipate.

chunks.original_text: 午 以两手相叉腹脐下，兜定，存神水灌五脏，不泄於外，姹女居中，制神水也。 白时白似天上雪，酉 二手雷局，口中出风云，出巽户震中会天雷，呬声，风自坎至兑过巽宫出。 红时红似猩猩血。 午 二手雷局，舌为雷斧，胆化为霹雳，存心神为欻火，领五炁雷公兴雨出天门，击巽风雨际会。 次二手雷局，从胁上直至耳后发去挑诀。 轻时轻似空中尘，巳 存身中诸神既出，双手掐中指，集脾神守己之神舍，吾身内外轻举也。 重时重似千斤铁。 寅 二手雷局，收诸神吸入腹中，各授雷霆正真之炁，存吾身体充实，重如千斤铁也。 织女四哥，子 二十八宿蝠星也，领八方八卦雷神，在身八节。 八节手足是也 勾娄吉利。 亥登僧得色。 急急如律令。 八神之名，以双手雷局，相合下坐，存雷神拥从，急如雷霆欻火，自艮上持令上坛，化合同符，召雷行事。 平日坐功 左手握雷局，坐乾向巽，先取巽炁一口下丹田，右手雷局，按脐下不动，左手点张使者诀，念咒曰： 唵吽吽。 三檀那韩难延乾夷勑。
chunks.translated_text:
At *Wu*, interlock the hands below the navel, cupping them firmly. Visualize the divine water irrigating the five viscera without leaking outward—here the Alchemical Maiden resides at the center, governing the divine water.

*White as snow in the heavens at You—*
Form the Thunder Mudra with both hands. From the mouth, issue wind and clouds, meeting the celestial thunder at *Xun* Gate and *Zhen* Palace. With a *xi* sound, the wind passes from *Kan* to *Dui*, exiting through *Xun* Palace.

*Red as the blood of the scarlet ape—*
At *Wu*, form the Thunder Mudra with both hands. Let the tongue become the thunder-axe, the gallbladder transform into thunderclaps. Visualize the heart-spirit as sudden flame, leading the Five Qi’s Thunder Duke to summon rain, emerging from the Heavenly Gate to strike the convergence of *Xun* wind and rain. Then, form the Thunder Mudra with both hands, tracing from the flanks up to the ears and releasing the *tiao* mudra.

*Light as dust in the void at Si—*
Visualize all spirits within the body having departed. Clasp the middle fingers with both hands, gathering the spleen-spirit to guard the self’s divine abode—thus the body, inside and out, becomes weightlessly buoyant.

*Heavy as a thousand-catty iron—*
At *Yin*, form the Thunder Mudra with both hands, drawing all spirits back into the abdomen, each infused with the qi of true thunder. Visualize the body filling and solidifying, heavy as a thousand-catty iron.

The Four Brothers of the Weaving Maiden—
the twenty-eight lunar lodgings’ bat star—command the eight directions’ eight trigrams’ thunder deities, stationed at the body’s eight nodes (the hands and feet):
*Gou-Lou* brings auspicious fortune,
*Hai* ascends the monk to attain form.

*Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and command!*

Invoke the eight thunder deities’ names. With both hands forming the Thunder Mudra, rise from the seated posture, visualizing the thunder spirits escorting you—swift as thunderclaps and sudden flame—ascending from *Gen* to hold the command upon the altar, merging and uniting with the talisman to summon thunder and enact the work.

**Daily Seated Practice:**
With the left hand forming the Thunder Mudra, sit facing *Xun* from *Qian*. First draw a mouthful of *Xun* qi into the Cinnabar Field. The right hand’s Thunder Mudra presses below the navel without moving. The left hand points the *Zhang* Envoy mudra while reciting the incantation:
*Om hum hum. San tan na han nan yan qian yi chi.*

chunks.original_text: 兑卦统雄兵，艮宫封鬼户。 离宫驾火轮，坎水涌波涛。 人门撼地轴，震雷霹雳声。 狂风摧山岳，诸将辅吾身。 太虚真，太灵真，速降临，速降临。 勑召雷霆诸司神，雷霆诸神速到坛，敢有后至先灭形。 急急如律令。 次召至前，云：仰劳神力，呼召玉枢斩勘蒋毕华雷陈五使者，分身化炁，降灌丹田。 再念勑召神咒曰： 吾奉上帝，勑召五雷。 云奔电掣，助我行威。 扫荡妖孽，馘魔伐非。 神光所照，万鬼俱摧。 流铃急召，雷火轰飞。 唵。 咤哩吃吽。 四目九丑，雷音电光摄。 取巽炁一口入丹田，再念咒曰： 阴阳辟开，五炁徘徊。 随吾指使，疾兴迅雷。 急急如律令。 神霄内功三九得七 每旦入靖端坐，叩齿，静定，内观其心，心无其心。 外观其形，形无其形。 远观其物，物无其物。
chunks.translated_text:
The *Dui* trigram commands the valiant hosts,
The *Gen* palace seals the demonic gates.
The *Li* palace mounts the wheel of fire,
The *Kan* waters surge with towering waves.
Entering the gate, they shake the earth’s axis,
The *Zhen* thunder crashes with a thunderous roar.
Fierce winds topple mountains and peaks,
All generals lend their strength to my body.
Great Void Perfected, Great Numinous Perfected,
Descend swiftly, descend swiftly!
By decree, I summon the thunder deities of all bureaus—
Let the thunder spirits hasten to the altar,
Those who dare arrive late shall first be destroyed in form.
*Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and command!*

Once summoned before me, proclaim:
"By your divine power, I call forth the Jade Pivot Executioners—Jiang, Bi, Hua, Lei, Chen, the Five Envoys—
To divide their forms and transform their *qi*,
Descending to infuse my Cinnabar Field."

Recite again the incantation of summons:
"I act by the August Emperor’s decree,
Summoning the Five Thunders.
Clouds race and lightning flashes,
Aiding me to manifest might.
Sweeping away demonic filth,
Beheading demons and vanquishing wrongs.
Where the divine radiance shines,
Ten thousand demons are all shattered.
The Flowing Bell urgently summons,
Thunder and fire surge in flight.
*Om. Tra li chi hum.*
Four-eyed, nine-uglies—
Seized by thunder’s voice and lightning’s glare."

Draw a mouthful of *Xun* *qi* into the Cinnabar Field, then recite:
"Yin and Yang part,
The Five *Qi* linger and sway.
Following my command,
Swiftly arise the rapid thunder.
*Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and command!*"

**Inner Cultivation of the Divine Empyrean: Three Nines Yield Seven**
Each dawn, enter the oratory and sit upright. Knock the teeth, settle the mind, and inwardly observe the heart—
The heart is no-heart.
Externally observe the form—
The form is no-form.
Observe afar all things—
Things are no-things.

chunks.original_text: 倏然忘形，存下丹田一婴儿如始生之状，五脏五色气载上中田，婴儿成真人，如己之形，四兽备列前后左右。 真人自层楼上泥九官，存三师在百宝之座，大如莲实，日月洞明。 真人跪诵，三师亦诵，口吐真炁，灌入兆身。 诵毕，次存火龙自心出，真人乘火龙旋斗历箕而上，径升霄极雷城之下。 诵了，以眉间冲开外雷府，诸玉阙之下，三师并坐，众真官将罗列左右，真人跪诵如前，不拘遍数，随意所祝。 复泥丸官下入中官，真人复还本形，归下丹田，坐青玉瑠璃圆光之中，三九日后，不必存婴儿，只存真人。 便自心上朝泥九，面礼真王，还归绛室，坐玉光中。 此道甚秘，兆谨行之。 尘虑稍里一毫，则不成究竟，非惟玄感藐然，则反获谴於仙曹也。 此乃诵章内功之妙。 具位臣姓某，以今伏遇某日，洁心口身，供养奏启玉清真王南极长生大帝，东极青华大帝太一救苦天尊，九天可韩文人朱陵度命天尊。 恭望天慈流光下照，为作证明。 臣好乐长生，□傅上道，为民疾苦，发心救治。 今先请正炁，辅行宝符，伏乞真王长生之炁，日精月华之炁下注。 臣三田九宫，百骸五体，八万四千毛窍，一万二千精光，三百六十骨节，内外洞明，营卫充足，三光混合，五炁朝元，一身清静，万炁弥罗，如遇行符遣将捉祟馘魔飞捉之时，通神立应。 上愿保国宁家，济人利物。 次及臣亿曾万祖，幽魂苦爽，超升天界，身位安康，面礼真王，飞升金阙。 臣下情无任激切，屏营之至，谨言。 结空成梵咒 结空成梵，真炁自生。 赤书玉字，八威龙文。 保制劫运，使天长存。 治病斩邪，万物安宁。 急急如长生大帝律令。 东向，心拜三十六拜，叩齿三十六通，存真炁结成神霄帝君，存三十二天金光玉台之炁琅光之中，见神霄王降有金台玉殿朱户绿窗，紫衣冕旎。 赤舄坐玉局，左有日，右有月，真王顶门降下青炁九芒，红紫三芒，拂拂下来。 吾以心红炁、肝青炁冲接交加，吸九九口，纳下丹田成日，八八口纳上田成月，六六口纳中丹田成珠一团，如水清莹，内有真王居中。 心拜九拜，咒曰： 三光洞明，上彻九天。 金房玉室，五宝芝生。 玄黄紫炁，来映我身。 玉童玉女，为我致灵。 九炁齐并，三光同軿。 上浮紫盖，升入紫庭。 急急如高上神霄玉清真王律令。 青华帝君，神霄真王。 扶桑日帝，西极月皇。 四真三炁，结青朗光。 即前四真圣精华之炁金而为一，结戌青艳葡萄之色，清莹如水。 镇布三田，上眉心中、心中下、脐下有三尸神，以金光制之。 内存真王。 真王见於青炁之中日吞夕拜，朝夕不倦上升金光。 吾身有金光，接三十二天。 日月内运，心肾内运相交，次以金光运用，接神霄天中真王，左日右月，以身中心肾相交，内运一处。 丹霄碧房。 此乃日月心肾各归一处嘘成一体，不见吾身成自然真王，次可以号召将兵也。 吸入琼光。 吸炁归丹田中妖鬼自除，三尸灭亡。 吾身妖炁巳除三九得七，面礼真王。 先取四真三炁，总入我丹田，如葡萄青莹之色，光映十方。 次借南方三炁真火炎发，至东方木，见火愈炽，略过坎位，即到西方金七数，化成真王，金色光明，我即是真王。 后出我之真人，拜真王三十六拜，诸将朝礼，此又一捷法也。
chunks.translated_text:
Suddenly forget the form, and visualize within the Lower Cinnabar Field an infant in its newborn state. The five *qi* of the five viscera, each bearing its corresponding color, ascend to the Middle Field. The infant transforms into a Perfected Person, mirroring your own form, with the Four Beasts arrayed before, behind, left, and right.

The Perfected Person ascends the layered tower to the Mud Palace of the Nine Palaces, visualizing the Three Masters seated upon jeweled thrones, vast as lotus seeds, the sun and moon radiantly clear. The Perfected Person kneels and recites, as do the Three Masters, their mouths emitting true *qi* that pours into your body. Upon completing the recitation, next visualize a Fire Dragon emerging from the heart. The Perfected Person mounts the Fire Dragon, spiraling through the Dipper and past the Winnowing Basket, ascending directly to the summit of the Empyrean beneath the Thunder Citadel.

After recitation, with the brows’ surge, open the outer Thunder Palace. Beneath the many Jade Towers, the Three Masters sit together, flanked by the host of Perfected Officials. The Perfected Person kneels and recites as before, without fixed repetitions, following the intent of the prayer. Then, descending from the Mud Palace of the Niwan to the Middle Palace, the Perfected Person reverts to its original form and returns to the Lower Cinnabar Field, seated within a sphere of azure jade and lapis lazuli radiance. After twenty-seven days, there is no need to visualize the infant—only the Perfected Person. Proceed from the heart upward to the Mud Palace of the Nine, bowing in homage to the Perfected King, then return to the Crimson Chamber, seated within the Jade Light.

This Way is most secret; practice it with utmost care. Should even a trace of worldly thought intrude, perfection will not be attained. Not only will the numinous response be faint, but one may incur reproach from the celestial bureaus. Such is the subtlety of the inner workings of recitation.

The humble official, your subject [Name], on this day prostrates with purified heart, mouth, and body, offering devotion and presenting this petition to the Jade Pure Perfected King, the Southern Culmen Longevity Great Emperor, the Eastern Culmen Azure Radiance Great Emperor, the Great Unity Savior from Suffering Heavenly Worthy, and the Nine Heavens’ Hanwen Personage, the Vermilion Mound Life-Deliverance Heavenly Worthy. May the celestial compassion cast its radiance downward to bear witness.

Your subject delights in longevity and has received the transmission of the supreme Dao, vowing to relieve the afflictions of the people. Now, first invoking the correct *qi* and aiding the circulation of the precious talismans, I humbly beseech the Perfected King’s longevity-*qi* and the *qi* of the sun’s essence and moon’s splendor to descend and infuse me. May my Three Fields and Nine Palaces, the hundred bones and five limbs, the eighty-four thousand pores, the twelve thousand rays of essence, and the three hundred sixty joints be inwardly and outwardly luminous, with *ying* and *wei* fully replete. May the Three Lights merge, the Five *Qi* return to the Origin, the body be purified, and the ten thousand *qi* suffuse the cosmos. When employing talismans, dispatching generals, or capturing malevolent spirits and vanquishing demons, may the response be immediate and the spirits obedient.

Above, I pray for the protection of the state and the peace of households, benefiting people and aiding all beings. Next, may my ancestors of myriad generations, the suffering souls in darkness, ascend to the celestial realms, their bodies secure and at peace, bowing before the Perfected King and ascending to the Golden Towers.

Your subject’s heart is filled with boundless reverence and devotion. Thus, I speak.

**Forming Emptiness into Brahma Mantra**
Form emptiness into Brahma, and true *qi* arises spontaneously.
Vermilion script on jade, the Eight Might Dragon Script.
Preserve and regulate the kalpic destiny, ensuring heaven’s eternal endurance.
Heal illness and sever evil, bringing peace to all things.
*Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the Longevity Great Emperor’s statute and command!*

Facing east, bow thirty-six times from the heart, knock the teeth thirty-six times, and visualize true *qi* coalescing into the Divine Empyrean Lord. Within the radiant *qi* of the Thirty-Two Heavens’ Golden Light Jade Terrace, behold the Divine Empyrean King descending upon a golden terrace and jade hall, with vermilion doors and emerald windows, clad in purple robes and regal cap. Crimson slippers rest upon a jade mat; to his left, the sun; to his right, the moon. From the crown of the Perfected King’s head descends azure *qi* with nine rays, red and purple with three rays, gently wafting downward. With the heart’s red *qi* and the liver’s azure *qi*, I surge upward to meet and intertwine, inhaling eighty-one breaths to gather in the Lower Field, forming the sun; sixty-four breaths to the Upper Field, forming the moon; thirty-six breaths to the Middle Field, forming a pearl, clear as water, within which the Perfected King resides.

Bow nine times from the heart and recite:
The Three Lights radiantly clear, ascending to the Nine Heavens.
Golden chambers and jade halls, where the Five Treasures and magic mushrooms grow.
Mysterious yellow and purple *qi* come to illumine my body.
Jade lads and jade maidens bring me their numinous power.
The Nine *Qi* unite as one, the Three Lights merge in harmony.
Above floats the Purple Canopy, ascending into the Purple Court.
*Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the Highest Divine Empyrean Jade Pure Perfected King’s statute and command!*

The Azure Radiance Emperor Lord, the Divine Empyrean Perfected King.
The Fusang Sun Emperor, the Western Culmen Moon Sovereign.
The Four Perfected and Three *Qi* coalesce into azure luminous radiance.
The *qi* of the Four Perfected Saints’ essence merges into one, forming a vibrant azure hue like grapevine, clear as water. It permeates the Three Fields. Above, at the center of the brows; in the middle, at the heart; below, beneath the navel—there dwell the Three Corpse Spirits, which the golden light subdues. Within, visualize the Perfected King. The Perfected King appears within the azure *qi*, consuming at dawn and bowing at dusk, tirelessly ascending in golden light.

My body possesses golden light, connecting to the Thirty-Two Heavens.
The sun and moon revolve within; the heart and kidneys intermingle.
Next, employ the golden light to connect with the Perfected King in the Divine Empyrean Heaven, the sun to his left, the moon to his right. With the heart and kidneys of my body intermingling, internally revolve them as one.
The Azure Empyrean Jade Chamber.
Here, the sun, moon, heart, and kidneys each return to their place, exhaled into unity, so that my body is no longer seen—only the spontaneous Perfected King. Then, one may summon generals and command troops.

Inhale the jade radiance.
Draw in *qi* to the Cinnabar Field, and malevolent spirits vanish of themselves; the Three Corpses perish.
The malevolent *qi* of my body is eradicated. Three nines yield seven; bow before the Perfected King.
First, gather the Four Perfected and Three *Qi*, uniting them in my Cinnabar Field, like the azure luster of grapes, its light illuminating the ten directions. Next, borrow the true fire of the Three *Qi* from the south, blazing forth to the east, where the wood sees the fire grow ever fiercer. Passing slightly beyond the Kan position, it reaches the west, the metal of the seven numbers, transforming into the Perfected King, golden and radiant. I am then the Perfected King. Afterward, my Perfected Person emerges, bowing thirty-six times before the Perfected King, as the myriad generals pay homage. This is yet another swift method.

**Inner Cultivation of the Divine Empyrean: Three Nines Yield Seven**

chunks.original_text: 服符诀 诵咒了，引东南神府之炁，青红紫色咽之。 每日服之，书符吞之，以舌拄上腭，请金光炁书，念三天隐讳及结空成梵咒，以金光炁咽下。 此乃萨真人上元一符，一日三符，九日二十七符，亦按三九得七也。 右念结空成梵咒，混合神炁书，入三天讳迭书符上。 念： 霹雳太子拔病源。 七字 火府坐功 平心静坐，凡用事，不拘时候，以眼观心，呵出秽炁三口，然后定息一百二十次，想两肾中闲一点之内，目想左右日月阴阳二炁，交娠於丹田，寂然无为，任其炁自然上升於心，复归於肾。 少顷二炁相会於一窍，结成一团金光，如火炼金丹丸相似，自非我有。 但见五炁出五脏，拥此一团金光，自尾闾夹脊而上至泥九。 片时，存泥九中日月洞明，遂觉华池中津液甘美，咽下一窍之中，寂然无为。 如两三次存用，则於临了呵出火炁两三口也。 内功秘旨 平心静坐，运吸祖炁，咽下洞渊官，而至玄枢官，下通九地九垒，随念而至玄枢官，取北炁一口，混合黄庭宫，拭面栉发，存洞白之炁自西方来，摩内关九数，外关九数。 自尾闾分自两边夹脊升上，至脑后合而为一，分为五路，入泥九宫，上至元皇府。 次运水火，交炼右边太阴黄华玉池真炁，混合真水左边太阳真炁，与心炁混合心中，发出真火，照映一身，内外光明。 雷晶梵炁坐功 凡坐先要澄心定虑，双手握固，以两目视中宫，内有金光一点，□字灿然。 运动转地轴，抹天关，到绛宫住，存南斗中第六星下有使者，从此处飞来，我作□字音合一，混成一金团，吸入中宫，再咽华池水下去，少顷，想浑身火炁，然后开目，报应非常。 五雷罡 罡咒 天雷隐隐，神雷轰轰。 龙雷作水，水雷波翻。 社令雷火，霹雳纵横。 神机一发，斩灭妖精。 上帝有敕，火急奉行。 顺罡 逆罡

**Method of Ingesting Talismans**

After reciting the incantation, draw the *qi* from the divine palace of the southeast—its hues of azure, crimson, and violet—and swallow it. Each day, inscribe the talisman and consume it. Press the tongue against the upper palate, invoke the *qi* of Golden Light, and recite the Hidden Names of the Three Heavens along with the *Siddhaṃ* Mantra for Empty Completion. Then swallow the *qi* of Golden Light. This is the Supreme Talisman of the First Heaven by Perfected Master Sa, taken thrice daily. Over nine days, twenty-seven talismans are ingested, following the principle of three nines yielding seven.

To the right: recite the *Siddhaṃ* Mantra for Empty Completion, blending divine *qi* to inscribe the talisman with the Hidden Names of the Three Heavens. Chant:
*"Thunder Prince, uproot the source of illness."*
Seven characters.

**Fire Palace Sitting Practice**
Sit in stillness with a tranquil heart. At any time of practice, gaze inward at the heart, exhale impure *qi* three times, then regulate the breath one hundred twenty cycles. Visualize within the space between the two kidneys a single point, where the *qi* of the left sun and right moon—yin and yang—conjoin in the Cinnabar Field. Abide in non-action, allowing the *qi* to ascend naturally to the heart, then return to the kidneys. After a moment, the two *qi* meet in one aperture, coalescing into a golden orb of light, like fire refining the golden elixir pill—yet it is not mine to claim. Witness the five *qi* emerging from the five viscera, encircling this golden orb, ascending from the coccyx along the spine to the Mud Pill Palace. For a time, visualize the sun and moon within the Mud Pill Palace shining brightly, then sense the sweet nectar of the Flowery Pond, swallowing it into the aperture. Abide in non-action. If practiced two or three times, conclude by exhaling fiery *qi* two or three times.

**Secret Principles of Internal Practice**
Sit in stillness with a tranquil heart, draw in the ancestral *qi*, and swallow it down to the Cavernous Abyss Palace, reaching the Mysterious Pivot Palace. It descends through the nine earths and nine ramparts, following intention to the Mysterious Pivot Palace. Draw a mouthful of northern *qi*, blending it in the Yellow Court Palace. Rub the face and comb the hair, visualizing the luminous white *qi* arriving from the west. Massage the Inner Pass nine times and the Outer Pass nine times. From the coccyx, the *qi* ascends along both sides of the spine to the back of the brain, merging into one. It then divides into five paths, entering the Mud Pill Palace and ascending to the Palace of the Primordial Sovereign. Next, circulate water and fire: refine the true *qi* of the Great Yin Jade Pool of Yellow Blossoms on the right, blending it with the true water of the Great Yang on the left. Unite it with the heart’s *qi*, emanating true fire that illuminates the entire body, inside and out, with radiant light.

**Thunder Crystal *Qi* Sitting Practice**
Before sitting, settle the mind and calm the thoughts. Clench both fists, gaze with both eyes at the Central Palace, where a single point of golden light shines, resplendent with the character *□*. Rotate the Earth Axis, sweep the Celestial Pass, and arrive at the Crimson Palace. Visualize the sixth star of the Southern Dipper, from which a messenger descends. Utter the sound *□*, merging into one golden orb. Draw it into the Central Palace, then swallow the nectar of the Flowery Pond. After a moment, envision the entire body suffused with fiery *qi*, then open the eyes—its efficacy is extraordinary.

**Five Thunder Ramparts**

**Rampart Incantation**
Heavenly thunder rumbles low,
Divine thunder roars mightily.
Dragon thunder stirs the waters,
Water thunder churns the waves.
Earthly thunder commands fire,
Thunderbolts strike without bound.
At the divine mechanism’s release,
Demons and spirits are annihilated.
By the Emperor’s decree,
Act swiftly and without delay.

**Following the Rampart**
**Reversing the Rampart**

chunks.original_text: 此乃每日雷霆所在之方，凡於行持之际，先於每日所居之方，取报应就起风云雷雨电，妙不可言。 如遇雷入中宫，则不可行事。 此日天将冠冕朝元，行法之士不可不知也。 元皇宝札 元皇宝札下。 □□饯□□□ □□□□□□ □□□□饳□ □□餤□□ 右札元皇金阙，准令奉行。 入事宝札一到，万神成听。 遵奉符命，火急施行。 故勑。 右札几祈晴黄纸朱书，祈雨黑纸墨书，祈雪青纸粉书。 神威咒 风雷起，电雷生，神威降，速临勑。 急急如雷霆律令勑。 右咒毕，取炁三口入五脏，以炁闭塞五脏作威。 次左手子文，右手亥文，默召起罡将军赵守炎，建罡将军熊修尚，发罡将军田斩妖，存三将军俱至面前。 次蹑罡外左转三匝，谓之制三魂定七魄，不得步於罡外方。 次步破地召雷罡。 诀曰 巽双离右坤单左，震右单行兑是双。 鬼户左行坎右步，天门双立望天罡。 罡咒 玉枢神罡，奉教真王。 破地召雷，诛伐凶殃。 五雷使者，速赴坛场。 随吾咒勑，驱遣不祥。 关启五部，大降神光。 注我笔砚，书篆天章。 水怪消灭。 鬼道奔亡。

Daily, note the direction where thunder and lightning manifest. When conducting rituals, first determine the direction of your current position to summon responsive wind, clouds, thunder, rain, and lightning—its wonders are beyond words. If thunder enters the Central Palace, do not proceed with affairs. On such days, the Celestial Generals don their crowns to attend the Primordial Origin; those who practice the arts must be aware of this.

**Primordial August Talisman**
*Primordial August Talisman descends.*
□□□□□□
□□□□□□
□□□□□□
□□□□□□

This talisman is addressed to the Golden Gates of the Primordial August, to be executed in accordance with the decree.
Once the *Talisman for Affairs* arrives, the myriad spirits obey in unison.
Follow the commands of the talisman and act swiftly.

**Decree:**
This talisman is inscribed on yellow paper with cinnabar for prayers of clear skies, on black paper with ink for prayers of rain, and on blue paper with white powder for prayers of snow.

**Divine Might Incantation**
Wind and thunder rise, lightning and thunder are born,
Divine might descends, swiftly heed the decree.
*Swiftly, swiftly, as in the thunder’s law and command!*

After reciting the incantation, draw *qi* three times into the five viscera, sealing them with *qi* to manifest authority. Then, with the *zi* trigram in the left hand and the *hai* trigram in the right, silently summon:
- Rampart General Zhao Shouyan,
- Rampart-Building General Xiong Xiushang,
- Rampart-Activating General Tian Zhanyao.
Envision the three generals all present before you.

Next, step outside the rampart and circle left three times—this is called "restraining the three hun and stabilizing the seven po." They must not step beyond the rampart’s bounds. Then, step the *Breaking Earth and Summoning Thunder Rampart*.

**Mnemonic Formula:**
*Xun* double, *Li* to the right, *Kun* single to the left,
*Zhen* single to the right, *Dui* is double.
Ghost’s Gate to the left, *Kan* to the right,
Heaven’s Gate stands double, gaze upon the Celestial Rampart.

**Rampart Incantation**
Jade Pivot Divine Rampart, obeying the Perfected King’s teachings,
Breaking earth to summon thunder, executing iniquity and calamity.
Five Thunder Messengers, swiftly attend the altar.
Follow my incantation and decree, dispelling misfortune.
Unlock the Five Departments, descending great divine radiance.
Infuse my brush and inkstone, inscribing celestial seal-script.
Water demons vanish,
Ghostly paths flee in terror.

chunks.original_text: 急急如雷霆律令。 诀曰 坎双艮只，左步交乾，双震上双行兑亦然。 坤只左离单右巽双立，三台归去便朝天。 诀曰 魁双二右三还左，四上双行五右单。 六左单行点为辅，天罡双立破坤关。 右法步至第三座斗了，左雷局，右剑诀，叉腰，即召将，存至入意，念咒曰： 天地日月星风雨雷电神，吾奉九天圣仙都董真人。 急急召五雷，神将速降临。 急急如上帝勑。 覆十咒 乾尊耀灵，坤顺内荣。 二仪交泰，六合利贞。 背天向地，永宁肃清。 应感元皇，上衣下裳。 震离坎兑，翊赞扶桑。 乾坤艮巽，虎步龙罡。 天门地户，人门鬼路。 卫我者谁，昊天旻苍。 今日禹步，上应天罡。 鬼神宾伏，下辟不祥。 所求如愿，应时灵光。 叱咄鬼贼，与道不顺，收付魁罡。 凡行持，变身为五雷使，或上真，或天师，次存风云雷雨电，皆从身中出接元帅，运肾中黑炁，闭步炁罡。 罡咒 玉枢神罡，奉教真王。 破地召雷，诛斩不祥。 五雷猛吏，速赴坛场。 听吾咒勑，驱遣不祥。 开乾破巽，大降神光。 急急如高上神霄真王律令。 白炁混沌灌我形，禹步相随登阳明。 天回地转步七星，蹑罡履斗跻九灵。 众神助我斩妖精，一切群魔皆灭形，万邪不干我长生。 上台一黄，去却不祥。 中台二白，护身镇宅。 下台三青，灭祸治病除精台星到处，大赐威灵。 急急如上帝救令。 已上三罡，并入罡星之上立，临目，心咒一遍。 次闭炁步，次存水火既济，罡星光芒照耀巽门，剑诀划八字，存雷神从地户拥出，到坛听令。 破霄诀 破霄罡 左手握紫微局，右手剑诀，叉腰，步罡五转，念咒曰： 风起雷震云，兴雨作电掣。 急急如律令。 取雷炁，次步风云雷雨电罡，想足后有雷公电母风伯、雨师云吏相随，存已身在九霄之上，发步五雷真罡，左手紫微局，念前咒，逐一点之至午上，用大指旋五转，念咒午上剔出，召五使者。 用此诀取巽炁，吹入坛前，然后任意行事。 阴斗罡 阳斗罡

*Kan* double, *Gen* single—step left to cross *Qian*;

Swiftly summon the Five Thunders,
Divine generals, descend with haste!

*Qian*’s honored radiance, *Kun*’s inner flourishing,

Upper robe, lower skirt.

Ghosts and spirits submit,
Banishing misfortune below.
All requests fulfilled, timely divine radiance.

Sword mudra traces the character "eight,"
Visualize thunder gods surging from the Earth Portal to the altar, awaiting commands.

Wind rises, thunder quakes, clouds gather,

Oṃ hūṃ hūṃ.

chunks.original_text: 晴青纸朱书 木生火土克水离虚火明 雨黄纸黑书 金生水水克火火克金坎中满 雪青纸白书 依本方先自东方木起乃是相生之意如果是木日 先从北方起 伐祟 金克水木生火土生金 右入五使者各念本咒掐本诀取本炁吹入符中 总召咒 天地黑暗，日月不分。 鬼神之道，无路逃奔。 急急如律令。 运雷咒 天地乘风，有命丰隆。 威振东南，敬佐西北。 处中央，敕摄九宫。 投汝名字，在吾掌中。 把揽天地，皆护我躬。 雷师往来，显现神通。 吾意某事，所指皆从。 如违口救，化汝作虫。 雷公将军，吾知汝名，吾知汝姓。 急急奉上帝勑。 又咒 勾底那，勾底那，拨拨那那。 娄那，吽呾那，底娄那，拔头那，拔耶那吽吽。 逐一方入雷霆玉经十五雷神。 东方 呼风亚，咄黎遮，叉鸠罗。 南方 冰鸠鸬，暖炎寮，石阿雄。 西方 旭执圭，多伯言，孙贞耳。 北方 昊猛，黄荆，刘振。 中央 荣从圣，朗重延，闪鸠陀。 五雷 咒曰 天雷隐隐，神雷轰轰。 龙雷作水，水雷波翻。 社令雷公，霹雳轰轰。 神机一发，万鬼潜形。 上帝勑下，符到奉行。 天雷威雄三郎，霹雳震天地。 神雷望江三郎，霹雳震天地。 龙雷石璧三郎，霹雳震天地。 水雷玉泉三郎，霹雳震天地。 社令雷兢渡三郎，霹雳震天地。 右书总摄将程曼卿在亥天门上，入五雷住处，要按生克，务在分明。 天雷柏灵踪，东卯木神雷戈应辰，南午火龙雷素琏琲，西酉金水雷印地良。 北子水社令雷冯道彰。 煞文土

For clear skies: write in vermilion on green paper—Wood engenders Fire, Earth restrains Water, *Li*’s empty Fire brightens.
For rain: write in black on yellow paper—Metal engenders Water, Water restrains Fire, Fire restrains Metal, *Kan*’s center brims full.
For snow: write in white on green paper—follow the original direction, beginning with the Wood of the East, for this is the meaning of mutual engendering. If the day belongs to Wood, begin instead from the North.
To exorcise malevolence: Metal restrains Wood, Wood engenders Fire, Earth engenders Metal.

Invoke the Five Envoys, each reciting their own incantation, forming their own mudra, drawing their own *qi*, and blowing it into the talisman.

**General Summoning Incantation**
Heaven and Earth plunged in darkness, Sun and Moon undivided.
The paths of ghosts and spirits—nowhere to flee.
*Hasten, hasten, as the statute decrees!*

**Thunder-Moving Incantation**
Heaven and Earth ride the wind, Fenglong bears the mandate.
Might shakes the Southeast, reverence aids the Northwest.
Dwelling in the Center, I command the Nine Palaces.
I cast your name into my palm—
Grasping Heaven and Earth, all guard my person.
Thunder Masters come and go, manifesting divine power.
Whatever I will, wherever I point, all obey.
Should you defy my word, I shall transform you into worms.
Thunder Duke, Thunder General—I know your name, I know your surname.
*Hasten, hasten, by the Emperor’s decree!*

**Supplementary Incantation**
*Goudina, goudina, bobo nana.
Lounuo, hōng dāna, dilouna, batouna, bayena hōng hōng.*
Invoke each direction in turn, entering the *Jade Scripture of Thunder*’s Fifteen Thunder Deities.

**East:** *Hufengya, duli zhe, chajiuluo.*
**South:** *Bingjiulu, nuan yanliao, shiaxiong.*
**West:** *Xuzhigui, duoboyan, sunzhenger.*
**North:** *Haomeng, Huangjing, Liuzhen.*
**Center:** *Rongcongsheng, Langchongyan, Shanjituo.*

**Five Thunders Incantation**
*Heavenly Thunder rumbles low, Divine Thunder crashes loud.
Dragon Thunder stirs the waters, Water Thunder churns the waves.
Earth’s Decree Thunder Duke—thunderbolts roar and shake!
One spark of divine mechanism—ten thousand ghosts conceal their forms.
By the Emperor’s decree, the talisman arrives to be obeyed.*

Heavenly Thunder’s might—Third Son, thunderbolts shake Heaven and Earth.
Divine Thunder’s gaze—Third Son by the river, thunderbolts shake Heaven and Earth.
Dragon Thunder’s stone wall—Third Son, thunderbolts shake Heaven and Earth.
Water Thunder’s jade spring—Third Son, thunderbolts shake Heaven and Earth.
Earth’s Decree Thunder—Third Son Jingdu, thunderbolts shake Heaven and Earth.

chunks.original_text: 壬癸日入，生加东南将，克加东中将。 中央　恶轰。 谨召中央霹雳摧魔使者，使者速起。 唵。 □吠曳萨嚩诃。 戊己日入，生加南东将，克加东西将。 五方蛮雷使者 东方变雷使者马郁林。 南方蛮雷使者郭元京。 西方蛮雷使者方仲高。 北方蛮雷使者邓拱辰。 中央蛮雷使者田元宗。 五方龙王 东方龙王孟元璋。 南方龙王季太平。 西方龙王师天从。 北方龙王尧宿。 中央龙王芮守先。 如书符，入诸将名讳了，却念现威神咒： 霹雳金光速现形。 一转六神藏，二转四煞没，三转动魁罡，四转雷火腾，祈晴雷公呜，祈雨五转霹雳发，入号巽上晅。 晴用朒。 雨用炓。 伐祟六转山鬼死，七转收摄，祈雨天下旱魃之鬼，祈晴天下阴魅妖龙作孽之鬼，治病一切邪炁鬼炁瘟疫恶毒不正之炁，诛伐一切凶神，赴吾都雷符下灭。 随方出笔符 右七转，发雷局并雷炁，运自己雷打入，存符为神府。 次运二炁交感。 舌拄上腭，呵炁为虹桥，直接巽户，雷神从上降下，次存斗一座，随方出笔。 起风向巳，起云向艮兑，起电向坤，符中作斗，左手剔。 祈雨 役使雷霆敕煞摄。 次念月生水轮神咒。 祈晴 天皇伽耶霹雳摄。 次念日生火轮神咒。 治病 雷威才震便惊人。 次念都叉咒，病在南方，子午斗入。 病在西#1方，辰戌斗入。 病在北方，午子斗入。 病在东方，戌辰斗入。 伐祟 亨轰滑辣救敬敕。
