By the Northern Emperor’s decree and the Four Saints’ command, dispatch a certain Celestial Marshal, together with a certain general of the ritual department, to lead a host of elite soldiers to the afflicted site. Enjoin the local earth gods, village deities, and the Six Spirits of the afflicted household to guard the sufferer’s body, settle their hun soul and po soul, and harmonize the six pulses. Carefully expel and seize all calamities within the sufferer’s body—every lurking demon, evil spirit, and malevolent entity—driving them swiftly from the afflicted form, allowing no escape. The flying talisman shall seize and bind them, delivering them for presentation. Report clearly and respond without delay. Swiftly obey!

By the Northern Emperor’s decree and the Four Saints’ command, dispatch the Four Great Celestial Marshals—Cui, Lu, Deng, and Dou—to supervise a certain commander, leading elite soldiers to the afflicted site. Compel the local earth gods, village deities, and the Six Spirits of the afflicted household to strictly capture all demonic thieves within the sufferer’s body—whether great demons, malevolent spirits, spectral entities, or wandering ghosts; whether premature deaths, familial or external curses, blade-wielding sorcerers, or mediums; whether consumptive plagues, childbirth deaths, nightmares, curses, gu poisons, pestilential plagues, or earthbound ghosts—seize them all, drive them swiftly from the afflicted body, and ensure the sufferer’s full recovery. Respond with haste!

Swiftly obey the Northern Emperor’s decree and the Four Saints’ command!

**Summoning Incantation**
Great Dao, great spirits,
Named Celestial Marshals.
Serving the Nine Heavens,
Receiving the Three Clarities’ charge.
Descending to the world,
Slaying and vanquishing demons.
When the Spirit Kings rage,
The Five Peaks crumble.
Binding and delivering hordes of demons,
Scattering ghostly legions.
Thousands upon thousands—behead them,
Ten thousand upon ten thousand—sever their forms.
On Mount Fengdu and the sacred rivers,
Those who resist are punished,
The fierce and defiant are executed,
The obedient and compliant live.
The submerged souls of the Six Heavens,
Each recorded by name.
Those who defy the Dao perish,
Those who follow the Dao prosper.
Flying calamities and baleful stars,
Dare not lurk in darkness.
The flying talisman seizes and captures,
Allowing no escape.

Swiftly obey the Northern Emperor’s decree and the Four Saints’ command!

**Central Altar Transformation**
When conducting rituals at the central altar, first summon and command the Four Divine Kings of Wind, Thunder, Water, and Fire, then supervise the Four Great Celestial Marshals. Descend into the talisman, transform the altar, and await orders.

By the Northern Emperor’s decree, dispatch Marshal Tianpeng to now command the Four Divine Kings of Wind, Thunder, Water, and Fire, and the Four Great Celestial Marshals of Thunder, Lightning, Mist, and Cloud. Supervise the ritual’s generals to search and seize demonic entities and malevolent spirits. Seal with the *shen* script and the qi of the southwest.

By the Northern Emperor’s decree, dispatch Vice-Marshal Tianyou to now command the Four Divine Kings of Wind, Thunder, Water, and Fire, and the Four Great Celestial Marshals of Thunder, Lightning, Mist, and Cloud. Supervise the ritual’s generals to search and seize improper ghosts and spirits. Seal with the *si* script and the qi of the southeast.

By the Northern Emperor’s decree, dispatch the Great Spirit of Black Slaughter to now command the Four Divine Kings of Wind, Thunder, Water, and Fire, and the Four Great Celestial Marshals of Thunder, Lightning, Mist, and Cloud. Supervise the ritual’s generals to search and seize great demons and malevolent spirits. Seal with the *hai* script and the qi of the northwest.

By the Northern Emperor’s decree, dispatch the Great Spirit Zhenwu to now command the Four Divine Kings of Wind, Thunder, Water, and Fire, and the Four Great Celestial Marshals of Thunder, Lightning, Mist, and Cloud. Supervise the ritual’s generals to search and seize improper karmic ties and vengeful spirits. Seal with the *hai* script and the qi of the northeast.

By the Northern Emperor’s decree and the Four Saints’ command, dispatch Marshal Cui, the Azure Dragon of the Left, and the Celestial Marshal of Thunder to join the Four Divine Kings of Wind, Thunder, Water, and Fire. Supervise the ritual’s generals to capture and seize demonic spirits. Seal with the *mao* script and the qi of the east.

By the Northern Emperor’s decree and the Four Saints’ command, dispatch Marshal Lu, the White Tiger of the Right, and the Celestial Marshal of Lightning to join the Four Divine Kings of Wind, Thunder, Water, and Fire. Supervise the ritual’s generals to capture and seize wayward ghosts and spirits. Seal with the *you* script and the qi of the west.

By the Northern Emperor’s decree and the Four Saints’ command, dispatch Marshal Deng, the Vermilion Bird of the Front, and the Celestial Marshal of Mist to join the Four Divine Kings of Wind, Thunder, Water, and Fire. Supervise the ritual’s generals to capture and seize malevolent spirits. Seal with the *wu* script and the qi of the south.

By the Northern Emperor’s decree and the Four Saints’ command, dispatch Marshal Dou, the Dark Warrior of the Rear, and the Celestial Marshal of Cloud to join the Four Divine Kings of Wind, Thunder, Water, and Fire. Supervise the ritual’s generals to capture and seize karmic ties and vengeful spirits. Seal with the *zi* script and the qi of the north.

**Eastern Decree of the Northern Emperor**
Summon the Wood Star. Seal with the *mao* script and the *xu* breath. Command the Seven Mansions of Jiao, Kang, Di, Fang, Xin, Wei, and Ji. Descend in the hours of *chen*, *mao*, and *yin* to spread starlight and shroud, seizing all malevolent ghosts and spirits—allowing no escape.

Swiftly obey the Northern Emperor’s decree!

**Western Decree of the Northern Emperor**
Summon the Metal Star. Seal with the *you* script and the *xi* breath. Command the Seven Mansions of Kui, Lou, Wei, Mao, Bi, Zui, and Shen. Descend in the hours of *xu*, *you*, and *shen* to spread starlight and shroud, seizing all malevolent ghosts and spirits—allowing no escape.

Swiftly obey the Northern Emperor’s decree!

**Southern Decree of the Northern Emperor**
Summon the Fire Star. Seal with the *wu* script and the *he* breath. Command the Seven Mansions of Jing, Gui, Liu, Xing, Zhang, Yi, and Zhen. Descend in the hours of *wei*, *wu*, and *si* to spread starlight and shroud, seizing all malevolent ghosts and spirits—allowing no escape.

Swiftly obey the Northern Emperor’s decree!

**Northern Decree of the Northern Emperor**
Summon the Water Star. Seal with the *zi* script and the *chui* breath. Command the Seven Mansions of Dou, Niu, Nü, Xu, Wei, Shi, and Bi. Descend in the hours of *chou*, *zi*, and *hai* to spread starlight and shroud, seizing all wayward ghosts and spirits—allowing no escape.

Swiftly obey the Northern Emperor’s decree!

By the Northern Emperor’s decree and the Four Saints’ command, dispatch the Great Spirit of the Wind Department, Kun Bo, from the *si* Palace. Swiftly arise and sweep away all malevolent forces. Seal with the *xun* script.

By the Northern Emperor’s decree and the Four Saints’ command, dispatch the Great Spirit of the Thunder Department, Dou Xian. With thunderous might, strike down and vanquish all demonic spirits. Seal with the *zhen* script.

By the Northern Emperor’s decree and the Four Saints’ command, dispatch the Great Spirit of the Fire Department, Song Yan. With blazing flames stretching a thousand miles, melt and consume all. Seal with the *li* script.

By the Northern Emperor’s decree and the Four Saints’ command, dispatch the Great Spirit of the Water Department, Wen Ze. With the nine rivers’ deities, surge boundlessly. Seal with the *kan* script.

Once the talisman is complete, add a *chi* character at its center. Seal with the *sha* script and the qi of the north for activation.

**Inscription for Application**
By the Northern Emperor’s decree and the Four Saints’ command, dispatch the immortals and sages of the Four Departments of Wind, Thunder, Water, and Fire, the Four Great Spirit Kings—Bo, Xian, Ze, and Yan—and the Four Great Celestial Marshals of Thunder, Lightning, Mist, and Cloud. Summon winds, hurl fire, unleash rain, and roll thunder. Lead the celestial soldiers, supervise the ritual’s generals and their elite troops, and proceed to the afflicted site. chunks.original_text: 真武大圣，天武天童。 内名玄武，寅文严摄北邓。 北极四圣，显灵威雄。 下游尘世，上登玉隆。 坐南斗内，立北斗中。 铁轮飞西，火车驾东。 驱雷摄电，奔云走风。 天地黑暗，日月昏蒙。 天兵队队，天马憧憧。 皂纛赫赫，天鼓冬冬。 青龙甲乙，卯文四目老翁。 流星喷火，震响帝钟。 朱雀丙丁，午文朱陵火宫。 掷火万里，流铃八冲。 白虎庚辛，酉文皓灵秉戎。 前驱乌鸦，后放毒蜂。 玄武壬癸，子文水火交攻。 天关地轴，毒列凌锋。 勾陈胜蛇，煞文戊己土封。 天皇上帝，坐镇圆穹。 玉枢化形，都天雷公。 总摄雷将，雷水火风。 金精猛兽，白青骏。 掌握天令，诛星斩虹。 森罗万象，布化高穹。 风火律令，变化无穷。 黑腾黑毒，紫勾紫溶。 普天遍黑，法界通红。 红光闪烁，黑炁昏蒙。 阴炁冰冰，阳炁烘烘。 雷仙靊窿，风仙水□。 雨仙房英，电仙娄容。 霹雳震黑，飞戈走献。 移山拔树，云雾阴浓。 飞砂走石，驱鞭火龙。 欻火大神，正直公忠。 朱发巨翅，双目耀彤。 雷钻雷锤，雷斧雷凿。 破山山崩，覆海海淙。 受命北极，四圣飞躬。 古精恶怪，靡不灭踪。 横天火罩，万里通熔。 化为飞灰，飘以□□。 东南日火，其神祝融。 西方金火，其神楚澧。 东北雷火，其神宋恭。 西北烈火，其神马娀。 天上地下，火仙火童。 火龙火马，火犀火猔。 八卦火虎，五方火龙。 飞火掷火，收捕妖丛。 符命告下，火急催跫。 敢有中□，吾有玄琮。 急急奉北极紫微大帝律令敕。 行符式 当用表黄纸一张，但取方，余者截去，取角折。 先以黑笔批司额两头行移，一切完备，吹召帅将作用於当中，先下一印为定位，然后於上书符，又用一印盖之，司额下，一印，批语上一印，如品字。 然后熏燥，以钱马焚之，专以飞符，定其吉凶。 如遇飞天走地大魔神祟，凶神恶鬼，妖怪精灵，魑魅山魈之类，伤害生民，罪至可灭者。 先须醮奏。 上帝，大犒诸将，毕用黄罗一丈二尺，取方，书符。 更以铁砖一片，长七寸，阔一尺，厚半寸，面书奉敕施行，及书邪祟过犯法官，具位姓名押字年月日时告行，背书玉帝名，两边书四圣名，下四丁四神名，於符上加三台阴阳斗，连砖沈於作孽处。 如在陆者，不须铁砖，但书黄罗符上，亦得以钱马焚之。 如是中等顽逆之祟，只以檄书行聚坛符，於称臣承诰奉行后列北帝位。 如行雨则用铁牌书符，投於潭中，如常行持，则用常式。 行持式 凡行持，依式发符，毕回身念咒，下罩。 咒曰 北地敕召，罗土宿。 丑未文煞炁飞空，卯文天地沈暗。 辰文日月失光，玉文邪逢裂碎。 子文无路迷蒙，子文急急锁定，寅文山河海风，离文急急奉北帝敕四圣令。 右咒毕，双手大煞文，取北炁，再用双手斗印交加，，左手阳斗，右手阴斗，撒去，念罩咒，掐诀。 咒曰 北帝敕召，东震卯文西兑，酉文南离午文北坎。 子文开天门，亥文闭地户，巽文留人门，坤文塞鬼路。 艮文上不通风过，卯文下不容水流。 煞文大魔神祟，风刀斩头。 人来无踪，鬼来迷路。 谨请东方甲乙木十万天丁锁地轴，小指勾南方丙丁火十万天丁齐降赴，四指勾西方庚辛金十万天丁尽降临，三指勾北方壬癸水十万天丁食恶鬼，二指勾中央戊己土十万天丁齐卫护。

The Great Sage True Warrior, Heavenly Martial Heavenly Youth.
His inner name is Dark Warrior, the Tiger Seal sternly commands the Northern Deng.
The Four Saints of the Northern Culmen manifest their mighty power.
Below they roam the mortal world, above they ascend to Jade Prosperity.
Seated within the Southern Dipper, standing amid the Northern Dipper.
Iron wheels fly to the west, fire chariots drive to the east.
Driving thunder and seizing lightning, racing clouds and rushing winds.
Heaven and earth turn dark, sun and moon grow dim.
Heavenly soldiers march in ranks, heavenly steeds gallop in throngs.
Black banners blaze, celestial drums resound.
The Azure Dragon of Jia-Yi, the Rabbit Seal of the Four-Eyed Old Man.
Shooting stars spew fire, the Emperor’s Bell shakes with thunder.
The Vermilion Bird of Bing-Ding, the Horse Seal of the Vermilion Fire Palace.
Hurling fire for ten thousand miles, streaming bells through eight directions.
The White Tiger of Geng-Xin, the Rooster Seal of the Radiant Spirit holding the war banner.
Ugly crows lead the vanguard, venomous wasps follow in the rear.
The Dark Warrior of Ren-Gui, the Rat Seal of water and fire clashing in attack.
Heaven’s Gate and Earth’s Pivot, poisonous blades arrayed in sharp formation.
The Coiling Chen serpent, the Execution Seal of Wu-Ji’s earthen enclosure.
The Heavenly Thearch sits enthroned in the round firmament.
The Jade Pivot transforms its form, the All-Heaven Thunder Duke.
Commanding all thunder generals, thunder, water, fire, and wind.
Fierce beasts of metal essence, white unicorns and azure steeds.
Grasping the celestial decree, slaying stars and severing rainbows.
The myriad phenomena of the cosmos spread and transform across the high firmament.
Wind and fire as decrees, their transformations boundless.
Black surging, black poison, purple hooks, purple dissolution.
All under heaven turns black, the dharma realm glows red.
Crimson light flashes, black qi shrouds in gloom.
Yin qi chills like ice, yang qi blazes like fire.
Thunder immortals rumble, wind immortals and water [immortals].
Rain immortals Fang Ying, lightning immortals Lou Rong.
Thunderclaps shake the darkness, flying spears and rushing offerings.
Moving mountains and uprooting trees, clouds and mist thicken in gloom.
Flying sand and rolling stones, driving whips of fire dragons.
The Swift Fire Great Spirit, upright and loyal.
Crimson hair and mighty wings, both eyes glowing red.
Thunder drills, thunder hammers, thunder axes, thunder chisels.
Shattering mountains to collapse, overturning seas to roar.
Receiving the Northern Culmen’s command, the Four Saints take flight in person.
Ancient essences and evil specters—none escape annihilation.
The Cross-Sky Fire Net spans ten thousand miles, all melting in its passage.
Transformed into flying ash, scattered upon the [winds].

In the southeast, the Fire of the Sun—its spirit is Zhu Rong.
In the west, the Fire of Metal—its spirit is Chu Li.
In the northeast, the Fire of Thunder—its spirit is Song Gong.
In the northwest, the Fierce Fire—its spirit is Ma Rong.
Above in heaven and below on earth, fire immortals and fire youths.
Fire dragons and fire horses, fire rhinos and fire hounds.
The Fire Tigers of the Eight Trigrams, the Fire Dragons of the Five Directions.
Flying fire and hurled fire, capturing and seizing demonic throngs.
The talisman’s command is issued—hasten with urgent steps.
Should any dare to obstruct, I possess the Dark Jade Seal.

**Execute this with utmost urgency by the edict of the Northern Culmen Purple Tenuity Great Emperor.**

**Talisman Procedure:**
Use one sheet of yellow paper, cut to a square, trimming excess corners. First, with black ink, write the bureau’s header at both ends of the document. Once all is prepared, invoke the marshal generals to act at the center. First, impress one seal to fix the position, then write the talisman above it, and seal it again. Below the bureau’s header, impress one seal; above the endorsement, impress another—arranged like the three points of a triangle. Then dry it over incense, burn paper money and horses with it, and dispatch the flying talisman to determine fortune or misfortune.

When encountering flying heavenly or roaming earthly great demonic spirits, malevolent gods, evil ghosts, or demonic entities—mountain specters, sprites, and the like—harming the people, whose crimes warrant annihilation: first perform a jiao offering and memorial. Reward the generals lavishly, using twelve feet of yellow silk, cut to a square, to write the talisman. Further, take an iron brick, seven inches long, one foot wide, and half an inch thick. On its face, write "By edict, execute" and record the transgressions of the demonic entity, the official’s rank, name, and the date and time of the order. On the reverse, write the Jade Emperor’s name, the Four Saints’ names on either side, and the names of the Four Ding and Four Spirits below. On the talisman, add the Three Terraces, yin-yang, and the Dipper, then sink the brick at the site of the transgression. If on land, the iron brick is unnecessary—simply write on the yellow silk talisman and burn it with paper money.

For mid-level obstinate demonic entities, use a proclamation written on a talisman for the altar assembly, listing the Northern Emperor’s position after "Your servant, receiving the decree, obeys."

For rain rituals, use an iron tablet inscribed with the talisman and cast it into a deep pool. For regular practice, use the standard form.

**Standard Practice Procedure:**
When performing the ritual, dispatch the talisman according to the form, then turn around and recite the incantation while casting the net.

**Incantation:**
By the Northern Land’s edict, summon Luo [and] Tu Constellations.
The Ox-Ram Execution Seal sends qi flying through the void, the Rabbit Seal darkens heaven and earth.
The Dragon Seal dims sun and moon, the Jade Seal shatters evil on encounter.
The Rat Seal leaves no path in confusion, the Rat Seal locks swiftly in place.
The Tiger Seal commands mountains, rivers, seas, and winds, the Fire Seal urgently obeys the Northern Emperor’s edict and the Four Saints’ command.

After reciting the incantation, form the Great Execution Seal with both hands, draw the northern qi, then cross the hands in the Dipper Seal—left hand for the yang Dipper, right hand for the yin Dipper—and release. Recite the Net-Casting Incantation while making the mudra.

**Incantation:**
By the Northern Emperor’s edict, summon the east’s Thunder Rabbit Seal, the west’s Lake Rooster Seal, the south’s Fire Horse Seal, the north’s Water Rat Seal.
The Rat Seal opens the Heavenly Gate, the Pig Seal closes the Earthly Door.
The Wind Seal keeps the Human Gate, the Earth Seal blocks the Ghost Road.
The Mountain Seal above allows no wind to pass, the Rabbit Seal below permits no water to flow.
The Execution Seal slays demonic spirits—wind blades sever heads.
People come without trace, ghosts come lost on the path.

Respectfully invoke:
The east’s Jia-Yi Wood—one hundred thousand Heavenly Ding lock the Earth’s Axis (hook with the little finger).
The south’s Bing-Ding Fire—one hundred thousand Heavenly Ding descend in unison (hook with the ring finger).
The west’s Geng-Xin Metal—one hundred thousand Heavenly Ding all descend (hook with the middle finger).
The north’s Ren-Gui Water—one hundred thousand Heavenly Ding devour evil ghosts (hook with the index finger).
The center’s Wu-Ji Earth—one hundred thousand Heavenly Ding guard and protect (hook with the thumb).

**Execute this with utmost urgency by the edict of the Northern Culmen Purple Tenuity Great Emperor.**

**Back: Dark Warrior, Yunzi Script**

Grasp the Five Directions Mudra—

□□□□□□□
Dispatch General So-and-So to swiftly seize and bind the afflicting spirit.

Those who commit evil die; the compassionate live.
Sever heads, cut off feet, pound their forms to dust.

**Talisman for Curing Illness and Expelling Evil:**
Upon arrival, act swiftly.
*Swiftly execute by the Northern Emperor’s Statutes and Decrees.*

**Right Talisman:** Write with ink on yellow paper.
Grasp the *sha* script, draw in Northern *qi*.
Visualize heaven and earth plunged into darkness, lightning flashing amid thunderclaps—
Inhale it into the talisman, then burn it in a water vessel, envisioning the transformation.

**Black Wind Water Incantation:**
Black *Qian*, *Tuo*, *Gen*, coiled *Xun*, vast *Kun*, black *Zhen*, *Dui* seizes.

By the Northern Emperor’s decree,
Heaven is yang; earth is yin.
Ice-pure Nine *Qi*, Dragon Lords of the Four Seas.
Toad, eel, shrimp, Iron-Faced General.
River Adversary of the Nine Rivers, Water Spirit □.
*Chou* script, *Zi* script—*Ming*, *Kun* script—*Zi Chun*,

Recite the incantation:

*Flying Fire Cloud Tiger Rider, Flying Water Cloud Dragon-Tiger Rider,*

**Sha Script, Northern Qi:**
**Golden Rope Hanging Ghost Talisman**
Grasp the Great *Sha* Script, draw in Northern *qi* three times, and blow.
Virtually inscribe upon the back of the child’s head,
Commanding it to bind tightly.
Visualize the spirit being hoisted up, then apply the Fengdu Interrogation Method.

**Prison Interrogation Talisman:**
Heaven is round—*Hai* script.
Earth is square—*Si* script.
Thunderfire flashes—*Li* script.
Flying Heavenly Messengers, General Ai—arrive swiftly.
Next, grasp the *sha* script, draw in Northern *qi*,
Recite the generals’ secret incantations, envisioning the transformation for interrogation.
Proceed according to the prescribed method.

**Incantation:**
Heaven is round; earth is square.
Thunderfire flashes.
Seize the demonic thief, press it into the prison bed.
*Swiftly execute by the Northern Emperor’s Four Sage Decree.*

**Prison-Locking Method:**
Flying Heavenly Great Sage, Seven Kings, Supreme Sage, Nine Heavenly Messengers,
Prison Warden General, Riding Officers—swiftly lock the prison gates.
Next, perform the *sha* script *Ding* step at the Heavenly Gate,
Draw in Northern *qi* and blow.

**Copper-Headed, Iron-Footed, Fire-Eyed, Golden-Pupiled Three Officials’ Messengers,**
**Iron-Armored General—by the Supreme One’s decree, lock down the demonic essence.**

For all ritual procedures, use red beans and iron filings in any quantity. Hold the *sha* script in the left hand and the beans in the right, then recite the incantation:

**Incantation:**
The Five *Qi* of the Dark Heaven,
The Celestial Pivot and Earthly Axis.
Water and fire achieve balance,
Yin and Yang reverse their course.
Thunder, lightning, clouds, and mist—
fling fire with swift urgency.
Marshal Black *Sha*,
Dark Warrior of the Northern Pole.
Recall the Ten Thousand Generals,
soaring through heaven, overturning earth.
Summon the sages, call forth the hosts,
transforming into a myriad of true beings.
Subdue and capture demonic fiends,
purifying the Three Realms.
Should any dare rebel,
behead them and present their heads.
*Swiftly execute by the Northern Emperor’s Four Sage Decree.*

Upon completing the incantation, draw the *qi* of the Heavenly Gate’s fire and scatter it over the beans, visualizing them as firecrackers, then cast them away.

**Fire-Wheel Sand Formula**
For all ritual procedures, use seven packets of iron sand, forty-nine red beans from seven households, forty-nine inches of grass, and a small amount of cinnabar. Mix evenly, then with the left hand in the *Wu* script, draw Southern *qi* and lightly stir-fry in an iron pan over fire.

Next, silently recite the incantation:
The true fire of the upper realm descends,
the true water of the lower realm ascends.
Blazing true fire enters—
demons slain dissolve into liquid.
*Swiftly execute by the Northern Emperor’s Four Sage Decree.*

After the incantation, recite again:
By the Northern Emperor’s decree, summon the Horned Spirit of the East,
descend the true essence of *Jia-Yi qi*,
the *Mao* script’s Eastern *qi* returns to its primordial spirit, entering the sand to slay demonic essence.
By the Northern Emperor’s decree, summon the White Tiger Spirit of the West,
descend the true essence of *Geng-Xin qi*,
the *You* script’s Western *qi* returns to its primordial spirit, entering the sand to slay demonic essence.
By the Northern Emperor’s decree, summon the Spirit of Numinous Light of the South,
descend the true essence of *Bing-Ding qi*,
the *Wu* script’s Southern *qi* returns to its primordial spirit, entering the sand to slay demonic essence.
By the Northern Emperor’s decree, summon the Yin Emperor Spirit of the North,
descend the true essence of *Ren-Gui qi*,
the *Zi* script’s Northern *qi* returns to its primordial spirit, entering the sand to slay demonic essence.
By the Northern Emperor’s decree, summon the Yellow Prime Spirit of the Center,
descend the true essence of *Wu-Ji qi*,
the *Sha* script’s primordial spirit returns, entering the sand to slay demonic essence.

After the incantation, visualize thunderfire combined with the Four Sage talisman ash. With the left hand in the Northern Emperor’s mudra and the right hand scattering, recite the *Tianpeng* incantation and the *Great Majestic Virtue* incantation to amplify the effect. Eradicate ancient trees, malevolent shrines, and stubborn spirits—results will manifest immediately.

**Green Vine Entanglement Formula**
When thunder’s might shakes and startles the foe,
with the right hand in the sword mudra and the left in the Dipper seal, recite the *Golden Light* incantation. Trace the mudra—if a powerful demon approaches, shout loudly upon completing the tracing, and the demon will collapse. Then bind it with the method.

**River-Cutting Formula**
The black waters of the Northern Abyss surge forth—
swiftly bind and subdue demonic spirits.
With the left hand in the *Zi* script and the right in the *Great Sha* mudra, splash the black water before you. Retreat a step and trace a river—should the demon attempt to cross, bind it at once.

**Demon-Slaying Formula**
**Step-Mudra Incantation**
Ascend to *Yangming*, summon the thunder gods.
Drive thunder and lightning, spread wind and clouds.
Roar with thunderclaps, slay demonic hordes.
The Five Thunder Generals decapitate demonic essence.
*[...]* the Two Sages, *[...]* the Luminous Rear,
*[...]* left and right, *[...]* stars reveal their forms.
*Swiftly execute by the Northern Emperor’s Four Sage Decree.*

**Three Terraces Incantation**
The Upper Terrace’s *Xu Jing*,
the Middle Terrace’s *Liu Chun*,
the Lower Terrace’s *Qu Sheng*—
wherever the Terrace Stars arrive, they envelop my form.
Once my body is illuminated and captured,
the myriad spirits hasten swiftly.
*Swiftly execute by decree.*

**Sword-Consecration Incantation**
The Dark Sword emerges,
Heavenly Soldiers follow in guard.
Heavenly Dipper’s *sha* spirits,
Five Dippers lend their aid.
Point to heaven—heaven darkens,
point to earth—earth splits.
Point to mountains—mountains crumble,
point to demons—demons perish.
With a single strike of the divine sword,
ten thousand demons are annihilated.
*Swiftly execute as decreed by law.*

After the incantation, press the *sha* script, gather *sha qi*, and blow upon the sword.

**Beheading Incantation**
The Black Banner of the Heavenly Emperor,
the Dark Emperor’s decree.
Summon the executioners of Fengdu—
proceed according to the law.

**Awakening-Soul Incantation**
The pure waters,
illuminated by sun and moon.
Within lies the Northern Dipper,
within it, the Three Terraces.
Sprinkle the divine water—
ghosts emerge, souls return.
*Swiftly execute as decreed by law.*

**Transforming-As-You-Will Pavilion Incantation**
*Om [...] hum tra svāhā.*
Recite without limit.

chunks.original_text: 右法如有家亲入於邪党者，当奏太上，乞赦死魂一切罪愆，特赐仙衣美食，令其安养，听候受度。 行持则念咒，化馆一座，百物衣食俱备，金光布罩，令将送魂入馆，布金光封之，差将守护。 急追魂咒 黑煞墨笔迭书 黑煞，方知道微，臣又来催。 煞文北炁。 右法运笔，念咒七遍成符，作纸捻烧烟搐鼻，立醒。 入门念咒行持至患家用 天煞地煞，年煞月煞，日煞时煞，门丞户尉，当界土地，一切邪神，自然急煞摄。 双煞文北炁 锁门咒 天锁地锁，一切邪神，与吾锁住，莫令走透。 急急如律令。 双巳文北炁。 泰山塞门诀 泰山塞门邪鬼灭，一切冤魂尽收摄。 右法默召将帅，仍用泰山塞了门户。 飞符报应方诀 符到东方人便安，狂至西方命不然。 大忌南方骤飞起，平过疾病主缠绵。 北方绝地符才到，此人必定入黄泉。 东北有邪落地死，东南神祟祸牵连。 西南平过天催愿，西北符坠病如前。 符分两片分明死，穿梁过柱愿相煎。 埋金亢金纸中应，两项平平可保全。 唯有献金亦灾滞，急起急坠命难延。 鼠窜有祟随方治，符上冲天患得痊。 骤起祟多宜摄附，钱飞符陷必迍遭。 符作车输如雷响，急神催愿非神天。 忽变碎星人难敕，偶尔合形兔祸愆。 此是神仙真妙诀，不遇神仙莫与传。 东方吉如高起或兖过，不妨无祟，忌三 七日。 南方恶大忌骤起，主危惊，如平过不妨， 只主病变兖过有邪。 西方凶大忌狂飞，主危惊衮过，有祟，平 过不妨，忌三五日。 北方绝狂，忌三七日，死衮表过不可救，如 飞过则有邪。 东北方鬼户飞过有祟病，未可保，如狂 飞过衮动应落此方者死。 东南方地户三两日，大凶，高飞神祟，平飞神催愿不妨，大惊小怪。 西南方人门三四日，大凶，其余炎过骤起，径落此方者皆凶，平过者却有愿动。 西北方天门若病者轻，符坠此方，立可病者头轻脚重。 冲天符直冲天倾下，不妨，更看下方所断。 分形符起吹作两片者，为之分形，凶死。 埋金符不起陷於纸灰中者，谓之埋金，不妨，仍可保。 亢金符不起，再从地上插入纸灰下者。 谓之亢金，不妨。 献金符不起浮於纸灰上，主迟滞难得可。 穿梁符起穿梁者，催愿。 贴梁符起贴梁楝脊者，催愿。 钱飞符未起，钱灰先起，人凶财散，不好。 作雷符作灰，与纸灰旋如雷声急，神催愿信，主凶。 车轮符立地上，如轮车旋者，岳神催愿。 碎星符起作三四片，无一片全者，主死。 合形符起作三两片，顷再合者，主病人不死，亦无大害。 上下符起，或上或下者，主进退不妨。 鼠窜符不起，立地上，如鼠窜者，有祟，看其方所治之。 平起平坠符平起平坠屋下，有伏尸，符镇之。 返形符不起，临纸过方起者，返形，不妨。 急坠符忽飞起急坠，不可救慢，治之不妨。 骤化符方着火，径如雷飞者，凶神急取，最宜摄附。 上坛使五斗魁罡印式 诀曰 左手斗印，右手曲四五指，直二三指，大指格煞文，仍以左手印煞文，来合右手煞文，以三指交加，拂额用之。 双手两二指交定，两小指交定，两三四指曲着，两大指俱陷煞文。 遁月方 正时上起，初一做二十八宿，逆轮至本日位上，即是。 遁天罡 月将加正时，逢辰是天罡。 正月起亥，逆转至月建位上，加戍，顺转逢辰，即是天罡位指处。

If a family member has fallen into demonic company, one should petition the Most High, beseeching forgiveness for the dead soul’s every transgression, and specially bestow upon them immortal robes and fine food, allowing them to rest in peace while awaiting salvation. In practice, recite the incantation and conjure a pavilion fully furnished with all manner of clothing and provisions, enveloped in golden light. Then escort the soul into the pavilion, seal it with golden light, and dispatch guardians to protect it.

**Summoning-Soul Incantation**
With black *sha* ink, write in succession:
*Black sha*, only then does one know the subtle,
your servant comes again to hasten.
*Sha* script, northern *qi*.

For this method, wield the brush while reciting the incantation seven times to form the talisman. Twist paper into a taper, burn it to produce smoke, and waft it toward the nose to instantly revive.

Upon entering, recite the incantation and proceed to the afflicted household, employing:
*Heavenly sha, earthly sha,
year sha, month sha,
day sha, hour sha,
gate marshals, door wardens,
local earth deities,
all demonic spirits—
naturally and swiftly seize and subdue.*
*Double sha* script, northern *qi*.

**Sealing-Gate Incantation**
*Heavenly lock, earthly lock,
all demonic spirits—
be bound by me,
let none escape.*
*Swiftly execute as decreed by law.*
*Double si* script, northern *qi*.

**Mount Tai Gate-Sealing Formula**
Mount Tai seals the gate—demons perish,
all vengeful souls are gathered and subdued.

For this method, silently summon the generals and marshals, then use Mount Tai to seal the household gates.

**Flying Talisman Response Divination**
When the talisman reaches the east, the person recovers;
if it wildly flies to the west, their life is imperiled.
Greatly avoid sudden flight to the south—
if it passes smoothly, illness lingers.
When the talisman reaches the northern dead land,
this person will surely enter the Yellow Springs.
If evil lies in the northeast, they will die upon falling;
if in the southeast, malevolent spirits bring misfortune.
If it passes smoothly in the southwest, heaven hastens vows;
if it falls in the northwest, illness persists as before.
If the talisman splits in two, death is certain;
if it pierces beams or crosses pillars, vows torment them.
Burying gold or resisting gold in the paper ash brings fulfillment—
both outcomes may ensure safety.
Only offering gold causes calamity and stagnation—
swift rise and fall foretell a life cut short.
If rats scurry with spirits, treat according to direction;
if the talisman soars to the heavens, the affliction is cured.
Sudden flight with many spirits requires capture and binding;
if money flies and the talisman sinks, misfortune befalls.
If the talisman transforms into a chariot rumbling like thunder,
spirits hasten vows—this is no divine act.
If it suddenly scatters like stars, the person cannot be saved;
if it briefly reunites, the patient survives without grave harm.
This is the true esoteric method of the immortals—
do not transmit it to those unworthy of the divine.

**East:** Auspicious if rising high or passing smoothly, no spirits—beware the 3rd and 7th days.
**South:** Greatly inauspicious if sudden flight, portending danger and shock; if passing smoothly, illness may change; if passing with delay, spirits are present.
**West:** Greatly ominous if wild flight, portending danger and shock; if passing with delay, spirits are present; if passing smoothly, no harm—beware the 3rd and 5th days.
**North:** Utterly dire if wild flight; beware the 3rd and 7th days. Death is certain if passing with delay—no salvation; if flying past, spirits are present.
**Northeast:** Ghost gate—if flying past, spirits cause illness; recovery uncertain. If wild flight passes with delay and lands here, death follows.
**Southeast:** Earth gate—two or three days, greatly inauspicious. High flight brings spirit harassment; smooth flight brings spirit-hastened vows, minor disturbances.
**Southwest:** Human gate—three or four days, greatly inauspicious. Sudden flight or direct fall here is ominous; smooth passage indicates vow activation.
**Northwest:** Heavenly gate—if the patient is mild, the talisman falling here will immediately ease their head while weighing down their feet.

**Soaring Talisman:** If it shoots straight upward then falls, no harm—observe the direction of descent for judgment.
**Split-Form Talisman:** If it rises and splits into two, it signifies a violent death.
**Buried-Gold Talisman:** If it does not rise and sinks into the paper ash, it is called "buried gold"—no harm, still safe.
**Resisting-Gold Talisman:** If it does not rise and instead pierces downward into the paper ash, it is called "resisting gold"—no harm.
**Offered-Gold Talisman:** If it does not rise and floats atop the paper ash, it portends delay and difficulty in recovery.
**Piercing-Beam Talisman:** If it rises and pierces a beam, it hastens vows.
**Adhering-Beam Talisman:** If it rises and clings to a beam or ridgepole, it hastens vows.
**Flying-Money Talisman:** If it does not rise but the money ash does, the person faces misfortune and financial loss—unfavorable.
**Thunder Talisman:** If the ash swirls like thunder with the paper ash, spirits hasten vows—ominous.
**Chariot-Wheel Talisman:** If it stands on the ground and rotates like a wheel, mountain spirits hasten vows.
**Shattered-Star Talisman:** If it rises in three or four pieces, none intact, it portends death.
**Reuniting-Form Talisman:** If it rises in two or three pieces then briefly reunites, the patient will not die, nor suffer grave harm.
**Up-and-Down Talisman:** If it rises and falls intermittently, it portends no harm in advance or retreat.
**Rat-Scurrying Talisman:** If it does not rise but stands like a scurrying rat, spirits are present—treat according to its direction.
**Smooth-Rise-Smooth-Fall Talisman:** If it rises and falls smoothly beneath the roof, a hidden corpse is present—seal it with the talisman.
**Returning-Form Talisman:** If it does not rise until passing the paper, it is called "returning form"—no harm.
**Swift-Fall Talisman:** If it suddenly flies then swiftly falls, it cannot be saved if slow to act—timely treatment averts harm.
**Sudden-Transformation Talisman:** If it ignites and instantly flies like thunder, fierce spirits are present—most suitable for capture and binding.

**Upper Altar Method: Five-Dipper Northern Dipper Seal Formula**
The method states: With the left hand form the Dipper seal, the right hand curls the fourth and fifth fingers while extending the second and third, the thumb pressing the *sha* script. Then bring the left hand’s *sha* script seal to meet the right hand’s *sha* script, crossing the three fingers and brushing the forehead for use.

Cross the two index fingers firmly, then the two little fingers, curl the remaining three fingers of each hand, and press both thumbs into the *sha* script.

**Lunar Evasion Method**
Begin at the current hour, starting from the first day as the Twenty-Eight Constellations, rotating counterclockwise to the current day’s position—this is the location.

**Celestial Stem Evasion**
Add the monthly Jupiter station to the current hour; when encountering *chen*, it is the Celestial Stem. Starting from *hai* in the first month, rotate counterclockwise to the monthly Jupiter station, then add *xu* and rotate clockwise to *chen*—this is the Celestial Stem’s position.

chunks.original_text: 法海遗珠卷之三十二竟 #1《北帝四圣伏魔秘法》：唐宋北帝派所传。 北帝，指北极紫微大帝。 四圣，即北帝摩下四大元帅天蓬元帅、天猷元帅、翔圣元帅、佑圣元帅。 《道法会元》卷一六九、一七○所收《混天飞提四圣伏魔大法》，与此伺一法统，可资参证。 法海遗珠卷之三十三 北帝御前小四圣秘法 师派 祖师西蜀大洞张真人。 将班 专将护法广灵威力宣化无面目大将军北极都统陈胜。 面黑，月睛视上圆大，齿不露，发黑竖上，小青包巾，身披皂袍，肩上团花，胸前金甲，右手持铁杖一条，左手持铁杖二条，悬龙刀，白束带，白揭袴，白吊。 此将乃玄帝化身，应世於秦末汉初，愤世虐刑，忧时荼毒，志在救民，领兵百万，从其所使，天下云合响应，威权有制，号令甚时，务在救济生灵。 功成行满，在汉武帝朝，曾显迹助斗有功，立庙食为将军，燮理凡民。 诸家法中，亦有无面目将军。 惟此将军，乃大洞张君，知其去处，奏闻北极，领兵归坛。 凡有奏受之人，当敬之秘之，必彰感应，不可妄传非人。 其将军上通北极，丸有祷祈，神应甚速。 通灵赞法阐道提头沥血大将军昊广。 面红，眼圆，大齿露，赤发竖上，小包髻，身半黑衫，如淡皂颜色，胸前金甲，右手持长刀一柄，左提鬼头刀，有血红束带，胁下带刀袋，白揭起，白吊。 此将即大力天丁之神，其性燥恶，诛神煞鬼，举目极刑，神力烜赫，追捉山精，归降正道，摄化群民，其功远浩。 盖此将者诸法亦有，三五都功箓中亦有之。 惟本坛乃蜀之大洞张君所传，知其要旨，遂奏升迁。 凡有行持，必能制鬼。 若延奉尊崇，何虑不显。

**Volume 32 of *Dharma Sea’s Lost Pearls* Concluded #1: *The Four Sage Marshals’ Secret Method of Subduing Demons of the Northern Emperor***

This method was transmitted by the Northern Emperor lineage of the Tang and Song dynasties. The *Northern Emperor* refers to the Great Emperor of the Purple Tenuity of the North Pole. The *Four Sages* are the four great marshals under the Northern Emperor’s command: Marshal Tianpeng, Marshal Tianyu, Marshal Xiangsheng, and Marshal Yousheng. *The Essence of Daoist Methods*, volumes 169 and 170, contains *The Great Method of Subduing Demons of the Four Sages of Huntian Feiti*, which belongs to the same tradition and may serve as a reference.

---

**Volume 33 of *Dharma Sea’s Lost Pearls*: *The Lesser Four Sages’ Secret Method Before the Northern Emperor***

**Lineage**
The ancestral master is Zhang the Perfected of the Great Cavern of Western Shu.

**Generals**
The dedicated general for ritual protection is the Vast Spirit of Awesome Power, the Faceless Great General and Northern Pole Commander-in-Chief, Chen Sheng.

His face is black, his moon-like eyes gaze upward and are large and round, his teeth remain concealed, his hair is black and stands erect, and he wears a small green headscarf. He is clad in a black robe adorned with circular floral patterns on the shoulders, golden armor on the chest, and holds in his right hand an iron staff and in his left two iron staves. A dragon blade hangs at his side, and he wears a white sash, white trousers, and white gaiters.

This general is a transformation of the Dark Emperor, who manifested in the world during the late Qin and early Han dynasties. Indignant at the cruelty of the age and grieving over the suffering of the times, he resolved to save the people. Leading an army of a million, he commanded all who followed him, and the realm responded like clouds gathering and echoes resounding. His authority was well-regulated, his commands timely, and his purpose was to deliver and aid all living beings. Upon the fulfillment of his merit and deeds, during the reign of Emperor Wu of Han, he revealed his traces and assisted in the celestial battles, earning merit. A temple was established for him, and he was enfeoffed as a general to harmonize and govern the common people.

In various ritual traditions, there is also a Faceless General. However, this general was known by Master Zhang of the Great Cavern, who understood his whereabouts and memorialized the Northern Pole, leading the troops to return to the altar. All who receive this method must revere and keep it secret; its efficacy will surely manifest. It must not be recklessly transmitted to unworthy persons.

This general communicates directly with the Northern Pole. For all prayers and petitions, the divine response is swift.

The next general is the Great General of Illuminating the Dao, Shedding Blood at the Head, and Assisting the Numinous, Hao Guang.

His face is red, his eyes round, his large teeth bared, and his red hair stands erect. He wears a small topknot, a half-black robe of a pale black hue, and golden armor on his chest. In his right hand, he wields a long blade, and in his left, he carries a ghost-headed sword. He wears a blood-red sash, a scabbard at his side, white trousers tucked up, and white gaiters.

This general is the spirit of the Mighty Celestial Guard. His nature is fierce and detests evil; he executes gods, kills demons, and metes out the harshest punishments. His divine power is resplendent, and he pursues mountain spirits, bringing them back to the true Dao. He transforms and guides the multitudes, and his merit is vast and profound.

This general also appears in other ritual traditions and is included in the registers of the Three and Five Capital Offices. However, in this altar tradition, he was transmitted by Master Zhang of the Great Cavern of Shu, who understood his essential principles and memorialized for his promotion. All who practice this method can surely subdue ghosts. If one venerates and honors him, how can his manifestations not be evident?

chunks.original_text: 威雄金甲攧扑大将军艮容，字叔节。 面红润玉色，眼视上，两手握拳交加，浑身上下着细金甲，头盔，腰悬刀，小金束带，跣足。 此将乃楚中人也。 魏宪王封为都大统帅，其性耿直燥恶，有威有权，有统有摄，有制举，能为出阵用兵，每每有功，宪王敕令统兵，与乌鸦三阵江节王，分兵列战，独自奋身拍掌，斗下一阵，忽於军中饮气殁阵，愿归三天门下，为金甲攧扑将军，后又大洞张君奏闻壮极，领兵归坛。 显应伏魔虎头元神大将军耿温，字子泽。 头带虎冠，面半红，眼白，披皂衫，右手持刀，垂下白揭，跣足，或穿麻鞋。 此将乃唐朝人也，在紫微洞霄宫为虎伽罗神，是北人出处，专食白蚁。 其性执直温柔，因进献宝章，被百魔拦截，遂发勇心，高声叫集降魔大众，便得消魔演庆真君下降，部领消魔兵卒万众，从其役使，得魔鬼皈依，方成小功。 不觉自操其志，於黑阴滋寺中，持刀劈破大梁数条，尽皆咀嚼木中白蚁，不计其数，其寺留请。 在寺屋宇内外，才闻将军之声，白蚁皆飞坠地而死，续又大洞张君 奏归北极。 陈元帅符

The Valiant and Mighty General in Golden Armor, Geng Rong, styled Shu Jie, has a face of ruddy jade complexion. His eyes gaze upward, his hands are clenched in fists crossed before him, and his entire body is clad in fine golden armor. He wears a helmet, a blade hangs at his waist, and a small golden sash binds his waist. His feet are bare. This general hails from the land of Chu. King Xian of Wei enfeoffed him as Grand Marshal of the Armies. His nature is upright and stern, detesting evil; he wields both authority and power, commands and subdues, and executes with decisive action. Skilled in leading troops into battle, he has rendered meritorious service time and again. King Xian issued an edict commanding him to lead the army, where he faced the Three-Battle Jiang Jie King of Wuya, dividing his forces to array in formation. Alone, he clapped his hands and charged into battle, yet suddenly, amidst the ranks, he perished in the fray, his qi spent. He vowed to return to the service of the Three Heavens’ Gate, becoming the Golden-Armored Valiant General. Later, Master Zhang of the Great Cavern memorialized his extraordinary valor, and he was appointed to lead troops under the altar’s banner.

The Manifestly Responsive, Demon-Subduing, Tiger-Headed Primordial Spirit Great General, Geng Wen, styled Zi Ze, wears a tiger crown. His face is half-red, his eyes white. He dons a black robe, holds a blade in his right hand, and lets a white gaiter hang down. His feet are bare, though sometimes he wears hempen sandals. This general is a man of the Tang dynasty. At the Purple Tenuity Grotto and Cloud Palace, he served as the Tiger-Attendant Spirit, originating from the northern lands, where he fed exclusively on termites. His nature is steadfast and gentle, yet when he presented a precious memorial, he was intercepted by a hundred demons. Stirring his courage, he raised his voice to summon the demon-subduing hosts. Thereupon, the Perfected Lord of Demon-Dispelling Celebration descended, leading a myriad of demon-subduing soldiers to serve under him. The demons were thus compelled to submit, and he achieved a minor merit. Unaware of his own resolve, within the Black Yin Zisi Temple, he brandished his blade and split several great beams, chewing through the termites within the wood without number. The temple’s monks entreated him to stay. Wherever the sound of the general’s voice reached within the temple’s halls, termites would take flight and fall dead to the ground. **Method of the Left and Right Demon-Subduing Marshals Gou Bi of the Thunder Gate: Five Thunder Oral Formula**

Recognize the root of the Primordial Supreme Ultimate,
Then from the Supreme Ultimate establish Qian and Kun.
The dragon calls forth cinnabar fire to descend from the void,
The tiger inhales the Yellow River to surge straight upward.
The ears blend thunder and wind, opening the Xun gate,
The eyes fly forth lightning, shattering the Thunder Gate.
A single thunderclap leaves no trace to seek,
The moon shines on the cold pool, naturally inhaling and exhaling.

**Transformation Mantra**
Oṃ. Nata, deity of the North.
Oṃ. Cata, kṣip.
Swiftly conceal my body, instantly transform into a celestial perfected one.
Visualize as an exalted perfected being—*hasten as the law commands!*

**Visualization of Golden Light**
Command the Fire Spirit General—*hasten!*
Visualize the Heavenly Pass in Li.
Command the Water Spirit General—*hasten!*
Visualize the Earthly Pivot in Kan.

Visualize the two generals from the front converging before the altar, then recite the summoning incantation:

Oṃ. Red Emperor Nipaṇḍa, Fire Spirit—*hasten and subdue!*
Solemnly summon the Thunder and Lightning Left Direct Attendant, Great Black Deity Marshal Gou, riding fire clouds, driving a fire dragon—*swiftly return to the left of the altar.*
Visualize the marshal descending from the Heavenly Gate, borne upon crimson-golden *qi*.

Oṃ. Black Mist Spirit Ji□, Water Spirit—*hasten and subdue!*
Solemnly summon the Thunder and Lightning Right Direct Attendant, Black Dew Great Deity Marshal Bi, riding black clouds, driving a black dragon—*swiftly return to the right of the altar.*
Visualize the marshal surging from the Earthly Portal, borne upon silver-white *qi*.

**Internal Cultivation**
In great stillness and serenity, focus on the Primordial Cavity. Visualize golden light transforming into a bright moon, ascending from between the kidneys straight through the crown, transmuting the body into an exalted perfected one.
Next, visualize within the clear water below the navel the Heavenly Pass and Earthly Pivot in union: the tortoise facing north, the serpent facing south, their mouths emitting blue and white *qi*, which emerge from the navel to intermingle with the external dual *qi*.
Absorb and swallow this, directing it into the Primordial Cavity, where it divides into the kidneys—blue *qi* to the left, white *qi* to the right—then merges with the central yellow *qi*, coalescing in the Yellow Court at the navel.
Next, circulate the heart-fire downward to refine this coalesced *qi* into a formidable radiance, forming the Purple Gold Elixir.
Guide it through the spine, ascending past the multi-storied tower to the crown. Draw pure *qi* with the nose, lifting it from the root of the nose to surge upward. Visualize the two deities riding red and black *qi*, emerging from left and right to converge with the two generals descending from the Heavenly Gate and Earthly Portal. They stand within the golden light, suddenly uniting into the Inner Elixir, which is sent into the Original Cavity—*great stillness.*

When inscribing talismans, perform seven rapid eye-flicks, recite the Golden Light Mantra once, visualize the spirit transforming into an exalted perfected one, and with an eye-flick, summon the two generals. Visualize the external generals descending to converge and act.

**Spirit-Mobilizing Talisman**
Oṃ oṃ □□ hūṃ dī qián □□ *subdue*—grasp the *chou-wei* dipper, visualize silver color, combine, and blow into it.
*Taiyin* transforms, engendering the essence of the *chen-wen* water position—*xu* true essence transforms, *chou* copulates, *bing-ren* *wei*—hear my summons! Central fire—*hasten and descend to zi!* Visualize golden light entering the Central Palace.
Oṃ ru bīn xiù duó luó *subdue*—grasp *wei-chou* dipper, visualize red color, combine, and exhale into it.
Heavenly decree, golden virtue, Yu Gou’s numen—grasp *xu-chen* dipper, visualize essence entering.
Oṃ ru □ xiè *subdue*—fix gaze, visualize *subduing* and entering.
Command and summon the stone essence of the Southern Bi Emperor—grasp *chen-xu* dipper, visualize the general entering.
Oṃ □ suì hòu *subdue*—fix gaze, visualize *subduing* and entering.
Visualize white characters descending from the central heavens and entering.
Recite: Oṃ □□ luó □ cā lì pó hē—*circulate to form a mass of purple gold, radiant as the sun’s orb, illuminating the Three Realms, causing demons and spirits to hide in fear.* Add Oṃ hūṃ hūṃ—*all spirits bow their heads, evil demons return to rectitude. Should any dare disobey, they shall be reduced to fine dust—hasten as the Jade Emperor’s divine law commands!*

**Subduing and Uniting Mantra**
Oṃ fu lián gāng shén *subdue—descend, spirit!*
Recite: Oṃ fu líng qí jī shén *subdue—constantly used.*
Recite: Oṃ niǎo nuó zhè zhì *subdue.*

**Mysterious Attachment to Water**
Clench the fists, enter great stillness, stand in *ding* posture, stir the tongue until the mouth fills with water, swallow three times to the navel, then send it downward with a double contraction, stirring the daily-accumulated fire elixir. Rotate with the thunder contraction, sensing a thunderous sound rising straight up. With an eye-flick, manifest lightning and fire within the water, then infuse it.
First visualize the water as a black sea. Wait for the lightning to enter the sea, where it flashes with the sea-bottom’s white light. Dimly perceive Marshal Bi riding a black dragon within, surging and churning. Witness golden waves rippling, lightning and fire ceaselessly intertwining, dazzling the eyes with clarity. The water seethes and boils ten thousand fathoms high. Inhale it, first striking from behind the head with a contraction, then divide the mouth’s water into two sprays. Visualize black mist surging from below. Swiftly merge the remaining mouth-water from the front, transforming it into golden light that descends from above. Visualize it entering the body to perform its work—*the youthful attendant vanishes.*

**Mysterious Attachment Oral Formula**
*Fire elixir internally circulates, stirring the thunder chariot.*
Oṃ kan cā kūn nà zhèn pán xùn qū zhōng dà qián hēi duì *command—*gèn *subdue.*

chunks.original_text: 将班 正将地司太岁殷，名郊。 赤体，青面，青身，焦黄发竖起，顶上一骷楼一个，项带骷髅八个，豹皮护臀，两眼出两手，右金锺，左印，中两手，左黄旛，右豹尾，下两手，左戟，右火剑，印堂中金光一条射人。 赤脚，足下及徧身俱是飞火。 副帅亚大将侯彪。 大黑道五鬼大神张金。 黑道灭门大祸将余文。 吟神三煞大将耿通。 奏书主簿薛深。 博士大将昊友。 力士杀鬼大将赵玉。 十恶大败将何仲。 曲尺大耗吞鬼大将封孟。 腾魂摄魄大将罗士文。 赞神伏神大将谢飞廉。 红钞照道红奁大神覃造。 青牛金狗大将卢德。 青龙大神马文。 白虎大神陈友。 朱雀大神冯逵。 玄武大神汤恺。 黄旛大将王德。 豹尾大将丁胜。 病符大将马冲。 丧车栗佑。 神荼徐松高。 郁垒桑伯源。 黄銊大将关萨。 东方大将金文正。 南方大将杜机。 西方大将羁杓。 北方大将吴正达。 中央大将李惠。 七十二候大将宋行文。 二十四炁大将韩宝。 急捉大将蒋銊。 人神神君凶神恶杀一切神吏。 炼将出合 凡炼将，先凝神定志，存黄庭即中官，有黄土块分明，仰头，以鼻取中天黄炁入心，心火上接，反被外黄炁捺下中官，内黄炁上接火见生之，三炁混合，皆成黄炁，发运上口，呼出升中天，一合坠下，以鼻吸入中官。 再运此团金黄炁，呼掷地上，散满乾坤，人我诸物尽无，但见黄炁浓盛。 以右手剑诀叉腰，左手雷局运肾，雷从夹脊至耳出，打开黄炁，飞火迸出，内见元帅。 兆侧身就吸，取将印堂中毫光，□下丹田，过尾间，合两肾中金光，从夹脊冲上泥丸，出化为金光，兆以鼻吸金光，吹罩元帅。 若策役述意书符，若常炼就，将金光团运成弹丸，渐如星，以鼻吸纳入中宫。 若要用，提出用之。 召咒 谨召岁君猛将，闻召速临，急如星火，迅若风雷。 祛云掣电，掷火流星，黄旛前引，豹尾后随。 七十二候，二十四炁，十二禁忌，恶杀当先。 逢妖寸斩，遇鬼灭形，前祛九丑，后灭山魈。 飞龙土怪，镇伏魁星，吾今召请，火急降临。 有违帝命，风火灭形。 谨召地司猛吏殷郊急至，奉上帝律令敕。 掐玉诀，密念：天符魁玉女敕煞摄。 右咒毕，存将至，随事迷意，然后书符。 敕笔咒 出自中央祖，戊己化为土。 万神尽皈依，百邪不敢觑。 九曜藏我身，五帝管星数。 黄河水逆流，五岳崩摧去。 大林尽飘扬，三春叶焦黄。 吾寄斗牛口，万万魔精走。 土地保吾正，炎光聚死灰。 若教吾一怒，开眼再观觑。 锁定把中央，须教万物藏。 神印都一照，万邪随印灭，尽化为凝血。 急急如中宫大圣土宿敕煞摄。 三敕符掐玉诀 奉中宫土宿勅 殷郊速至 众神禀令 杀鬼吞魔 敢有拒逆杀鬼无休 岁君土杀火急奉行天符魁玉女敕煞摄存将入 地司大将准令奉行随意述事速急施行 唵罗天大火光陀罗尼敕摄掐煞文取罡炁入 后加此敕念吾奉玉清上帝敕上清上帝敕太清大帝敕次念唵都卢帝萨婆诃再加霐三字仍存脾炁升泥丸化中宫土宿内有一金兀字脾金炁引入符中 敕符咒 天地玄宗，万炁之根。 广修万劫，证吾神通。 三界内外，惟吾独尊。 顶有金光，覆映吾身。 视之不见，听之不闻。 包罗天地，养育群生。 受持万徧，身有光明。 三界侍卫。 五帝司迎。 万神朝礼，役使雷霆。 鬼妖丧胆，精怪亡形。

**The Great Year Martial Scroll Thunder Method**

The Principal Marshal of the Earth Bureau, the Great Year Spirit Yin Jiao: His name is Jiao. Crimson-bodied, blue-faced, green-skinned, with scorched yellow hair standing erect, atop his head a single skull, and eight skulls strung about his neck. He wears a leopard-skin loincloth. From his two eyes extend two hands: the right holds a golden bell, the left a seal. His middle pair of hands hold a yellow banner on the left and a leopard tail on the right. His lower pair of hands wield a halberd on the left and a fire-sword on the right. From the center of his brow streams a beam of golden light that pierces the beholder. Barefoot, his feet and entire body are wreathed in flying flames.

Vice-Marshal, Secondary Great General Hou Biao.
Black Path Five Ghosts Great Spirit Zhang Jin.

Funeral Chariot Li You.

Yulei Sang Boyuan.

Eastern Great General Jin Wenzheng.
Southern Great General Du Ji.
Western Great General Ji Shao.
Northern Great General Wu Zhengda.
Central Great General Li Hui.
Seventy-Two Seasonal Nodes Great General Song Xingwen.
Twenty-Four Qi Great General Han Bao.
Swift Seizer Great General Jiang Xiu.
Human Spirit Spirit Lords, Malevolent Spirits, Ferocious Sha, and all spirit officials.

**Refining and Summoning the Marshal**
When refining the Marshal, first compose the spirit and settle the will. Visualize the Yellow Court—the Central Palace—where a distinct clod of yellow earth appears. Tilt the head back, draw the yellow qi of the Central Heaven into the heart through the nose. The heart’s fire ascends to meet it, then is pressed downward by the external yellow qi into the Central Palace. The internal yellow qi rises to meet the fire, generating it. The three qi merge, all becoming yellow qi. Gather and exhale it upward through the mouth, sending it to the Central Heaven, where it coalesces and descends. Inhale it through the nose into the Central Palace.

Again, mobilize this mass of golden-yellow qi, exhale it forcefully to the earth, dispersing it to fill the cosmos. All persons, self, and things vanish, leaving only thick, abundant yellow qi. With the right hand form the Sword Mudra at the waist, and with the left hand circulate the Thunder Mechanism through the kidneys. Thunder surges from the spine to the ears, cleaving the yellow qi. Flying fire bursts forth, revealing the Marshal within. The adept turns slightly, inhales, and draws the beam of light from the Marshal’s brow into the Cinnabar Field, passing through the coccyx. It merges with the golden light between the two kidneys, then surges up the spine to the Mud Pill, where it transforms into golden light. The adept inhales this golden light through the nose and exhales it to envelop the Marshal.

When deploying the Marshal to execute intentions or inscribe talismans, if the refinement is habitual, condense the golden light into a pellet, gradually shrinking it to the size of a star. Inhale it through the nose into the Central Palace. When needed, extract and employ it.

**Summoning Incantation**
Reverently summon the Fierce Marshal of the Year Lord: at the call, hasten to arrive—swift as shooting stars, rapid as wind and thunder. Dispelling clouds, seizing lightning, hurling fire and meteors, the yellow banner leads, the leopard tail follows. The seventy-two seasonal nodes, the twenty-four qi, the twelve prohibitions—malevolent sha take the fore. Encountering demons, sever them by the inch; meeting ghosts, obliterate their forms. Ahead, dispel the Nine Uglies; behind, annihilate mountain sprites. Flying dragons, earthly anomalies—subdue and pacify the Star of Literary Brilliance. I now summon and invoke you: descend with utmost urgency. Defy the Emperor’s command, and be extinguished by wind and fire.

Reverently summon the Fierce Official of the Earth Bureau, Yin Jiao: hasten to arrive, by the August Emperor’s statutes and decrees.

Clasp the Jade Mudra and silently recite:
*By the Heavenly Talisman, the Star Maid’s Decree of Slaying and Seizing.*

After the incantation, visualize the Marshal’s arrival. Proceed according to the matter at hand, then inscribe the talisman.

**Talisman-Pen Incantation**
Issuing from the Central Ancestor,
Wu and Ji transform into earth.
All spirits submit in reverence,
A hundred evils dare not gaze.
The Nine Luminaries conceal my body,
The Five Emperors govern the stars’ numbers.
The Yellow River flows backward,
The Five Peaks crumble and collapse.
Great forests are all uprooted,
In the three springs, leaves wither yellow.
I lodge within the Dipper and Ox,
Ten thousand, ten thousand demonic essences flee.
The Earth God protects my rectitude,
Fiery light gathers dead ashes.
Should I but grow angry,
Open my eyes and look again.
Locked onto the Central Palace,
All things must hide.
The Divine Seal shines universally,
All evils perish with the seal,
Transforming utterly into congealed blood.
Swiftly, swiftly, by the Central Palace’s Great Sage Earth Star’s decree of slaying and seizing.

**Threefold Talisman, Clasp the Jade Mudra**
By the Central Palace’s Earth Star decree:
Yin Jiao, hasten to arrive.
All spirits receive the command—
Slay ghosts, devour demons.
Dare to resist, and slay ghosts without end.
Year Lord, Earth Slayer—fire-hastily obey!
By the Heavenly Talisman, the Star Maid’s decree of slaying and seizing.
Visualize the Marshal entering.
The Earth Bureau’s Great Marshal: execute the command, proceed as intended, act with utmost speed.

*Oṃ ra tian da huo guang tuo luo ni, by this dhāraṇī’s decree, seize!*
Clasp the Slaying Mudra, draw the qi of the Dipper’s stem into [the talisman].
Afterward, add this decree, reciting:
*I act by the Jade Clarity August Emperor’s decree, the Highest Clarity August Emperor’s decree, the Grand Clarity Great Emperor’s decree.*
Then recite: *Oṃ du lu di sa pō hē.*
Add the three characters *hòng lìng jīng*, then visualize the spleen’s qi ascending to the Mud Pill, transforming into the Central Palace’s Earth Star, within which lies a golden *wù* (兀) character. Guide the spleen’s metal qi into the talisman.

**Talisman Incantation**
Mystery of Heaven and Earth,
Root of the ten thousand qi.
Vast cultivation through myriad kalpas,
Attests to my divine penetration.
Within and beyond the Three Realms,
Only I am uniquely revered.
Atop my head, golden light
Shines and reflects upon my body.
Seen yet unseen,
Heard yet unheard.
Encompassing Heaven and Earth,
Nurturing the multitude of beings.
Upholding it ten thousand times,
My body radiates light.
The Three Realms guard and protect,
The Five Emperors receive and welcome.
Myriad spirits bow in homage,
Commanding thunder and lightning.
Ghosts and demons lose their courage,
Spirits and anomalies vanish in form.

chunks.original_text: 内有霹雳，雷神隐名，洞慧交彻。 五炁腾腾，金光速现，覆护符形。 急急如律令。 腾魂咒 急急迷胎光，未昏幽精，午移爽灵。 巳天乾地坤日卯月，酉水子火午交接，上下腾魂，坚固如铁。 谨召太岁殷郊速至疾。 黄黑光芒，幽威十方。 岁君速降，天地延昌。 通哩贺都大圣，威灵疾速敕摄。 咤咭哩咤，丙灭凶邪。 急奉玉皇上帝敕。 捉咒 灵元大法师，五方急捉使者，翻天覆地，速摄邪鬼。 不问亲疏，无分高下，急急捉来，速速疾疾。 唵。 天皇君急速摄，降魔摄。 急急如律令。 逐禁符 岁君猛吏闻召速临急如星火迅若风雷驱云掣电掷火流星黄幡前引豹尾后随七十二候二十四炁十二禁忌恶杀当先逢妖寸斩遇鬼灭形前祛九丑后灭山魈飞龙土怪镇伏魁星吾今召请火急降临有违帝命风火灭形急奉三清大帝敕次念天符魁玉女摄掐玉文剔入 谨召地司太岁殷郊将军急遵 符命煞伐妖精急奉三清大帝律令敕 手执金印印带亲行受吾一照诛灭不祥 □□□□□□□贪巨禄文廉武破 急奉昊天敕赐战杀鬼贼 五方五土星杀神君太岁尊神黄幡豹尾杀鬼无停急急如律令 飞砂走石簸土扬尘摧山拔木游徧乾坤 火焱飞腾杀灭夕鬼贼 飞云腾电火发急准土宿星君敕煞摄 瑞雪顽冰电母耀激太一顽冰斥鬼摄取肾炁北方 天应精地应灵太岁将捉鬼神冽冰雹黄河清动天地三界惊泓澄明天帝勅万神饮急急如律令 右符取中天黄炁一口，下罩兆身，存变为土宿星君。 师闭两目，想黄炁化为黄衣道士，头带土宿冠，跣足，腰系黄土龙一条，为条龙。 目光射前，左手按黄牛，右手执草杖，师以自己印堂出光，射定太岁，喝殷郊依吾令行远去，想将吏前去，若策役遣将不去时，用变土宿咒，掐玉文剑诀。 咒曰 唵囋□□嗽□□诃。
chunks.translated_text:
Within lies thunder’s crack,
The Thunder God’s hidden name,
Pervading wisdom interpenetrates.
The Five Qi surge and billow,
Golden light swiftly appears,
Shielding and safeguarding the talisman’s form.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the law commands.

**Rising Soul Incantation**
Swiftly, swiftly—bewilder the Womb Light,
Before dusk, the Dark Essence,
At noon, shift the Bright Spirit.
At *sì*, Heaven; at *qián*, Earth; at *kūn*, the Sun; at *mǎo*, the Moon.
At *yǒu*, Water; at *zǐ*, Fire; at noon, their union.
Above and below, the soul ascends,
Unyielding as iron.

Solemnly summon the Grand Year’s Yīn Jiāo—come swiftly!
Yellow and black radiance,
Mysterious might pervades the ten directions.
The Year Lord descends in haste,
Heaven and Earth extend their prosperity.
*Tōng lǐ hè dū*, Great Sage,
Mighty spirit—swiftly command and seize!
*Chà jī lǐ chà*, *bǐng* extinguishes malevolent forces.
Hasten to obey the Jade Emperor’s decree.

**Seizing Incantation**
Spiritual Origin, Great Dharma Master,
Messengers of the Five Directions—seize with urgency!
Overturn Heaven, overturn Earth,
Swiftly capture the demonic ghosts.
Regardless of kinship or rank,
Without distinction of high or low,
Seize them swiftly, swiftly, with all haste!
*Ōm*.
Heavenly Sovereign, swiftly seize,
Subdue demons—seize!
Swiftly, swiftly, as the law commands.

**Expulsion and Prohibition Talisman**
The Year Lord’s fierce officers—hear the summons and arrive with the speed of shooting stars,
Swift as wind and thunder,
Driving clouds, snatching lightning,
Hurling fire like meteors.
A yellow banner leads the way,
A leopard’s tail follows behind.
Seventy-two seasonal markers,
Twenty-four Qi,
Twelve prohibitions,
Malignant slayers take the fore.
Encounter demons—sever them by inches,
Meet ghosts—annihilate their forms.
Ahead, dispel the Nine Uglies;
Behind, eradicate mountain *xiāo* and flying dragons,
Subdue earthly anomalies,
Suppress the *Kuí* Star.
I now summon and invoke—descend in haste!
Defy the Emperor’s command, and wind and fire shall obliterate your form.
Hasten to obey the Three Pure Ones’ decree.

Next, recite the Heavenly Talisman.
The *Kuí* Jade Maiden seizes and manipulates the jade script,
Inscribing it within.
Solemnly summon the Earth Bureau’s Grand Year General Yīn Jiāo—obey swiftly!

**Talisman Command for Slaying Demons**
Hasten to obey the Three Pure Ones’ law and decree.
Wielding the golden seal, imprint it upon your person,
Receive my single glance—execute and extinguish all inauspiciousness.
□□□□□□□ *Tān*, *Jù*, *Lù*, *Wén*, *Lián*, *Wǔ*, *Pò*.
Hasten to obey the August Heaven’s decree, bestowed for battling demonic thieves.
Five Directions, Five Lands, Star-Slaying Spirit Lords,
Grand Year Venerable Spirits,
Yellow banners, leopard tails—slay ghosts without pause!
Swiftly, swiftly, as the law commands.

**Flying Sand and Walking Stones**
Scatter earth, raise dust,
Shatter mountains, uproot trees,
Roam throughout Heaven and Earth.
Fire blazes and soars,
Slaying and extinguishing evening ghosts and thieves.
Flying clouds, surging lightning,
Fire erupts—swiftly comply with the Earth Star Lord’s decree to slay and seize.

**Auspicious Snow and Stubborn Ice**
The Lightning Mother flashes and dazzles,
The Great One’s stubborn ice repels ghosts,
Seizing the kidney qi of the North.
Heaven responds with essence, Earth with spirit—
The Grand Year General seizes ghosts and gods,
Bitter hail, the Yellow River’s clarity stirs,
Heaven and Earth, the Three Realms tremble.
The Celestial Emperor’s decree—
Myriad spirits drink in haste!
Swiftly, swiftly, as the law commands.

For the talisman on the right: draw a mouthful of Central Heaven’s yellow qi,
Envelop your body below,
Visualize it transforming into the Earth Star Lord.
The master closes both eyes,
Imagining the yellow qi transmuting into a yellow-robed Daoist,
Head adorned with the Earth Star crown,
Barefoot,
A yellow earth dragon coiled at the waist, forming a dragon belt.
Gaze fixed ahead,
Left hand pressing a yellow ox,
Right hand grasping a grass staff.
The master emits light from his own glabella,
Directing it to fix upon the Grand Year,
Shouting: “Yīn Jiāo, act according to my command and depart afar!”
Visualize the officers advancing.
If, when dispatching or commanding them, they do not depart,
Use the Earth Star Transformation Incantation,
Manipulate the jade script, and execute the sword mudra.

**Incantation**
*Ōm* □□□□ *sòu* □□ *hē*.

chunks.original_text: 急急如上帝律令。 斗口魁神灵官秘法#2 诀曰 朱衣使者朝金阙，青面郎君降紫微。 自家活计无多子，一个元君起坐随。 秘要 神默默，炁绵绵。 存赤炁，存丹元。 透 泥丸，上冲天。 布金桥，现七元。 魁神 降，赤炁旋。 混为一。 秘号悬。 恍惚 间，自炁缠。 急急吸，款款咽。 纳元 宫，真火煎。 再提起，印堂前。 金光 现，照无边。 飞剑诀，莫留连。 金光 裂，将吏全。 行持处，要在专。 右诀法存神大定，先飞子午斗一座在空玄中，存兆丹元官一团金赤之光，化为日轮之状，升上重楼，布金桥，自泥九而升斗口，魁星极大，坠下与日轮混一，中现吽字，恍惚西方银色白光一道，贯千金赤光中。 兆急吸入心宫，守定片时，呵出妙门。 仍是金赤色光，充塞宇宙。 兆右手以剑诀分开，见马师立火轮上，青面三目。 如朝斗则头戴金天丁冠，赤发，绯衣大袖袍，结袖绿仙带，朱履，如捉祟，头戴铁帽，红抹额，红罩袍，金甲，绿仙带，绿靴，左手斗诀，右手仗火剑，白蛇口吐火，头生肉角，四顾灵官围绕，元帅身立金色火光中，身长千丈。 如炼将，则吸入丹田而止。 如常用，则提起合天上元帅入符。 本身符 念召咒入将名 阳□□□□□□□阴□□□□□□□俱子午斗 如捉祟加此煞字仍念唵□帝喉咤喉那帝知悉利娑诃唵吼吼吩分速现娑诃急急疾 子文顺行十二支诀皈子入符戌至巳入辰皈巳入得仍念秘咒北斗灵灵斗柄前星贪狼操恶食鬼吞精巨门烜赫照耀光明禄存奔雾统摄天兵霞冲文曲光射廉贞威灵武曲真人辅星天罡大圣破军尊星天门闭塞浊炁混凝帝持钺斧手把天丁威南一喝胆碎心倾灵官巡检听察寻声九州社令一一呼名诛斩凶恶获罪不轻凶恶者死慈善者生断头截足杵碎其形鬼妖灭尽人道安宁驱邪治病符到奉行急急如律令 右符存马帅，取神光入笔书符，符成提金色光，自印堂化煞字入符，口呵目射。 诀曰 符诀能明窍，元神始含机。 摄亡牛坠速，馘祟脚桃宜。 飞斗因朝谒，端书是保祈。 笔升阳赫赫，顺下雨垂垂。 更有阴阳妙，行持总要知。 蒙附诀 师以两手斗局，变神，召马帅，次以两手斗诀，叉腰，步罡。 右步罡毕，却移童子入罡上立。 次於童子面背虚书一吽字，存金色蒙童，喝马帅疾速蒙附。 十七字灵官秘法#1 内炼 凡行内炼，先摩掌，叩齿，咽津，各三十六次，令浊炁下分。 次开天闭地，各二十一次。 上至双目，下至双涌泉，却以左右手摩擦。 次念秘咒曰： 火帝火神王，马胜入吾心。 师存心火自泥丸出罩身，次念密咒曰： 水帝水神王，王文渊入吾肾。 右咒毕，师运臀水，自涌泉出罩身，待水火相接，俱吸入中宫分散，但觉有一点红莹，火珠在内，用时呵出便是。 本身符 出八卦诀 寅卯巳申兑午 等午斗从下撇上 未兑子丑寅卯巳 秘咒 唵娑罗。
chunks.translated_text:
Hasten, hasten, as in the statutes and commands of the Supreme Emperor.

**Dipper Mouth, Demon-Queller Divine Official Secret Method #2**

**Incantation**
The vermilion-robed messenger attends the Golden Portal,
The green-faced gentleman descends to Purple Tenuity.
My own livelihood has few disciples,
Yet a single Primordial Lord rises and follows.

**Secret Essentials**
In silent stillness, qi flows ceaselessly.
Visualize the red qi, visualize the Cinnabar Prime.
Penetrate the Mud Pill Palace, ascend to the heavens.
Spread the golden bridge, manifest the Seven Primes.
The Demon-Queller descends, red qi swirls,
Merging into one.
The secret name is suspended.
In the midst of indistinctness, one’s own qi coils.
Swiftly inhale, gently swallow.
Receive it in the Primordial Palace, refined by true fire.
Again, raise it before the glabella.
Golden light appears, illuminating boundlessly.
Execute the Flying Sword Mudra without delay.
The golden light splits—all officers are complete.
In practice, focus is paramount.

**Right Mudra Method**
In profound spirit stabilization, first project the Zi-Wu Dipper in the void of emptiness. Visualize within your Cinnabar Prime Palace a mass of golden-red light, transforming into the form of a solar wheel. Ascend the layered towers, spread the golden bridge, and rise from the Mud Pill Palace to the Dipper’s mouth. The Demon-Queller Star looms vast, descending to merge with the solar wheel. At their center appears the syllable *hūm*. Suddenly, a streak of silvery-white light from the west pierces the golden-red radiance. Swiftly inhale it into the Heart Palace, hold it briefly, then exhale through the Mystic Gate. The light remains golden-red, filling the cosmos. With your right hand, part it with the sword mudra to reveal Marshal Ma standing upon a wheel of fire, his face green with three eyes.

When attending the Dipper, he wears the Golden Heavenly Ding Crown, his hair crimson, clad in a scarlet robe with wide sleeves, sleeves tied with a green immortal sash, and vermilion shoes. When subduing malevolent spirits, he dons an iron helmet, a red headband, a red surcoat, golden armor, a green immortal sash, and green boots. His left hand forms the Dipper Mudra, his right wields a fire sword. A white serpent spits fire from its mouth, fleshy horns grow from his head, and divine officials surround him. The marshal stands within golden flames, his body a thousand *zhang* tall.

When refining officers, inhale into the Cinnabar Field and stop. For regular use, raise and merge the Heavenly Marshal of the Upper Prime into the talisman.

**Talisman for One’s Own Body**
Recite the summoning incantation, inserting the officer’s name:
*Yang* □□□□□□□ *yin* □□□□□□□, all within the Zi-Wu Dipper.
When subduing malevolent spirits, add this destructive character and recite:
*Ōm* □ *dì hóu zhà hóu nà dì zhī xī lì suō hē. Ōm hǒu hǒu fēn sù xiàn suō hē. Hasten, hasten, swiftly!*

**Zi Character Proceeds Through the Twelve Branches Mudra**
Return Zi to the talisman, Xu to Si enters Chen, return Si to De.
Still recite the secret incantation:
The Northern Dipper, divine and numinous, the Dipper’s handle star—
Greedy Wolf seizes evil and devours spirits,
Giant Gate blazes with dazzling radiance,
Store of Prosperity gallops through mist, commanding heavenly soldiers,
Cloud-Soaring, Literary Star shines with light,
Integrity’s majesty, Martial Brilliance,
True Person of the Auxiliary Star,
The Heavenly Stem Great Sage of the Demon-Queller,
Honored Star of the Breaking Army—
The Heavenly Gate is sealed, turbid qi congeals.
The Emperor wields the battle-axe, grasping the Heavenly Ding’s might.
With a single shout to the south, gallbladders shatter and hearts topple.
Divine officials and inspectors, heed and seek the sound.
The Nine Provinces’ Earth Deities, each called by name, execute and behead the wicked.
Those guilty are not lightly punished; the wicked die, the kind live.
Sever heads, cut off feet, pound their forms to dust.
Demons and goblins are annihilated, the human realm is at peace.
Expel evil, cure illness—when the talisman arrives, act accordingly!
Hasten, hasten, as in the statutes and commands!

**Right Talisman**
Visualize Marshal Ma, draw the talisman with the divine light-infused brush. Once complete, raise the golden light from the glabella, transforming it into a destructive character to enter the talisman. Exhale from the mouth, direct the gaze.

**Incantation**
The talisman mudra can illuminate the orifices,
Only then does the primordial spirit contain the mechanism.
Seizing the deceased causes swift descent,
Beheading malevolent spirits requires peachwood.
Flying the Dipper arises from audience,
Proper writing ensures protection and prayer.
The brush ascends in blazing yang,
Descends smoothly like falling rain.
There is further yin-yang subtlety—
In practice, all must be known.

**Meng Attachment Mudra**
The master forms the Dipper configuration with both hands, transforms the spirit, and summons Marshal Ma. Next, with both hands in the Dipper mudra, thumbs at the waist, step the *dang* pace. Once the right stepping is complete, shift the youth to stand upon the *dang*. Then, on the youth’s face and back, trace a *hūm* character in the void. Visualize the youth enveloped in golden light, and shout for Marshal Ma to swiftly attach.

**Seventeen-Character Divine Official Secret Method #1**

**Internal Refinement**
For all internal refinement, first rub the palms, knock the teeth, and swallow saliva thirty-six times each to separate the turbid qi downward. Next, open heaven and close earth twenty-one times each. From the eyes above to the Bubbling Springs below, rub with the left and right hands. Then recite the secret incantation:
Fire Emperor, Fire Spirit King,
Ma Sheng enters my heart.
The master visualizes heart fire emerging from the Mud Pill Palace to envelop the body. Next, recite the secret incantation:
Water Emperor, Water Spirit King,
Wang Wen Yuan enters my kidneys.
After the incantation, the master mobilizes kidney water, emerging from the Bubbling Springs to envelop the body. When water and fire meet, inhale both into the Central Palace and disperse them. Only sense a single gleaming red fire pearl within—when needed, exhale it.

**Talisman for One’s Own Body**
**Eight Trigrams Mudra**
Yin, Mao, Si, Shen, Dui, Wu—
From Wu, the Dipper is drawn upward from below.
Wei, Dui, Zi, Chou, Yin, Mao, Si—
Secret incantation:
*Ōm suō luó* □.

chunks.original_text: 诛斩凶恶，获罪不轻。 凶恶者死，慈善者生。 断头截足，杵碎其形。 鬼妖减尽，人道安宁。 驱邪治病，符到奉行。 急急如律令。 熏服炎雷符 敕召南方火神刘炎大将军速降符中唵哒哩帝摄掐午文心炁合南炁 敕召北方水神刘志大将军速降符中唵波斯帝摄掐子文肾炁合北炁入 精电霹灵雳形炎救神煞急急如律令掐午文取南炁 金德星君酉文西炁 木德星君卯文东炁 火德星君午文南炁 土德星君中文黄炁 戌文 丑文 辰文 未文 天火雷神掐亥文 地火雷神掐巳文 阴火雷神掐申文 阳火雷神掐寅文 中火雷神掐中文 五雷降灵竟入肠胃搜捉邪精鬼神速出病体安宁察吾法令毋辄容情万病速去符到奉行急急如律令书成一雷字再加 左手掐雷局取巽炁念一转六神藏卯二转四煞没辰三转动魁罡离四转雷火发中五转霹雳惊坤六转山鬼减兑七转收捉一切无道邪鬼赴魁罡之下受死不得动作掐煞文 遣咒 敕差南方火神刘炎大将，北方水神刘志大将，风雷降，雷火生，威神至，祸自灭，魁至魒，雷声发，天地动，鬼神死，妖怪亡。 谨请五雷使者，风伯雨师，雷公电母，雷部官君将吏，收摄三界六洞妖魔精鬼，以及一十五种逆天无道，一切凶神恶祟，邪炁鬼炁，瘟邪疫毒鬼贼，并赴雷霆之下受死，无动无作。 急急如律令。 法海遗珠卷之三十五竟
chunks.translated_text:
**Execution of the Malevolent**

Slay and behead the wicked—no light offense.
The malevolent shall perish; the merciful shall live.
Sever heads, hack feet, pound their forms to dust.
Ghosts and demons annihilated, the human realm rests in peace.
Expel evil, cure illness—upon the talisman’s arrival, act without delay.
*Haste, haste, in accordance with the law’s command!*

**Fumigate and Ingest the Thunder-Fire Talisman**
Summon the Southern Fire Spirit, Great General Liu Yan, descend swiftly into the talisman:
*Oṃ ta-li di shè* — press the *wu* seal, align the Heart-qi with the Southern qi.

Summon the Northern Water Spirit, Great General Liu Zhi, descend swiftly into the talisman:
*Oṃ bo-si di shè* — press the *zi* seal, merge the Kidney-qi with the Northern qi, entering.
*Essence-lightning, roaring thunder, blazing form—rescue the divine slayers!*
*Haste, haste, in accordance with the law’s command!*

Press the *wu* seal, draw the Southern qi.
Metal Virtue Star Lord—*you* seal, Western qi.
Wood Virtue Star Lord—*mao* seal, Eastern qi.
Fire Virtue Star Lord—*wu* seal, Southern qi.
Earth Virtue Star Lord—*zhong* seal, Yellow qi.
*Xu* seal, *chou* seal, *chen* seal, *wei* seal.

Heavenly Fire Thunder Spirit—press the *hai* seal.
Earthly Fire Thunder Spirit—press the *si* seal.
Yin Fire Thunder Spirit—press the *shen* seal.
Yang Fire Thunder Spirit—press the *yin* seal.
Central Fire Thunder Spirit—press the *zhong* seal.

The Five Thunders descend in spirit, entering the bowels and stomach to hunt and seize evil essences and ghostly spirits—depart swiftly! The ailing body restored to peace.
*Examine my divine decree—show no leniency!*
All maladies, vanish at once—upon the talisman’s arrival, act without delay.
*Haste, haste, in accordance with the law’s command!*

Write the character *lei* (thunder) once more, then add:
With the left hand, press the Thunder Formation, draw the *xun* qi, and recite:
One revolution—six spirits conceal in *mao*.
Two revolutions—four slayers vanish in *chen*.
Three revolutions—*Kui* and *Gang* stir in *li*.
Four revolutions—thunder-fire erupts in *zhong*.
Five revolutions—thunderclaps strike in *kun*.
Six revolutions—mountain ghosts perish in *dui*.
Seven revolutions—seize and capture all lawless, wayward evil ghosts, bound beneath *Kui* and *Gang* to receive death—no movement, no action!
Press the Slayer Seal.

**Dispatch Incantation**
By decree, dispatch the Southern Fire Spirit, Great General Liu Yan, and the Northern Water Spirit, Great General Liu Zhi.
Wind and thunder descend, thunder-fire arises, mighty spirits arrive—calamity self-destructs.
*Kui* approaches, *Piao* appears, thunder roars, heaven and earth quake, ghosts and spirits die, demons and monsters perish.

Reverently invoke the Five Thunder Envoys, Wind Earl and Rain Master, Thunder Duke and Lightning Mother, the officers, lords, generals, and clerks of the Thunder Department.
Seize and capture the demonic spirits and ghostly essences of the Three Realms and Six Caverns, along with the fifteen kinds of heaven-defying, lawless fiends—all malevolent gods, evil specters, perverse qi, ghostly qi, plague spirits, epidemic toxins, and demonic thieves—bound beneath the thunderbolt to receive death, no movement, no action.
*Haste, haste, in accordance with the law’s command!*

*Dharma Sea’s Lost Pearls, Scroll Thirty-Five—concluded.*

The Venerable Highest Divine Empyrean Jade Mansion Grand Supervisor, Thunderbolt Vice-Marshal of the Northern Culmen, Attendant Censor-in-Chief, Responsive and Illustrious Marquis of Manifest Efficacy, Golden Wheel Enforcer Marshal Zhao Gongming.

The Si hour: what spirit does not submit?
The Zhong hour: what ghost dares to charge?

The Zhong hour: ten thousand ghosts vanish without trace.
The Gen hour: hearing my call,
The Gen hour: great displays of divine power.

Next, recite the summoning incantation again:
Oṃ.

Fork-headed lads and maidens, who bewilder and delude.
Manifesting as apparitions, they traverse provinces and counties, dispelling misfortune, dissolving lawsuits, pursuing souls into dreams.
A million raging soldiers, from the four directions and eight quarters, each and all come forth.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and ordinance.

Apply the incantation:

Flying Celestial Divine Kings, the mighty essence of si.
Wu’s divine power spans heaven and earth; zi’s qi blankets the Three Clarities.
Mao, I command with one summons; yin, I roar *lu-ji-chi*.
Wu’s cinnabar *lu-li-chi*; wu’s *he-ruo-li-mi-chi*.
Xu, swiftly call *pan-di* [missing character].

Hai, perform the Thunder Formation thrice.

**Opening Light Talisman**
When inscribing talismans, first execute the yin-wu-xu mudra, then trace the wu mudra above the talisman. Silently visualize the five directions’ five-colored qi merging to form one’s true body, only then may one concentrate the spirit and proceed.

Om hum hum [missing characters] *she*, wheel, by authority slay and subdue, radiant and blazing, seize.

Internally gather the five qi, spiraling them forth from the seven orifices to merge with the north’s native black qi, transforming into Xuantan’s black qi—a tiger pursuing the tiger, passing through wu to enter the Solar Palace. Heaven and earth, sun and moon, give birth;
light swiftly manifests form.

[Missing characters] seize.

chunks.original_text: 呼嚤呼呢吽哩哒啰飞符速摄。 东寅岳玉行离令，未玉子帝玉灵离神。 巳敕辰召坤温兑琼，卯速太现王真上形。 午出急急如律令。 此名交加斗，或水中，或符中，或童子，皆可用，掐卯文。 本身符 右眼震於月左眼撼於日 温琼奉上帝勑 口吐玉牙高万丈 身披金甲朗灵摄 右手执铜槌如雷鸣 左手执天下不正下邪 右脚踏雷电左脚踏泰山 左右电光闪烁鬼无逃形 五岳圣帝如令奉行念敕符咒 北帝当权，威神猛烈。 黑马奔到，震立乾坤。 雷公霹雳，闪电分明。 左右吏兵，剑仗如云。 收捉鬼神，当吾者亡。 急急奉上帝律令敕。 凡炼将，烈火焚香，用剑诀於香姻上虚书雷电二字，存香姻中雷呜电火闪烁，金光一条，上见温帅，从电光而起，在香姻上。 兆以两目视之，念北帝当权咒一遍，下令，存空中霹雳大震，存温帅从香姻上下坛前，身长一丈左右，青云蓊郁，迷意书符，策役遣发，以两手雷局於两肾，运雷从耳发出，噀水一口，存雷声赶逐，元帅从空而去。 缚咒 乌龊乌龊。
